S01ratnml_u:577: kecid agniṃ yamaṃ caiva naiṛtyaṃ ca tathāpare //
S01ratnml_u:578: Rm_2.20 [21] vāruṇaṃ ca tathā vāyukuveraṃ ca maheśvaraiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:579: bhairavaṃ mātṛkāś caivaṃ kecit skandhaṃ vināyakaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:580: Rm_2.21 [22] mahākālaṃ tathā caivaṃ kecid ṛṣīn yatīśvarān /
S01ratnml_u:581: kecid daityādhipān vīrān kecin nāgādhipāṃs tathā //
S01ratnml_u:582: Rm_2.22 [23] kecic cāturmahārājān kecid yakṣādhipān tathā /
S01ratnml_u:583: evam anyāṃs tridhātusthāṃs sarvān smṛtvā yayācire //
S01ratnml_u:584: Rm_2.23 [24] tair evaṃ yācyamānānāṃ devatānaṃ na kaś cana /
S01ratnml_u:585: eko 'py āsīt tadā trātā vāṇijāṃ duḥkhabhāgināṃ //
S01ratnml_u:586: Rm_2.24 [25] tatas te vaṇijaḥ sarve mṛtyubhayavikaṃpitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:588: Rm_2.25 [26] tatra yaḥ sugatopāsī dṛṣṭasatyaḥ sa dhīravān /
S01ratnml_u:590: Rm_2.26 [27] bhavanto mā viṣīdadhvaṃ kiṃ viṣādena setsyate /
S01ratnml_u:591: tasmāt tyaktvā viṣādatvaṃ dhīryyam ālambya tiṣṭhata //
S01ratnml_u:592: Rm_2.27 [28] dhairyyeṇa tārayed duḥkhaṃ mahākṛcchraṃ vipatsv api /
S01ratnml_u:593: tasmād dhairyyaṃ samādhāya smaradhvaṃ ca jinaṃ drutaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:594: Rm_2.28 [29] jina eva jagannāthas trātā sarvānukaṃpakaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:596: Rm_2.29 [30] tatrāpy evaṃ bhaye 'smākaṃ trātā ko 'nyo bhaviṣyati /
S01ratnml_u:597: buddha eva jagadbaṃdhus tad vrajadhvaṃ jinaṃ drutaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:600: Rm_2.31 [32] iti tenoditaṃ śrutva sarve te vaṇijas tathā /
S01ratnml_u:602: Rm_2.32 [33] namas te bhagavan nātha sarvajño 'si jagatprabhuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:603: bhavataiva jagat sarvaṃ pālitaṃ putravat sadā //
S01ratnml_u:604: Rm_2.33 [34] adyāgreṇa vayaṃ sarve yāvajjīvaṃ sadāpi hi /
S01ratnml_u:605: bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmas tad rakṣāsmāñ jagadguro //
S01ratnml_u:606: Rm_2.34 [35] bhavān eva jagaddharmaṃ saṃsāre pālitaṃ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:607: bhagavan sarvavin nātha trātum arhasi sarvathā //
S01ratnml_u:610: Rm_2.36 [37] tatra prāptāś ca te sarve vālukāsthale saṃsthitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:613: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāyeti namo namaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:614: Rm_2.38 [39] dṛṣṭvāsmān karuṇā sarvān paṃcaśatāni vāṇijān /
S01ratnml_u:616: Rm_2.39 [40] tadā sa bhagavān tebhya māhendravṛṣṭim ācaran /
S01ratnml_u:617: śītalā vāyavo yāti tena śītatvam āgatāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:618: Rm_2.40 [41] tad dṛṣṭvā sārthapatinā sarvān sārthān samabravīt /
S01ratnml_u:619: bhavantaḥ śrūyatāṃ sarve yan mayā procyate hitaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:620: Rm_2.41 [42] tad bhavadbhiḥ samādhṛtvā karttavyaṃ kṛtavedibhiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:623: tasmāt sarve vayaṃ tasya buddhasya śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:624: Rm_2.43 [44] saddharmmaṃ samupāśritya caremahi sadāpi hi /
S01ratnml_u:625: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāram anityaṃ jīvitaṃ sukhaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:626: Rm_2.44 [45] kṣaṇadhvaṃsi śarīraṃ ca bhave nityaṃ na kiṃ cana /
S01ratnml_u:627: dharma eva mahāsāraṃ yenaivaṃ rakṣyate jagat //
S01ratnml_u:628: Rm_2.45 [46] tasmād dharmaṃ samādhartuṃ gantavyaṃ śaraṇaṃ muneḥ /
S01ratnml_u:629: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te vaṇijo mudā //
S01ratnml_u:630: Rm_2.46 [47] tathety abhyanumodantas tato gaṃtum upākramat /
S01ratnml_u:631: atha sārthapatiś caivaṃ kṛtvā taṃ saha saṃmataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:632: Rm_2.47 [48] vihāre sugataṃ draṣṭuṃ dharmaṃ cāptum agān mudā /
S01ratnml_u:634: Rm_2.48 [49] dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ natvā viṣasāda puro muneḥ /
S01ratnml_u:637: Rm_2.49 [50] tadā sarve 'pi te satvāḥ śrutvā taṃ dharmam ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:643: Rm_2.52 [53] sākṣāt saddharmmam āsādya babhūvur dharmacāriṇaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:645: Rm_2.53 [54] kecid anuttarāyāṃ ca saṃbodhau praṇidhiṃ dadhuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:646: evaṃ tāḥ parṣadaḥ sarvāḥ saṃbuddhaśaraṇe sthitāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:648: atha te bhikṣavo dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān bodhicāriṇaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:649: Rm_2.55 [56] saṃbuddhaṃ prayatā natvā paprachur vismayānvitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:650: āścaryyaṃ bhagavan yāvad yad ime vaṇijas tathā //
S01ratnml_u:653: Rm_2.57 [58] śītalā vāyavo vātās tat kathaṃ vaktum arhasi /
S01ratnml_u:654: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭo bhagavāṃs tān abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:655: Rm_2.58 [59] śṛṇudhvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ karmma yan mayā kṛta kṛtaṃ kathyate /
S01ratnml_u:656: yan mayā prakṛtaṃ karma ko 'nyo bhuṃjyād dhi tatphalaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:657: Rm_2.59 [60] yena yat prakṛtaṃ karma sa evādyād dhi tat phalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:658: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate karma naiva kvāpi kathaṃ cana //
S01ratnml_u:659: Rm_2.60 [61] agnibhir dahyate naiva vāyubhir nāpi śuṣyate /
S01ratnml_u:661: Rm_2.61 [62] api tu pacyate skandhaṣaḍdhātvāyataneṣu hi /
S01ratnml_u:662: anyathā cāpi karmāṇi na dadanti phalāni ca //
S01ratnml_u:663: Rm_2.62 [63] yathaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tathaiva tat phalaṃ mataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:665: Rm_2.63 [64] miśritam ubhayaṃ dadyād iti matvā śubhe caret /
S01ratnml_u:667: Rm_2.64 [65] sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehināṃ /
S01ratnml_u:668: yan mayā prakṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ tat phalaṃ prāpyate 'dhunā //
S01ratnml_u:669: Rm_2.65 [66] kathyate tat purāvṛttaṃ sādhu śṛṇuta sādaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:675: Rm_2.68 [69] bhikṣubhiḥ saha saddharmmaṃ prakāśayan samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:677: Rm_2.69 [70] anyatamāṃ purīṃ ramyāṃ rājadhānīm upāśrayat /
S01ratnml_u:679: Rm_2.70 [71] śrāvakair bhikṣubhiḥ sārddhaṃ vijahāra jināśrame /
S01ratnml_u:680: atha tadādhipo rājā śrutvā taṃ buddham āgataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:681: Rm_2.71 [72] sa maṃtrijanapauraiś ca saha pratyudyayau mudā /
S01ratnml_u:682: tatrāsau sahasopetya dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ muniṃ //
S01ratnml_u:683: Rm_2.72 [73] kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā tasthāv ekāṃtike mudā /
S01ratnml_u:684: athāsau bhagavān dṛṣṭvā taṃ nṛpaṃ samupasthitaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:686: śṛṇu rājan bhave sāraṃ dharmaṃ nityam ataṃdritaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:687: Rm_2.74 [75] dharmeṇa jāyate loko dharmeṇa svargam āruhet /
S01ratnml_u:688: tasmād dharmaṃ puraskṛtya saṃpālayan prajā sadā //
S01ratnml_u:689: Rm_2.75 [76] prajārakṣāvrataṃ dharmaṃ mūlaṃ rājñāṃ vidur budhāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:690: prajārakṣāvrataṃ tyaktvā kim anyair bahubhir vrataiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:691: Rm_2.76 [77] tena rājan tvayā dharme pālanīyāḥ prajāḥ śubhe /
S01ratnml_u:692: tad daśākuśalebhyaś ca vinivārya tvayā sadā //
S01ratnml_u:693: Rm_2.77 [78] yojanīyāḥ prajā dharme tatpuṇyais tvaṃ pramokṣyase /
S01ratnml_u:695: Rm_2.78 [79] tatpuṇyaiḥ pracariṣyanti prajāḥ saṃvarddhitāḥ śubhe /
S01ratnml_u:697: Rm_2.79 [80] tasmād dānaṃ svayaṃ datvā prajā śīle niyojaya /
S01ratnml_u:698: śīlena śuddhyate kāyaḥ śuddhakāyo bhavet sudhīḥ //
S01ratnml_u:699: Rm_2.80 [81] subuddhiḥ kṣamayā sarvāc chatrūṃ jitvā virājate /
S01ratnml_u:700: tato vīryyabalaiḥ sarvān satvān saukhye niyojayet //
S01ratnml_u:701: Rm_2.81 [82] tataḥ kleśān vinirjitya dhyātvā bodhiṃ prasādhayet /
S01ratnml_u:703: Rm_2.82 [83] tataḥ prājña upāyaiś ca jagad bodhau niyojayet /
S01ratnml_u:705: Rm_2.83 [84] tatra prāpya rasābhijñā daśabhūmīśvaro bhavet /
S01ratnml_u:707: Rm_2.84 [85] tatra prāpya rasābhijñā daśabhūmīśvaro bhavet /
S01ratnml_u:709: saṃsthāpya saugate dharme svayaṃ nirvṛtim ācaret //
S01ratnml_u:711: yadi te nirvṛtau vāṃchā tadaitāsu samācara //
S01ratnml_u:712: Rm_2.86 [87] tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ saṃvṛttisukham āpnuyāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:714: Rm_2.87 [88] nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:715: nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ puṇyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ paramāṃ gatiṃ //
S01ratnml_u:716: Rm_2.88 [89] evaṃ hi sukṛtaṃ sarvaṃ jñātvā nirvāṇakāraṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:717: tathā dharme svayaṃ sthitvā preraṇīyāḥ prajā api //
S01ratnml_u:718: Rm_2.89 [90] evaṃ sa caṃdano buddho bodhayitvā ca taṃ nṛpaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:720: Rm_2.90 [91] atha sa nṛpatī rājā śrutvā tad dharmam ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:723: Rm_2.91 [92] jānubhyāṃ bhuvi saṃsthitvā kṛtāṃjalipuṭo nataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:725: suprasannamukhaḥ pādau natvā taṃ prārthayan muniṃ //
S01ratnml_u:726: Rm_2.92 [93] namas te bhagavan nātha bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:727: saddharmam ādiśann atra vijayasva gaṇaiḥ saha //
S01ratnml_u:728: Rm_2.93 [94] iti tena nṛpendreṇa prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:730: Rm_2.94 [95] tataḥ sāntaḥpurā rājā taṃ munīndraṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:732: Rm_2.95 [96] tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra lokānācarakopitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:734: Rm_2.96 [97] tatas tasyām anāvṛṣṭyāṃ taḍāgādi jalāśrayāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:736: Rm_2.97 [97!] tatas tasyām anāvṛṣṭyāṃ taḍāgādi jalāśrayāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:743: Rm_2.100 [100] kṣutpipāsahatāḥ kecin nyaṣīdanta mṛtā iva /
S01ratnml_u:745: Rm_2.101 [1] parasparaṃ mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā niḥśvasanto niṣedire /
S01ratnml_u:746: kecin meghaṃ ca khe dṛṣṭvā prāyācanta divāniśaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:747: Rm_2.102 [2] hā hatāsma iti proktvā kecit tasthur nirāśitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:749: Rm_2.103 [3] sarve 'pi paurikās tatra cikhedur mṛtyuśaṃkitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:751: Rm_2.104 [4] maṃtriṇaḥ sacivān sarvān samāmaṃtryābravīd iti /
S01ratnml_u:752: hā kaṣṭaṃ katham atraivaṃ durbhikṣaṃ varttate 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:753: kiṃ karomi na manye 'haṃ vadadhvaṃ tat pratikriyāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:754: Rm_2.105 [5] yena tadā mahāpāpadurbhikṣaṃ śāmyate drutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:756: Rm_2.106 [6] iti śrutvā nṛpājñāṃ te samaṃtrijanapaurikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:758: Rm_2.107 [7] bho devatāḥ prasīdadhvaṃ namo vaḥ praṇatā vayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:759: aparādhaṃ yad asmāsu kṣantavyaṃ sarvathāpi tat //
S01ratnml_u:760: Rm_2.108 [8] imaṃ durbhikṣanirvṛṣṭiṃ prāptaṃ śamayata drutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:762: Rm_2.109 [9] evaṃ kecid vidhātāraṃ kecid viṣṇuṃ janārdanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:763: kecic chivaṃ maheśānaṃ iṃdraṃ kecit surādhipaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:764: Rm_2.110 [10] kecid grahādhipaṃ kecil lokapālān maharddhikān /
S01ratnml_u:766: Rm_2.111 [11] mahākālagaṇāṃś cāpi kecin nāgāñ jalādhipān /
S01ratnml_u:767: kecin meghān samālokya natvā vṛṣṭiṃ yayācire //
S01ratnml_u:768: Rm_2.112 [12] evaṃ sarve 'pi lokāś ca svasveṣṭakuladevatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:770: Rm_2.113 [13] evaṃ taiḥ prārthyamānās tāḥ sarvāś ca devatā api /
S01ratnml_u:771: tatra vṛṣṭiṃ samutsraṣṭuṃ naiva śekur vighātitāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:772: Rm_2.114 [14] tataḥ sarve ca te lokā dṛṣṭvā tad vṛṣṭighātitāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:774: Rm_2.115 [15] atha rājā sa tān dṛṣṭvā durbhikṣākṣobhitāśāyān /
S01ratnml_u:775: tathā ca grahām ālokya visaṇṇāsyo vyacintayat //
S01ratnml_u:776: Rm_2.116 [16] aho kaṣṭaṃ mahotpātaṃ mama rājye bhaviṣyati /
S01ratnml_u:777: katham atra pratīkāraṃ tat praśāntyai kariṣyate //
S01ratnml_u:779: na śakyaṃte prajā yena rakṣitum ītipīḍite /
S01ratnml_u:780: dhig māṃ nṛpādhamībhūtaṃ kiṃ pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ mayā /
S01ratnml_u:781: Rm_2.117 [18] yena yasya prajā eva kṣutpipāsahatā mṛtāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:782: kim eva mama rājye na bhogyaiś cāpi dhanair api /
S01ratnml_u:784: Rm_2.118 [19] yena rājñā na rakṣyante prajāḥ svaviṣayāśritāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:785: sa kiṃ rājā baliṣṭho 'pi kṛtānta iva manyate //
S01ratnml_u:786: Rm_2.119 [20] yaś ca rājā svabhogyārthaṃ kevalaṃ daṇḍam āharan /
S01ratnml_u:787: na vipatsu prajāḥ pāti sa kiṃ rājāpi cauravat //
S01ratnml_u:788: Rm_2.120 [21] yeṣām eva hitārthāya yaś ca rājābhiṣicyate /
S01ratnml_u:789: sa teṣāṃ na hitaṃ kuryyāt sa kiṃ rājā kṛtārthahā //
S01ratnml_u:791: svayaṃ naṣṭaḥ parān hatvā narakeṣu vrajed dhruvaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:792: Rm_2.122 [22] kiṃ cāham api mānuṣyaḥ samāna iṃdriyair api /
S01ratnml_u:793: yato me kriyate sarvaiḥ sevo nityaṃ samāhitaiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:794: Rm_2.123 [23] yadi na kriyate rakṣā mayāpy eṣāṃ vipatsv api /
S01ratnml_u:795: katham etadṛśair muktaḥ kadā yāsyāmi sadgatiṃ //
S01ratnml_u:798: Rm_2.125 [25] tadāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi yamadūtair adhiṣṭhite /
S01ratnml_u:799: dṛṣṭvā tāṃ bhīṣaṇāṃ krūrān patiṣyāmi vimohitaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:800: Rm_2.126 [26] tadā tatra na vidyeta kaścit trātā dayānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:801: dharma eva tadā rakṣet tad dharmaṃ sādhayec chubhaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:802: Rm_2.127 [27] dharmāś ca bahudhā proktās teṣāṃ prāhur munīśvarāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:804: Rm_2.128 [28] yenaiva śubhatāṃ kṛtvā sarvatra bhuvaneṣv api /
S01ratnml_u:805: sarvasatvāś ca pālyante sarvadeha paratra ca //
S01ratnml_u:806: Rm_2.129 [29] tathātrāpi śubhaṃ kartuṃ saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajan /
S01ratnml_u:811: tatas taṃ sugataṃ natvā tad durbhikṣaṃ praśāṃtaye //
S01ratnml_u:813: tadā sa bhagavān atra suvṛṣṭiṃ cārayed dhruvaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:814: Rm_2.133 [33] sarvatra śubhatāṃ kṛtvā subhikṣaṃ kārayet sadā /
S01ratnml_u:815: tato 'tra sarvadāpy evaṃ durbhikṣaṃ na kadā cana //
S01ratnml_u:816: subhikṣaṃ sarvato bhadraṃ bhaven nūnaṃ samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:817: Rm_2.134 [34] subhikṣaṃ sarvato bhadraṃ bhaven nūnaṃ samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:819: iti dhyātvā viniścitya manasā sa narādhipaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:820: Rm_2.135 [35] sahasā sacivān sarvān samāmaṃtryābravīt tathā /
S01ratnml_u:821: śṛṇudhvaṃ maṃtriṇo yan me manasā saṃviciṃtitaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:822: Rm_2.136 [36] tad anumodya yuṣmābhiḥ prakarttavyaṃ samāhitaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:824: Rm_2.137 [37] tad asmatpāpato nūnaṃ tat pāpaparihāṇaye /
S01ratnml_u:826: Rm_2.138 [38] sasaṃghaṃ sevituṃ nityam iche tad anumodyatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:827: sa eva bhagavān nāthaḥ kṛtvātra śubhatāṃ sadā //
S01ratnml_u:828: Rm_2.139 [39] suvṛṣṭiṃ cārayitvā ca subhikṣaṃ kārayed dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:829: tato 'smākaṃ tadāpy atra maṃgalaṃ syāt samaṃtataḥ //

S01ratnml_u:1121: Rm_3.43 [41!] yac ca dānamahotsāhaṃ yatra gehe na vidyate /

S01ratnml_u:1123: Rm_3.44 [42] yasmin gṛhe sadā nityaṃ dānapuṇyamahotsavaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:1125: Rm_3.45 [43] yasmiṃś cāpi gṛhastho hi dānapuṇyanirutsahaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:1126: svayam eva prabhuktvaivaṃ vasate paśuvat sa kiṃ //
S01ratnml_u:1127: Rm_3.46 [44] dhanyās te puruṣā vīrā yaśodharmasukhānvitāḥ /

S01ratnml_u:1129: Rm_3.47 [45] teṣām eva hi saṃsāre susāraṃ jīvitaṃ khalu /

S01ratnml_u:1131: Rm_3.48 [46] dānenaiva hi lobhyaṃte yaśodharmasukhāni ca /

S01ratnml_u:1133: Rm_3.49 [47] kiyat kālaṃ ca jīveyur ye bhuktvaiva sukhaṃ sthitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:1134: avaśyaṃ sarvaśo hitvā mṛtā yāyur yamālayaṃ //

S01ratnml_u:1136: nirṇayitvā ca tat karma prerayet karmabhuktaye //
S01ratnml_u:1137: Rm_3.51 [49] ye ca pāpakarā duṣṭā prerayet tān tu durgatau /
S01ratnml_u:1138: ye tu puṇyakarā bhadrāḥ prerayet tāṃś ca sadgatau //
S01ratnml_u:1139: Rm_3.52 [50] tatra karmaphalāny evaṃ duḥkhāni ca /
S01ratnml_u:1140: sukhāni ca sarvatheha paratrāpi bhuṃjate sarvajāṃtavaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:1143: Rm_3.54 [52] evaṃ matvā prabho svāmin yaśodharmasukhāptaye /
S01ratnml_u:1146: yathechayā sukhaṃ bhuktvā pālayasva sadā janān //
S01ratnml_u:1147: Rm_3.56 [54] tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ bhaved iha paratra ca /
S01ratnml_u:1148: saphalaṃ mānuṣaṃ janma nūnaṃ sadgatim āpnuyāt //
S01ratnml_u:1149: Rm_3.57 [55] iti bhāryāvacaḥ śrutvā sa gṛhastho vaṇik sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:1150: bhāryāṃ tāṃ vallabhāṃ kāntāṃ dṛṣṭvā caivaṃ samabravīt //
S01ratnml_u:1151: Rm_3.58 [56] ayi priye subhadrāsi mama bhāryānucāriṇī /
S01ratnml_u:1152: yat tvayā bhāṣitaṃ satyaṃ tat kariṣyāmi sarvathā //
S01ratnml_u:1153: Rm_3.59 [57] kiṃ tu tvaṃ me priyā bhāryā vallabhātimanoharā /
S01ratnml_u:1154: tat kathaṃ tvāṃ priyāṃ tyaktvā kutra yāsye dhanārthataḥ //
S01ratnml_u:1155: Rm_3.60 [58] sārthavāho hy ahaṃ cāpi tat kathaṃ nīcavṛttibhiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:1157: Rm_3.61 [59] tasmāt priye subhadrāṃgī sati dharmānucāriṇī /
S01ratnml_u:1159: Rm_3.62 [60] yāvan nāhaṃ gṛhe prāptas tāvad dhairyyaṃ samāśraya /
S01ratnml_u:1161: Rm_3.63 [61] iti bharttoditaṃ śrutvā sā ca bhāryānutāpitā /
S01ratnml_u:1163: Rm_3.64 [62] he nātha supriya svāmin māṃ vihāya kathaṃ vrajeḥ /
S01ratnml_u:1164: tvayā vinā kathaṃ gehe tiṣṭheyāhaṃ yathā vane //
S01ratnml_u:1167: Rm_3.66 [64] saurabhyā 'ṅgane cāpi bhāṣane gamane kvacit /
S01ratnml_u:1169: Rm_3.67 [65] tavaiva smaraṇaṃ kṛtvā niḥśvasantī muhur muhuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:1171: Rm_3.68 [66] mṛtāyāṃ mayi te gehe ko 'nurakṣen nu saṃpadaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:1172: śrutvā me maraṇaṃ nūnaṃ dhakṣyase virahānalaiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:1173: Rm_3.69 [67] tadaitābhiś ca saṃpattiratnaiś ca kiṃ kariṣyasi /
S01ratnml_u:1174: aputrasya hi sarvasvaṃ nūnaṃ rājā grahīṣyati //
S01ratnml_u:1175: Rm_3.70 [68] tadātmanā vikhidyaivaṃ dūraṃ mā gā vihāyatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:1176: gṛhe sthitvā mayā sārddhāṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvodyamaṃ kuru //
S01ratnml_u:1177: Rm_3.71 [69] atrāpi bahavaḥ santi vaṇiksaṃghā mahājanāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:1178: paṇyaṃ prasāryya taṃ sārddhaṃ sādhayasva dhanaṃ sukhaṃ //

S01ratnml_u:1180: tat kiṃ nau bahubhī ratnair mā gā ratnākaraṃ hy ataḥ //

S01ratnml_u:1182: saṃvṛtyā prārjaya dravyaṃ svagehe saṃsthito rama //
S01ratnml_u:1183: Rm_3.74 [72] mā dhāva priya kutrāpi kiṃ vā ratnākare labhet /
S01ratnml_u:1185: svakṛtaṃ karma tad bhāvi nirmāṇasadṛśaṃ phalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:1186: Rm_3.75 [73] svakṛtaṃ karma tad bhāvi nirmāṇasadṛśaṃ phalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:1188: sarvatrāpi labhanty eva mahāntaḥ kṣudrikā api //
S01ratnml_u:1189: Rm_3.76 [74] tathā ye sujanā loke sadhanā sadguṇāśrayāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:1190: te 'pi kṣaṇād bhavanty eva nirdhanā bhikṣutāśritāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:1191: Rm_3.77 [75] ye cāpi durjanā loke nirdhanā nirguṇāś ca ye /
S01ratnml_u:1192: te 'pi labhanti mānyārhaṃ sevyante cāpi sajjanaiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:1193: Rm_3.78 [76] tathā ye vaṇijo dhīrāḥ sārthavāhā maṇīchayā /
S01ratnml_u:1194: ratnākaraṃ gatās teṣāṃ ke cit svastisamāgatāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:1195: Rm_3.79 [77] ke cit tatra samudre vā bhagnanaukā dhanaiḥ saha /
S01ratnml_u:1196: patitāḥ sannimajjantā mṛtāś ca vilayaṃ gatāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:1200: phalaṃ bhuktvā bhramanty evaṃ saṃsāre ṣaḍgatiṣv api //
S01ratnml_u:1202: mā khedaya svam ātmānaṃ dharmaṃ kṛtvā sukhaṃ vasa //
S01ratnml_u:1203: Rm_3.82 [80] tathā nau maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhavet khalu /
S01ratnml_u:1204: yāvajjīvaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā sadgatiṃ ca vrajemahi //
S01ratnml_u:1205: Rm_3.83 [81] iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sārthavāhātmajaḥ sa ca /
S01ratnml_u:1206: taṃ priyāṃ ramaṇīṃ bhāryyāṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ samabhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:1207: Rm_3.84 [82] bhadre satyaṃ tvaṃ yā proktaṃ yat svakarmapramānatā /
S01ratnml_u:1208: iti matvāham ichāmi gantuṃ ratnākare 'pi hi //
S01ratnml_u:1209: Rm_3.85 [83] yad abhāvi na tad bhāvi bhāvi cen na tad anyathā /
S01ratnml_u:1210: sarvatrāpi bhaven nūnaṃ tenābdhiṃ gantum īhyate //
S01ratnml_u:1211: Rm_3.86 [84] yadi bhāgyaṃ mamāsty evaṃ svasti syād gamane khalu /
S01ratnml_u:1213: Rm_3.87 [85] atha me bhāgyatā naiva nūnaṃ tatra vipattitā /
S01ratnml_u:1217: Rm_3.89 [87] tatra ke cid dhatā vīrā yaśodharmānvitā mṛtāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:1219: aham api vaṇikputraḥ sārthavāhātmajo hy ahaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:1220: Rm_3.90 [88] aham api vaṇikputraḥ sārthavāhātmajo hy ahaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:1222: tat tathāhaṃ gaṃiṣyāmi ratnākaraṃ na cānyataḥ //
S01ratnml_u:1223: Rm_3.91 [89] yadi svasti gṛhaṃ prāpsye yaśoratnasukhānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:1225: Rm_3.92 [90] iti matvā priye bhadre mā viṣīda sukhāṃ vasa /

S01ratnml_u:1228: anivarttī hy ahaṃ kāryye tan māṃ tvaṃ mā nivāraya //
S01ratnml_u:1229: Rm_3.94 [92] iti bharttur vacaḥ śrutvā nirbandhaṃ gamanaṃ prati /
S01ratnml_u:1230: sā satī taṃ svabharttāraṃ natvā prāha kṛtāṃjaliḥ //
S01ratnml_u:1231: Rm_3.95 [93] svāmiṃs tvaṃ sarvathā gantuṃ yadīchasi mahāmbudhiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:1232: dhairyyam ālamvya saṃpaśyan mārge vraja samāhitaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:1233: Rm_3.96 [94] svasti te vrajato mārge sarvatrāpi divāniśaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:1234: svasti pratyāgate caivaṃ bhūyān nityaṃ śubhaṃ sadā //
S01ratnml_u:1236: svasti śīghraṃ samāgacha vrajā te 'stu sadā śivaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:1237: Rm_3.98 [96] iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sārthavāhas tatheti saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:1241: Rm_3.100 [98] tatra gantuṃ mayā sārddhaṃ yadi yūyaṃ samichatha /
S01ratnml_u:1243: Rm_3.101 [99] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te vaṇijo mudā /

S01ratnml_u:1245: Rm_3.102 [100] atha sārthapatiḥ śīghraṃ taiś ca paṃcaśataiḥ saha /
S01ratnml_u:1247: Rm_3.103 [1] tataḥ kramād atikramya grāmajanapadāni te /

S01ratnml_u:1255: Rm_3.107 [5] ciram evaṃ virodhitvād ratnāni ca na lebhire /

S01ratnml_u:1261: Rm_3.110 [8] bharttur eva muhuḥ smṛtvā virahavedanāturā /

S01ratnml_u:1268: sarvatra viṣayeṣv evaṃ na protsahe yathāturā //
S01ratnml_u:1271: Rm_3.115 [13] bhartur āgatim ālambya kṣaṇaṃ dhairyyasamāśritā /
S01ratnml_u:1272: bhartāram eva saṃsmṛtvā gṛha eva nyaṣīdata //
S01ratnml_u:1273: Rm_3.116 [14] na nidrāṃ śayane bheje nānyasmṛtau mano 'nudat /
S01ratnml_u:1274: prabhum evaṃ samādhyātvā tasthau dhyāyīva yogavit //
S01ratnml_u:1275: Rm_3.117 [15] athaivaṃ vikalībhūtāṃ yauvanīṃ tāṃ pativratāṃ /

S01ratnml_u:1278: mā viṣīda yad arthan te tad vadasva mayi priye //
S01ratnml_u:1280: kautuke cādbhute cāpi sarvatra viṣayeṣv api //
S01ratnml_u:1281: Rm_3.120 [18] bhojane bhūṣaṇe cāpi draṣṭuṃ śrotuṃ na vāṃchasi /

S01ratnml_u:1291: Rm_3.125 [23] yāvac ca sa priyaḥ svāmī nāyāti svagṛhaṃ prati /
S01ratnml_u:1292: tāvad evaṃ na bhokṣye 'haṃ bhogyāni surasāny api //
S01ratnml_u:1293: Rm_3.126 [24] viṣayeṣv api sarveṣu na me vāṃchā priyaṃ vinā /

S01ratnml_u:1295: Rm_3.127 [25] yāvat svāmī na me dṛṣṭas tāvat sthāsyāmy ahaṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:1296: api me jivitaṃ yātu na ca yāyāṃ gṛhād bahiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:1297: Rm_3.128 [26] strīṇāṃ hi devatā svāmī dharmo 'pi bhartṛsevayā /
S01ratnml_u:1298: tasmāt smṛtvaiva bharttāraṃ bhājāmy ahaṃ pativratā //

S01ratnml_u:1311: Rm_3.135 [33] tathāpi kiṃ kariṣyāmi nāryy ahaṃ hi pativratā /
S01ratnml_u:1312: tasmāt tam eva bharttāraṃ smṛtvā sthāsyāmi sarvadā //
S01ratnml_u:1313: Rm_3.136 [34] iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sā sakhī hitakāriṇī /
S01ratnml_u:1314: tadupāyahitaṃ kartuṃ tāṃ sakhīṃ ca samabravīt //
S01ratnml_u:1315: Rm_3.137 [35] bhadre satyaṃ tvayā proktaṃ strīṇāṃ hi devatā patiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:1316: tathāpi vakṣyate bhadre tava prītyā ca tac chṛṇu //
S01ratnml_u:1317: Rm_3.138 [36] yāvan nivasate gehe bhartā kāmarasārataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:1318: tāvat strī sevayen nityaṃ dharmaṃ bhartur anujñayā //
S01ratnml_u:1319: Rm_3.139 [37] yadā bharttā gṛhe na syād dūradeśaṃ gatas tathā /
S01ratnml_u:1320: yāvad gṛhaṃ na cāyātas tāvad devaṃ bhajet patiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:1321: Rm_3.140 [38] pates te devatāsmākaṃ viṣṇur nārāyaṇo hariḥ /

S01ratnml_u:1325: Rm_3.142 [40] tasyaiva hy anubhāvena preryyamāno mano bhuvāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:1326: bharttā te sahasā prāyāt svasti ratnaiś ca saṃyutaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:1327: Rm_3.143 [41] tatas te saphalaṃ janma saṃsāre prabhunā saha /
S01ratnml_u:1328: dānaṃ kṛtvā sukhaṃ bhuktvā yāvajjīvaṃ sukhaṃ vasa //

S01ratnml_u:2172: tena tam evaṃ saṃbuddhaṃ punar gacheya vaṃdituṃ //

S01ratnml_u:2198: jananyāpi kṛtaṃ nāpi na pitrā na ca vaṃdhubhiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2199: Rm_5.77 [77] na jñātibhir na mitraiś ca na sahāyasuhṛjjanaiḥ /

S01ratnml_u:2206: asthimayo mahāchailo yad asmābhiś ca laṃghitaḥ //

S01ratnml_u:2209: Rm_5.82 [82] bhavatprasādān nirupetadoṣaṃ mayādya labdhaṃ suviśuddhacakṣuḥ /

S01ratnml_u:2214: prajātaharṣā sugataṃ jineṃdraṃ smṛtvā ca bhūyo divam āyayau sā //
S01ratnml_u:2215: Rm_5.85 [85] tathā svargasamāyātā devakanyā mumoda sā /
S01ratnml_u:2219: Rm_5.87 [87] atha te bhikṣavaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvaivam avabhāsitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:2221: Rm_5.88 [88] bhagavann adya rātrau ko bhavato 'ntikam āgataḥ /

S01ratnml_u:2224: Rm_5.89 [89] asmābhir jñāyate nāyaṃ yo 'dya rātrāv ihāgataḥ /

S01ratnml_u:2238: draṣṭuṃ dharmaṃ ca me śrotum ihāsau samupāgatā //
S01ratnml_u:2239: Rm_5.96 [96] tan mayā deśitaṃ tasyai saṃbodhidharmam uttamaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:2240: śrutvā sā cānumodyaivaṃ saṃharṣitā divaṃ yayau //
S01ratnml_u:2241: Rm_5.97 [97] ity evaṃ bhikṣavo matvā triratnāni śubhārthibhiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:2242: sevitavyāni saṃsmṛtvā gatvā ca śaraṇaṃ sadā //

S01ratnml_u:2246: sadgatiṃ te na gachanti vasanti narake sadā //

S01ratnml_u:2249: Rm_5.101 [1] tathā vo maṅgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatra sarvadā bhavet /

S01ratnml_u:2251: Rm_5.102 [2] ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te bhikṣavo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:2253: Rm_5.103 [3] ity evaṃ guruṇādiṣṭaṃ mayaivaṃ te pracakṣyate /
S01ratnml_u:2254: śrutvaitac chrāvayitvā ca triratnāni sadā bhaja //
S01ratnml_u:2255: Rm_5.104 [3*] tatas tvaṃ kramaśaś caiva bodhicaryāṃ samācaran /
S01ratnml_u:2258: Rm_5.105 [4] ity etad guruṇādiṣṭaṃ upaguptena bhikṣuṇā /
S01ratnml_u:2260: śrutvā rājā tathety evam abhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2262: Rm_5.106 [5] ye śrutvā śrāvayanti pramuditamanasaḥ śraddhayā bodhikāmāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:2264: kṛtvā loke hitārthaṃ jinavaravasatiṃ saṃprayaṃti praharṣaiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2267: Rm_6.1 [1] punar evaṃ yatīśo 'sāv upagupto jināṃśajaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:2270: tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu rājan samāhitaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2273: Rm_6.4 [4] akliṣṭāni hi vāsāṃsi kliśyeyuś cyavanāntike /
S01ratnml_u:2274: amlānāni ca mālyāni mlāyeran sahasā khalu //
S01ratnml_u:2275: Rm_6.5 [5] daurgandhaṃ niḥsared dehāt kakṣābhyāṃ sveda udbhavet /
S01ratnml_u:2276: pracyutisamaye prāpte svāsane na dhṛtiṃ labhet //
S01ratnml_u:2282: avaśyaṃ cyavanaṃ svargān matvā rautsīd adhīritaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2286: tvayi snātvapy ahaṃ cyutvā yāsyāmi durgatiṃ kathaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:2287: Rm_6.11 [11] hā caitraratham utsṛjya kva krīḍeyaṃ yathechayā /
S01ratnml_u:2288: hā nandanavanaṃ ramyaṃ tyaktvāhaṃ kva rameya ca //
S01ratnml_u:2289: Rm_6.12 [12] hā miśrikāvanaṃ divyaṃ tyaktvā ramye kuhādhunā /
S01ratnml_u:2290: hā pāruṣyavanaṃ tyaktvā kva ramyāmy apsarogaṇaiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2292: Rm_6.13 [13] kva sukhaṃ lapsyate pāṇḍukaṃvalakaśilāṃ vinā /
S01ratnml_u:2294: hā devasamitiṃ tyaktvā kva śroṣyāmi subhāṣitāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:2295: Rm_6.14 [14] hā hā sudarśanaṃ ramyaṃ puraṃ tyaktvā vraje cyutaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:2296: prāsādaṃ vaijayaṃtañ ca kadā drakṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2297: Rm_6.15 [15] hā śakrapramukhair devaiḥ sārddhaṃ kṛdāpramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:2298: adhunā me kva tat saukhyaṃ śrotuṃ cāpi na lapsyate //
S01ratnml_u:2299: Rm_6.16 [16] hā devyam amṛtaṃ tyaktvā kiṃ prabhokṣyāmi sāṃprataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:2301: Rm_6.17 [17] kiyad duḥkhaṃ ca saṃbhoktuṃ yāsyāmi narakeṣv ahaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:2304: hā hato 'smi svapāpena kiṃ pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ mayā //
S01ratnml_u:2305: Rm_6.19 [19] yenetaḥ svargataś cyutvā punar yāsyāmi nārakān kiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:2306: upāyaṃ kariṣyāmi na yāyāṃ yena durgatiṃ //
S01ratnml_u:2307: Rm_6.20 [20] ko me śāstātra vidyeta yo māṃ dharme niyojayet /
S01ratnml_u:2308: dharmeṇa rakṣyate prāṇī narake saṃsthito 'pi ca //
S01ratnml_u:2309: Rm_6.21 [21] dharmaṃ vinātra devo 'pi svargāt prabhransyate punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:2310: kiṃ karomi kva yāsyāmi nātropāyaṃ tu manyate //
S01ratnml_u:2311: Rm_6.22 [22] sarvathāham itaś cyutvā gacheyaṃ durgatiṃ khalu /
S01ratnml_u:2312: itaś cyutasya me janma labdhavyaṃ bhuvane kuha //
S01ratnml_u:2313: Rm_6.23 [23] iti dhairyaṃ samādhāya manasaivaṃ vyalokayat /
S01ratnml_u:2314: cyutvetaḥ saukaraṃ janma prāptavyaṃ saptame dine //
S01ratnml_u:2315: Rm_6.24 [24] evaṃ svāptagatiṃ dṛṣṭvā papāta savimūrchitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:2316: athādrākṣīn mahendras taṃ patitaṃ bhuvi mūrchitaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:2317: Rm_6.25 [25] dṛṣṭvā ca sahasopetya sudhāsekair asiṃcayat /
S01ratnml_u:2318: tato 'sau cetanāṃ labdhvā śanair utthāya taṃ prabhuṃ //
S01ratnml_u:2319: Rm_6.26 [26] dṛṣṭvā pādau pariṣvajya natvaivaṃ prārthayad rudan /
S01ratnml_u:2320: hā hā nātha mahendro 'si sarvalokādhipaḥ prabhuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2321: mām adhaḥ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā nopekṣāṃ kartum arhasi /
S01ratnml_u:2322: Rm_6.27 [27] mām adhaḥ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā nopekṣāṃ kartum arhasi /
S01ratnml_u:2324: bhavān hi jagatāṃ rājā svāmī bharttā patiḥ prabhuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2325: Rm_6.28 [28] nātho dharmānuśāstā ca tan māṃ rakṣatum arhasi /
S01ratnml_u:2326: tvadṛte 'nyo na me kaścid rakṣako vidyate 'tra hi //
S01ratnml_u:2327: Rm_6.29 [29] tad anukaṃpayā dṛṣṭyā dhṛtvā mām uddhara prabho /
S01ratnml_u:2328: yadi māṃ rakṣituṃ nātha na śaknoti bhavān api //
S01ratnml_u:2329: Rm_6.30 [30] ko māṃ samuddhared anyo hā hato narake vraje /
S01ratnml_u:2330: maṃḍākinyāṃ tvayā sārddhaṃ snātvā pūtātmako 'py ahaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:2331: Rm_6.31 [31] kathaṃ ca narake gatvā vaseyam aśuciṃ caran /
S01ratnml_u:2335: Rm_6.33 [33] saukaraṃ janma lapsyāmi saptame divase khalu /
S01ratnml_u:2337: Rm_6.34 [34] labdhvā bhuktvā cariṣyāmi vyādhasaṃghair upadrutaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:2339: Rm_6.35 [35] amedhyakardame nityaṃ vatsyāmy āvartya saṃcaran /
S01ratnml_u:2340: evaṃ divyāmṛtaṃ bhuktvā ramitvā bhavatā saha //
S01ratnml_u:2341: Rm_6.36 [36] kathaṃ hi nārake gatvā bhokṣye 'medhyāni saṃcaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:2343: Rm_6.37 [37] jāṃgalaṃ vṛkṣam āśritya sthito bhokṣyāmi kiṃ tadā /
S01ratnml_u:2345: Rm_6.38 [38] vividhāni ca duḥkhāni bhoktuṃ yāsyāmi nārake /
S01ratnml_u:2347: Rm_6.39 [39] yenāśu durgater muktaḥ prāgacheyaṃ ca svargatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:2348: sarvathā rakṣa māṃ nātha yady asti te kṛpā mayi //
S01ratnml_u:2349: Rm_6.40 [40] bhavān māṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā nopekṣāṃ kartum arhati /
S01ratnml_u:2351: Rm_6.41 [41] tad āśu māṃ prayatnena samuddhartuṃ samarhati /
S01ratnml_u:2352: idaṃ te darśanaṃ nātha paścimaṃ me bhavet khalu //
S01ratnml_u:2353: Rm_6.42 [42] janmaśatasahasraiś ca durlabhaṃ syād dhi saṃgamaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:2354: ity evaṃ vilapaṃ devaputras sa taṃ surādhipaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:2355: Rm_6.43 [43] natvā pādau nirīkṣyaiva tasthāv aśrugalanmukhaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:2357: Rm_6.44 [44] kāruṇyā krāntacittas tam āśvāsayann abhāṣata /
S01ratnml_u:2358: mā kṛthā rodanaṃ bhadra samāśvasi hi dhīraya //
S01ratnml_u:2359: Rm_6.45 [45] kriyante kiṃ prayatnāni sarvathā maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:2361: Rm_6.46 [46] hrīyante mṛtyunā sarve mṛtyuḥ kena nihanyate /
S01ratnml_u:2363: Rm_6.47 [47] sarveṣām api jantūnām ekānte maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:2364: tasmān mā bhes tathā mṛtyoḥ kiṃ viṣādena sidhyate //
S01ratnml_u:2365: Rm_6.48 [48] tad dhairyyataiḥ samālaṃvya triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja /
S01ratnml_u:2366: gatvā ca śaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ smara nityaṃ samāhitaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2367: Rm_6.49 [49] tatas tvaṃ durgatiṃ muktvā sadgatiṃ samavāpnuyāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:2368: etad eva hi saṃsāre mahopāyaṃ śubhāptaye //
S01ratnml_u:2369: Rm_6.50 [50] nānyad dhi vidyate kiṃcin mṛtyau sādhāraṇe dhruve /
S01ratnml_u:2371: Rm_6.51 [51] namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāyeti vadan bhaja /
S01ratnml_u:2372: ye triratnasmṛtiṃ dhṛtvā mṛtās te puṇyabhāginaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2373: Rm_6.52 [52] kramād bodhicarīṃ prāpya yāyuś cānte sukhavatīṃ /
S01ratnml_u:2374: tvaṃ cāpi triratnānaṃ smṛtvā mṛtaḥ supuṇyadhṛk //
S01ratnml_u:2375: Rm_6.53 [53] kramād bodhicarīṃ prāpya saṃprayāyāḥ sukhāvatīṃ /
S01ratnml_u:2377: Rm_6.54 [54] tathety anusaṃmodya punar natvaivam abravīt /
S01ratnml_u:2379: Rm_6.55 [55] gatvā ca śaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ upāsako bhave khalu /
S01ratnml_u:2380: ity uktvā sa mahendrasya puraḥ sthitvā kṛtāñjaliḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2382: namo buddhāya bhadrāya namo dharmāya tāyine //
S01ratnml_u:2383: Rm_6.57 [57] namaḥ saṃghāya nāthāya sarvadāpi name bhaje /
S01ratnml_u:2385: Rm_6.58 [58] upāsako bhaven nityaṃ namāmi satataṃ smaret /
S01ratnml_u:2388: dharmatā khalu devānāṃ ye devāḥ svargataś cyutāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2389: Rm_6.60 [60] te 'dholokeṣu gacheyur na tūrddhvabhuvaneṣu hi /
S01ratnml_u:2390: atha śakro narendro 'sau dṛṣṭvā taṃ svargataś cyutaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:2391: Rm_6.61 [61] kutrāsau labhate janma ity adhastād vyalokayat /
S01ratnml_u:2392: kim asau sūkarīgarbha utpanno vā na veti ca //
S01ratnml_u:2393: Rm_6.62 [62] apaśyat sarvataś cainaṃ na dadarśa kuhāpi sa /
S01ratnml_u:2394: tato 'sau vismitaḥ śakro divyena cakṣuṣā punaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2395: Rm_6.63 [63] kutrāsau labhate janma ity evaṃ samalokayat /
S01ratnml_u:2396: vata tiryyakṣu jāto 'sau preteṣu ca prajāyate //
S01ratnml_u:2397: Rm_6.64 [64] atha narakeṣu vā jāta ity evaṃ samalokayat /
S01ratnml_u:2398: teṣu triṣv apy apāyeṣu nādrākṣīt taṃ samaṃtataḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2399: Rm_6.65 [65] tato manuṣyalokeṣu jāto veti dadarśa ca /
S01ratnml_u:2400: tatrāpi ca sa sarvatra nādrākṣīt taṃ sureśvaraḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2402: iti teṣu ca sarvatra vilokayan dadarśa na //
S01ratnml_u:2403: tataś ca vismitaḥ śakras trayastriṃśe vyalokayan /
S01ratnml_u:2404: tatrāpi taṃ na cādrākṣīt kutrāpi ca samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:2405: Rm_6.67 [67] evaṃ sarvatra lokeṣu vilokayaṃs tadudbhavaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:2406: adṛṣṭvā vismitaḥ śakraḥ punar evaṃ vyaciṃtayat /
S01ratnml_u:2407: aho vata mahāścaryyaṃ yan mayāpi na dṛśyate //
S01ratnml_u:2408: Rm_6.68 [68] kutrāsau jāyate nūnaṃ na manye tat pravṛttitāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:2409: ko nu jñāsyati tadvṛttiṃ buddhād anyo na kaścana //
S01ratnml_u:2410: Rm_6.69 [69] buddha eva jagaddarśī ṣaḍabhijñas trikālavit /
S01ratnml_u:2411: tasmād aham ito gatvā saṃbuddhe samupācaran //
S01ratnml_u:2412: Rm_6.70 [70] vijñapyaivaṃ ca tadvṛttiṃ praṣṭum arhāmi sāṃprātaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:2413: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā devendro 'sau savismayaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2417: bhagavaṃs tad vijānīyā yad ihāham upāgataḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2418: Rm_6.73 [73] tathāpi praṣṭum ichāmi tat samādeṣṭum arhasi /
S01ratnml_u:2419: ekaḥ kālagato devaputraḥ svargāc cyuto gataḥ //
S01ratnml_u:2420: Rm_6.74 [74] ṣaṭsu lokeṣu sarvatra dṛśyate na mayā hy asau /
S01ratnml_u:2421: kutrāsau jāyate śāstar mayā na dṛśyate kvacit //

S01ratnml_u:2708: Rm_7.83 [83] kim eva vahuvādena nirvāṇārthimano mama /

S01ratnml_u:2745: Rm_7.100 [100] ehīti prokte sugatena muṇḍaḥ pātrī vapuṣmān sakaṣāyavāsāḥ /

S01ratnml_u:2777: Rm_7.115 [15] tato vandhumatā rājñā tat tanuḥ saṃskṛto 'gninā /

S01ratnml_u:3249: Rm_9.110 [8] tasmāt kāme na me vāṃchā nirvāṇe eva me manaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:5908: Rm_14.52 [52] aho vata sudhīr yā sā gandharvādhipanandanaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5910: Rm_14.53 [53] iti tena munīndreṇa manasā paricintitaṃ /

S01ratnml_u:5918: Rm_14.57 [57] tadā sa supriyo 'py enaṃ dṛṣṭvā mānābhigarvitaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:5928: Rm_14.62 [62] tataḥ śabdāt samuccerur gāthā evaṃ pracodināḥ /

S01ratnml_u:5940: Rm_14.68 [68] vaṃde te caraṇau śāsta bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /

S01ratnml_u:5958: Rm_14.77 [77] api cāsau munīndro hi sadātraiva na tiṣṭhati /
S01ratnml_u:5960: Rm_14.78 [78] kiṃ cātra sarvadā naivam utpatsyate munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5961: kadā cid evam utpanno loke bodhiṃ samādiśet //
S01ratnml_u:5962: Rm_14.79 [79] tathā ca durlabhaṃ janma sadgatau ca kṣaṇaṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:5964: Rm_14.80 [80] dharmaṃ vinātra saṃsāre kiṃ sāraṃ sukhino 'pi hi /
S01ratnml_u:5965: kṣaṇadhvansi śarīraṃ hi jīvitaṃ ca tṛṇāmbuvat //
S01ratnml_u:5966: Rm_14.81 [81] dharmeṇa sadgatiṃ yāyāt saṃbodhim api prāpnuyāt /

S01ratnml_u:5977: sarvān parigrahāns tyaktvā sadaikāntī vane vase //
S01ratnml_u:5978: Rm_14.87 [87] sukule duḥkule cāpi yācitvā viraśāsanaṃ /

S01ratnml_u:5980: Rm_14.88 [88] ity evaṃ duṣkaraṃ jñatvā pravrajyāvratasādhane /

S01ratnml_u:5990: Rm_14.93 [93] iti pitroditaṃ śrutvā supriyaḥ so 'bhiśaṃkitaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:5999: yūyaṃ cāpi hi tad dharmabhāṇaiḥ sadgatim āpsyatha //

S01ratnml_u:6007: Rm_14.101 [1] saṃbuddhaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā pravrajya saṃvaraṃ dadhat /

S01ratnml_u:6038: Rm_14.116 [16] tadā sarve 'pi te lokā devā daityāś ca kinnarāḥ /

S01ratnml_u:6056: Rm_14.124 [24] tataḥ krameṇa saṃprāpya bodhicaryyāṃ śubhāṃ carīṃ /

S01ratnml_u:6072: Rm_14.132 [32] iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā nṛpatiḥ so 'numoditaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:6074: Rm_14.133 [33] sādhu bhavatu sarveṣāṃ yuṣmākaṃ satsamīhitaṃ /

S01ratnml_u:6076: Rm_14.134 [34] saṃbuddhe yat kṛtaṃ karma tat phalaṃ kṣiṇuyān na hi /
S01ratnml_u:6078: Rm_14.135 [35] tad atra sarvathā yūyaṃ sasaṃghaṃ śrīghanaṃ muniṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6080: Rm_14.136 [36] ity ādiṣṭam ḥ - ndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi te mudā /

S01ratnml_u:6094: Rm_14.143 [43] tatra sarve 'pi te bhūmiṃ śodhayitvā samantataḥ /

S01ratnml_u:6106: Rm_14.149 [49] tatra mārgeṣu sarvatra prātihāryaṃ pradarśayan /

S01ratnml_u:7302: iti buddhaiḥ samākhyātaṃ tvayāpy etac chrutaṃ na kiṃ //
S01ratnml_u:7303: Rm_17.105 [4] tasmād ahaṃ munīndrasya śāsane śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7307: Rm_17.107 [6] etad dharmavibhāgena tvaṃ cāpi sadgatiṃ vrajeḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7308: iti matvā tathā svāmiṃs tad anujñāṃ dadātu me //
S01ratnml_u:7309: Rm_17.108 [7] tvam atra svagṛhe sthitvā triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7310: yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā śubhe cara sadādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:7311: Rm_17.109 [8] etatpuṇyavipākena tvaṃ cāpy evaṃ sudhīr bhaveḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7312: tatas te saugate dharme vāṃchā jāyeta cetasi //
S01ratnml_u:7313: Rm_17.110 [9] tatas tvaṃ śraddhayā gatvā saṃbuddhaśāsane svayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7315: Rm_17.111 [10] iti matvā bhavān svāmin saddharmaṃ yadi vāñchati /
S01ratnml_u:7317: Rm_17.112 [11] iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sa daridraḥ prabodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7318: tāṃ bhāryāṃ suciraṃ dṛṣṭvā śanair evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:7319: Rm_17.113 [12] hā priye katham eva tvaṃ māṃ vihātuṃ samichasi /
S01ratnml_u:7321: Rm_17.114 [13] yadi te 'sti mano dhairyyaṃ kṛtvā śraddhānvitāśrayā /
S01ratnml_u:7323: Rm_17.115 [14] iti bhartroditaṃ śrutvā sā vṛddhāpi kacaṃgalā /
S01ratnml_u:7325: Rm_17.116 [15] tataḥ sā sahasā gatvā tatrāśrame upāgatā /
S01ratnml_u:7327: Rm_17.117 [16] tatra tat purato gatvā sāñjaliḥ sā pramoditā /
S01ratnml_u:7329: Rm_17.118 [17] bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:7330: tad bhavāṃ kṛtvā kṛpayā mahyaṃ pravrajyāṃ dātum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:7331: Rm_17.119 [18] tayeti prārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7332: savyena pāṇinā tasyā vṛddhāyāḥ śirasi spṛśan //
S01ratnml_u:7333: Rm_17.120 [19] ehi mataś cara brahmacārikāṃ tvaṃ samāhitā /
S01ratnml_u:7334: ity uktvā tāṃ samāgṛhya sāṃghike punar abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:7335: Rm_17.121 [20] gacha māta prajāpatyā gautamyāḥ śaraṇaṃ vraja /
S01ratnml_u:7337: Rm_17.122 [21] ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā pratinaṃditā /
S01ratnml_u:7338: tathety āśrutya śāstāraṃ taṃ praṇatvā tato 'carat //
S01ratnml_u:7339: tatra sā samupāsṛtya dṛṣṭvā tāṃ gautamīṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:7340: Rm_17.123 [22] tatra sā samupāsṛtya dṛṣṭvā tāṃ gautamīṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:7343: Rm_17.124 [23] mātar atra samāyāmi bhavatyāḥ śaraṇaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:7344: tad bhavantī jaganmātā pravrajyāṃ pradadātu me //
S01ratnml_u:7345: Rm_17.125 [24] tayeti prārthitaṃ śrutvā gautamī sānumoditā /
S01ratnml_u:7347: Rm_17.126 [25] tatra sāśu prajāpatyāṃ pravrajitā yathāvidhiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7349: Rm_17.127 [26] saumyendriyā subhadraṃgā vṛddhāpi sā kacaṃgalā /
S01ratnml_u:7351: Rm_17.128 [27] tataḥ sā bhikṣuṇī śāstu gautamyāś ca prasādataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7355: Rm_17.130 [31] atha sā parivijñāya bhavacakraṃ calācalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7359: Rm_17.132 [33] tadā sā nirjitakleśā nirvikalpā niraṃjanā /
S01ratnml_u:7364: vaṃdyā pūjyābhimānyā ca vabhūva sā subhāṣiṇī //
S01ratnml_u:7365: Rm_17.135 [36] yadā sa bhagavañ chāstā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7367: Rm_17.136 [37] tadā sā bhikṣuṇī tatra kacaṃgalā subhāṣiṇī /
S01ratnml_u:7369: Rm_17.137 [38] tac chrutvā bhagavāṃs tatra tayā sūtrāṃtadeśite /
S01ratnml_u:7370: sarvāns tān sāṃghikān bhikṣūn samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat //
S01ratnml_u:7371: Rm_17.138 [39] eṣo 'grā bhikṣavo mātā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mamāśrame /
S01ratnml_u:7373: Rm_17.139 [40] ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi sāṃghikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7374: savismayā munīndraṃ taṃ paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:7375: Rm_17.140 [41] bhagavann anayā karmaṃ kiṃ prakṛtaṃ purākṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7377: Rm_17.141 [42] yeneyam śāsane bauddhe vṛddhā pravrajitādhunā /
S01ratnml_u:7379: Rm_17.142 [43] kiṃ vānayā purākarma kṛtaṃ kutra kadā kathaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7381: Rm_17.143 [44] kiṃcāpi prakṛtaṃ karmaṃ purānayā kadā kathaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7382: yenātra paścime garbhāvāse na dhārito bhavān //
S01ratnml_u:7383: Rm_17.144 [45] etat sarvaiḥ parijñāya bhagavānn asyāḥ purākṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7385: Rm_17.145 [46] iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ sarvaiḥ prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7386: sarvāṃs tān sāṃghikān dṛṣṭvā samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat //
S01ratnml_u:7387: Rm_17.146 [47] śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yad yat kṛtaṃ purānayā /
S01ratnml_u:7388: tat tat sarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi yuṣmākaṃ cittabodhane //
S01ratnml_u:7391: Rm_17.148 [49] tadā me dadato dānam antarāyaḥ kṛto 'nayā /
S01ratnml_u:7392: tenādyāpi daridreyaṃ durbhagā ca bhavaty api //
S01ratnml_u:7393: Rm_17.149 [50] pravrajyāyai tadai caiṣā vahudhā prārthitā mayā /
S01ratnml_u:7394: naivānujñāṃ dadau mahyaṃ vighnam eva vyadhād dhaṭhāt //
S01ratnml_u:7397: Rm_17.151 [52] yadi naiṣā tadā dānaṃ vighnā mamākariṣyati /
S01ratnml_u:7398: naiṣādhunā daridrātra bhavati hi kadā cana //
S01ratnml_u:7399: Rm_17.152 [53] pravrajyāyāṃ ca me vighnaṃ yadi naiṣākariṣyata /
S01ratnml_u:7400: acariṣyad vrataṃ vālye na tu vṛddhātra sāṃprataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:7401: Rm_17.153 [54] yan mamaivaṃ kṛtaṃ vighnaṃ dāne vrate tadānayā /
S01ratnml_u:7402: tenādhunā daridraiṣā vṛddhā vrataṃ caraty api //
S01ratnml_u:7403: Rm_17.154 [55] yat tadā sukṛtaṃ kiṃ cit prakṛtaṃ nānayā purā /
S01ratnml_u:7405: Rm_17.155 [56] yat sā māyā mahādevī mahāpuṇyārthasādhinī /
S01ratnml_u:7407: Rm_17.156 [57] bhūyo 'py eṣā purā tatra vāraṇasyāṃ dvijātmajāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7409: Rm_17.157 [58] tadā tatra munīndrasya kāśyapasya jagadguroḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7413: Rm_17.159 [60] tadā sā bhikṣuṇī tatra kiñcit kāryārtharoṣitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7417: Rm_17.161 [62] yac cānayā tadā tatra vidyābhyāsīkṛtaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:7419: Rm_17.162 [63] yac cāpy esā tadā tatra sūtrāntaṃ samupādiśat /
S01ratnml_u:7421: Rm_17.163 [64] evaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ sarve manyadhvaṃ karmasaṃbhavaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7422: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca saṃsāre bhramatāṃ sarvadehināṃ //
S01ratnml_u:7423: Rm_17.164 [65] yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karmaṃ tenaivaṃ bhujyate phalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7424: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karmaṃ kvāpi kadā cana //
S01ratnml_u:7425: Rm_17.165 [66] nāgnibhir dahyate karmaṃ klidyate nodakair api /
S01ratnml_u:7426: vāyubhiḥ śuṣyate naiva kṣīyate na ca bhūmiṣu //
S01ratnml_u:7427: Rm_17.166 [67] ahyathāpi bhaven naiva vipāke karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7428: yad uptaṃ bhūtale bījaṃ tad eva sūyate phalaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:7429: Rm_17.167 [68] anyathā na bhavet kvāpi kṛtaṃ karmaṃ phalaṃ bhave /
S01ratnml_u:7430: śubhasya karmaṇaḥ pāke śubhataiva sadā bhave //
S01ratnml_u:7431: Rm_17.168 [69] kṛṣṇasya kṛṣṇataiva syā miśritasyāpi miśritaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7432: evaṃ vijñāya kṛṣṇāni vihāya miśritāni ca //
S01ratnml_u:7433: Rm_17.169 [70] śubha eva sadāpy atra caritavyaṃ śubhārthibhiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7434: śubhena sadgatiṃ yāyāt kṛṣṇena durgatiṃ sadā //
S01ratnml_u:7435: Rm_17.170 [71] miśritena tathohe ca gatīr yāyād bhaved dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7438: Rm_17.171 [72] ye bhajanti sadā buddhaṃ na te gacchanti durgatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7439: sarvadā sadgatau bhadraṃ kṛtvā yānti jinālayaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:7440: Rm_17.172 [73] ye śṛṇvanti sadā dharmmaṃ na yānti te 'pi durgatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7442: Rm_17.173 [74] dānaṃ dadanti ye saṃghe te 'pi na yānti durgatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7444: Rm_17.174 [75] evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7446: Rm_17.175 [76] triratneṣu kṛtaṃ karmaṃ tadvipāke mahatphalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7452: Rm_17.178 [79] kramāt pāramitāḥ sarvāḥ paripūrya śubhānvitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7454: Rm_17.179 [80] jitvā māragaṇāñ cāpi prāpya saṃbodhim uttamāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7459: puṇyair bodhiṃ samāsādya gacheyur nirvṛtiṃ tathā //
S01ratnml_u:7461: puṇyair evaṃ kramād bodhiṃ prāpya yāsyanti nirvṛtiṃ //
S01ratnml_u:7462: Rm_17.183 [84] ahaṃ cāpi tathā nūnaṃ triratnabhajanodyamī /
S01ratnml_u:7464: Rm_17.184 [85] tathāham api sarvatra kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat /
S01ratnml_u:7465: sarvān bodhau niyojyaivaṃ yāsyāmi nirvṛtiṃ dhruvaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:7466: Rm_17.185 [86] evaṃ ye ye bhajanty atra triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7467: te te sarve 'pi saṃbodhiṃ prāpya nirvṛtim āyayuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:7470: Rm_17.187 [88] tathā kṛtvātra saddharmaṃbhuktvaiva satsukhāny api /
S01ratnml_u:7472: Rm_17.188 [89] ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi te janāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7473: sāṃghikāś ca tathety uktvā prābhyanaṃdat prabodhitāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:7474: Rm_17.189 [90] tadā tatra janāḥ sarve triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7478: Rm_17.191 [92] iti me guruṇākhyātaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
S01ratnml_u:7479: śrutvā rājans tvam apy evaṃ triratnaṃ bhaja sarvadā //
S01ratnml_u:7480: Rm_17.192 [93] prajāś cāpi tathā dharmaṃ śrāvayitvā prabodhayan /
S01ratnml_u:7482: Rm_17.193 [94] tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7483: kramāt pāramitā pūrya bodhiṃ cāpi samāpsyasi //
S01ratnml_u:7484: Rm_17.194 [95] iti tenārhatādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7486: Rm_17.195 [96] kacaṃgalāyā avadānam etac chṛṇvanti ye śrāvayatīha yaś ca /
S01ratnml_u:7487: vihāya pāpaṃ khalu te 'pi sarve bhuktvā sukhāny eva sugatiṃ vrajanti //
S01ratnml_u:7491: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evaṃ samabravīt //
S01ratnml_u:7492: Rm_18.2 [2] bhadanta śrotum icchāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7494: Rm_18.3 [3] iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan sudhīr yatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7496: Rm_18.4 [4] śṛṇu rājan samādhāya yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7500: Rm_18.6 [6] bhikṣubhiḥ śrāvakaiḥ sārddhaṃ bhikṣuṇībhiś ca cailakaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7506: Rm_18.9 [9] tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ tatra sarve samāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7509: garuḍā nāgarājāś ca vidyādharāś ca dānavāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:7510: Rm_18.11 [11] rākṣasāḥ sagaṇāś caiva ṛṣayo brahmacāriṇaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7512: Rm_18.12 [12] tathā rājakumārāś ca vaiśyā maṃtrijanā api /
S01ratnml_u:7514: Rm_18.13 [13] vaṇijaḥ śilpinaś cāpi tathānye 'pi śubhārthinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7515: grāmyā jānapadāś cāpi tathā kārpaṭikā api //
S01ratnml_u:7516: Rm_18.14 [14] evam anye 'pi lokāś ca saddharmāmṛtavāṃchinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7517: sarve te samupāyātās tatrādrākṣus tam īśvaraṃ //
S01ratnml_u:7519: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya sarve te samupāśritāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:7523: Rm_18.17 [17] tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:7525: Rm_18.18 [18] tadāryadharmam ākarṇya sarve lokāḥ pramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7527: Rm_18.19 [19] tadā tatra mahāpūryyāṃ vaiśālyāṃ pauriko mahān /
S01ratnml_u:7528: gṛhastho dhaniko nāma śrīmān sarvaguṇī sudhīḥ //
S01ratnml_u:7529: Rm_18.20 [20] śrāddho bhadrāśayo dātā śuddhaśīlo vicakṣaṇaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7533: Rm_18.22 [22] tadā tatra dvijā sarve bhaktimanto jagadguroḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7535: Rm_18.23 [23] bhavanto yan munīndro 'yam atrāsmākaṃ hitechayā /
S01ratnml_u:7537: Rm_18.24 [24] tad asmābhir munīndro 'yaṃ pūjanīyaṃ samādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:7539: Rm_18.25 [25] ekaś cet kurute dravyamadād asya nimaṃtraṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7541: Rm_18.26 [26] tadā sa dhaniko 'jñātvā samayaṃ tais tathā kṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7542: svayam eva munīndraṃ taṃ pūjayituṃ samichata //
S01ratnml_u:7543: Rm_18.27 [27] tataḥ sa dhanikaḥ śrīmān divyasaṃpatsamṛddhimān /
S01ratnml_u:7544: svayaṃ nimaṃtraṇaṃ karttuṃ sasaṃghasya muner yayau //
S01ratnml_u:7545: Rm_18.28 [28] tatra sa samupāsṛtya natvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:7546: sasaṃghaṃ tat puraḥ sthitvā prārthayad eva sāṃjaliḥ //
S01ratnml_u:7547: Rm_18.29 [29] bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhagavaṃtaṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7549: Rm_18.30 [30] iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7551: Rm_18.31 [31] tadā te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve saṃbhūya samupāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7553: Rm_18.32 [32] tac chrutvā bhagavān prāha tān dṛṣṭvā bhaktimānasān /
S01ratnml_u:7555: Rm_18.33 [33] etad ākarṇya sarve te brāhmaṇā bheditāśayāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7556: paraṃ pratīkṣyamānāś ca śanaiḥ svasvagṛhaṃ yayuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:7557: Rm_18.34 [34] tataḥ sa dhaniko matvā munīndreṇādhyuvāsitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7558: muditas taṃ muniṃ natvā sahasā svagṛhaṃ yayau //
S01ratnml_u:7559: Rm_18.35 [35] tatra sa svagṛhe gatvā vāṃdhaveṣṭajanais saha /
S01ratnml_u:7561: Rm_18.36 [36] tato bhojyasthalaṃ tatra śodhayitvā samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7562: ratnadhvajair vitānaiś ca sa patākair amaṇḍayat //
S01ratnml_u:7563: Rm_18.37 [37] tato yathākramaṃ tatra divyaratnamayāni ca /
S01ratnml_u:7565: Rm_18.38 [38] tataḥ sa prātar utthāya snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7568: sāñjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:7569: Rm_18.40 [40] bhagavan nātha sarvajña samayo varttate 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:7571: Rm_18.41 [41] iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7573: Rm_18.42 [42] tatra sa bhagavān mārge kṛtvā bhadraṃ samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7575: Rm_18.43 [43] tathāyātaṃ munīndraṃ taṃ śrīghanaṃ sāṃghikānvitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7578: bhāsayan bhadratāṃ kṛtvā saṃghaiḥ saha samācarat //
S01ratnml_u:7579: Rm_18.45 [45] tatra tasya gṛhe gatvā sasaṃghaḥ sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7580: tad dattaṃ pādyam ādāya svāsane samupāśrayat //
S01ratnml_u:7581: Rm_18.46 [46] tatas te sāṃghikāś cāpi sarve tatra yathākramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7582: tad dattaṃ pādyam ādāya svasvāsane samāśrayan //
S01ratnml_u:7583: Rm_18.47 [47] tataḥ sa dhaniko dṛṣṭvā sasaṃghaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7585: Rm_18.48 [48] tato divyopacārais taṃ bhagavantaṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7587: Rm_18.49 [49] tadbhojyaṃ surasaṃ bhuktvā bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7588: amṛtair iva saṃtuṣṭas tṛptiṃ yayau pramoditaḥ //

S01ratnml_u:7599: Rm_18.55 [55] tataḥ sa bhagavāñ chāstā sasāṃghiko 'numoditaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:7606: Rm_18.58 [58] bhagavan nātha sarvajña śvaś cātra bhavatām ahaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7608: pūjāṃ kartuṃ samicche tad anugrahītum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:7609: Rm_18.59 [59] tayeti prārthite dṛṣṭvā bhagavān sa tad āśayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7611: Rm_18.60 [60] tataḥ sa bhagavāñ chāstā samutthāya sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7612: bhāsayaṃ bhadratāṃ kṛtvā svāśrame ca samāśrayat //

S01ratnml_u:7617: Rm_18.63 [63] bhagavan nātha sarvajña samayo varttate 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:7618: tat sasaṃgho bhavāṃs tatra sahasāgantum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:7619: Rm_18.64 [64] tataḥ sa bhagavānn evaṃ bhadraṃ kṛtvā sasāṃghikaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:7623: Rm_18.66 [66] tataś ca sā muditā sarvaṃ saṃghaṃ buddhādikaṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:7625: Rm_18.67 [67] tataḥ saṃtarppitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śodhayitvā karādikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7627: Rm_18.68 [68] tataḥ sa bhagavān tasmai datvāśiṣaṃ sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7629: Rm_18.69 [69] tathā sarve tadānyo 'pi dhanikasyātmajaḥ sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7630: tat paredyu vihāraṃ taṃ gatvā natvā nyamaṃtrayat //
S01ratnml_u:7631: Rm_18.70 [70] bhagavānn api tasyaivaṃ dṛṣṭvā śraddhānvitaṃ manaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7633: Rm_18.71 [71] tataḥ sas taṃ muniṃ natvā svagṛhaṃ sahasāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7635: Rm_18.72 [72] tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya snātvā śuddhāmvārāvṛtaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7637: Rm_18.73 [73] bhagavan nātha sarvajña samayo varttate 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:7638: tat saṃgho bhavān gehe mamāgantuṃ samarhati //
S01ratnml_u:7639: Rm_18.74 [74] tataḥ sasaṃgha utthāya bhagavān sa tathācarat /
S01ratnml_u:7641: Rm_18.75 [75] tataḥ sa mudito buddhapramukbaṃ sarvasāṃghikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7645: Rm_18.77 [77] punaḥ sa sāṃjalir natvā prakṛtvā ca kṣamārthanāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7646: sasaṃghaṃ taṃ munīndraṃ tam saṃdṛṣṭvaivaṃ samupāśrayat //
S01ratnml_u:7647: Rm_18.78 [78] tadā tasya snuṣā cāpi satyavatī pramoditā /
S01ratnml_u:7649: Rm_18.79 [79] bhagavānn api tasyāś ca dṛṣṭva śraddhānvitaṃ manaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7651: Rm_18.80 [80] tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasmai datvāśiṣaṃ sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7652: tathā kṛtvā śubhaṃ loke gatvāśrame samāśrayat //
S01ratnml_u:7653: Rm_18.81 [81] tataḥ sāpi tathā prātaḥ snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtā /
S01ratnml_u:7655: Rm_18.82 [82] tathā sa bhagavāṃś cāpi sasāṃghikaḥ samutthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7656: pracaran bhadratāṃ kṛtvā tasyā gehe samāviśat //
S01ratnml_u:7657: Rm_18.83 [83] tatra pādyārgham ādāya bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7659: Rm_18.84 [84] tathāsthitaṃ munīndraṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃpramoditā /
S01ratnml_u:7661: Rm_18.85 [85] tātas taṃ sugataṃ tṛptaṃ sasāṃghikaṃ samīkṣya sā /
S01ratnml_u:7663: Rm_18.86 [86] tataḥ pūgādikaṃ datvā prārthayitvā kṣamāṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:7664: sasaṃghaṃ taṃ muniṃ natvā sā sāñjalir upāśrayat //
S01ratnml_u:7665: Rm_18.87 [87] tathā sa bhagavāṃs tasyai datvāśīṣaṃ sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7666: tato vihāyasā gatvā svāśrame ca samāśrayat //
S01ratnml_u:7667: Rm_18.88 [89!] tathā sa dhaniko bhaktyā bhagavantaṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7669: Rm_18.89 [90] tatputreṇa tṛtīye 'hni caturthe snuṣayā tathā /
S01ratnml_u:7671: Rm_18.90 [91] tac chrutvā tad dvijāḥ sarve vaiśālikāḥ prajā api /
S01ratnml_u:7673: Rm_18.91 [92] tatas te saṃmataṃ kṛtvā sarve viprāḥ sapaurikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7675: Rm_18.92 [93] evaṃ tat samataṃ jñātvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7676: dhanikaṃ taṃ samāhūya pura evam upādiśat //
S01ratnml_u:7677: Rm_18.93 [94] sādho gṛhapate sarve ime vaiśālikā dvijāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7678: kruddhās te saṃghabhojye 'tra hy alabdhāvasarā mama //
S01ratnml_u:7679: Rm_18.94 [95] tad atra tvaṃ kṣamāṃ kṛtvā dvijān sarvān prabodhaya /
S01ratnml_u:7681: Rm_18.95 [96] ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa dhanikas tathā /
S01ratnml_u:7682: ity āśrutya dvijān sarvān samupetyaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:7683: Rm_18.96 [97] bhavanto na mayā jñātaṃ bhavatāṃ kopakāraṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7684: tad atra me samākhyāta yad arthe kupyate 'dhunā //
S01ratnml_u:7685: Rm_18.97 [98] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te brāhmaṇā /
S01ratnml_u:7687: Rm_18.98 [99] tatraiko brāhmaṇaḥ sādhur dayāluḥ sukṛtārthavit /
S01ratnml_u:7690: Rm_18.99 [100] sādho gṛhapate 'smābhir yathātra samataṃ kṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7692: tathā tat te pravakṣyāmi śrutvā tat pratibudhyatāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:7693: Rm_18.100 [1] bhavanto yan munīndro 'yam atrāsmākaṃ hitechayā /
S01ratnml_u:7695: Rm_18.101 [2] tad asmābhir munīndro 'yaṃ pūjanīyaḥ samādaraiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7697: Rm_18.102 [3] ekaś cet kurute vittamadād asya nimaṃtraṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7699: Rm_18.103 [4] ity asmābhiḥ kṛtaṃ sādho samayaṃ sarvasaṃmataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7700: tad vilaṃghya tvayaikena śāstuḥ pūjā kṛtā sadā //
S01ratnml_u:7701: Rm_18.104 [5] etad dheto ime sārve brāhmaṇā ruṣitās tathā /
S01ratnml_u:7703: Rm_18.105 [6] kiṃ cāpi bhagavān atra sarvadā sthāsyate na hi /
S01ratnml_u:7704: tat sarve bhagavatpūjāṃ kartuṃ vāṃchanti sāṃprataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:7705: Rm_18.106 [7] yac cāyaṃ bhagavāñ chāstā dharmarājo munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7707: Rm_18.107 [8] tathātra sarvasatvānaṃ hitaṃ kartum upācaran /
S01ratnml_u:7709: Rm_18.108 [9] tathātrāpi hitaṃ kartum asmākaṃ samupāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7713: Rm_18.110 [11] eka eva tvaṃ evaṃ tu mā kṛthā bhajanaṃ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:7714: sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya te sāstuḥ karttavyaṃ bhajanaṃ sadā //
S01ratnml_u:7715: Rm_18.111 [12] iti tenoditam śrutvā dhanikaḥ sa vivodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7717: Rm_18.112 [13] mayā na jñāyate hy evaṃ bhavadbhiḥ samayaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7718: tad atra me 'parādhatvaṃ kṣantum arhanti sarvathā //
S01ratnml_u:7719: Rm_18.113 [14] yadi vo vidyate śraddhā triratnabhajane sadā /
S01ratnml_u:7721: Rm_18.114 [15] yadā na vidyate pūjā saṃbuddhe 'smin sasāṃghike /
S01ratnml_u:7723: Rm_18.115 [16] iti tena samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi te dvijāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7724: satyam iti parijñāya vabhūvus tat prasāditāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:7725: Rm_18.116 [17] tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saha paurikaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7727: Rm_18.117 [18] tatra te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve sametya saha paurikaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7728: sāñjalayo munīndraṃ taṃ natvaivaṃ prārthayan mudā //

S01ratnml_u:7735: Rm_18.121 [22] tatra te paurikā viprāḥ śodhayitvā samamṭataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7738: kṛtvā sarve 'pi te lokā mahotsāhaṃ pracakrire //
S01ratnml_u:7739: Rm_18.123 [24] tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ prātaḥ snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7740: tatrāśrame sametyaivaṃ natvā taṃ prārthayan muniṃ //
S01ratnml_u:7741: Rm_18.124 [25] bhagavan nātha sarvajña samayo varttate 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:7742: tat sasaṃgho bhavāṃs tatra pure āgantum arhati //

S01ratnml_u:7747: Rm_18.127 [28] tatra sa bhagavān kṣetre suśodhite sasāṃghikaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:7749: Rm_18.128 [29] saṃbuddhapramukhaṃ sarvaṃ saṃghaṃ te samatoṣayat /

S01ratnml_u:7751: Rm_18.129 [30] tat pātrāṇy upanītvā tad dhastādīkaṃ vyaśodhayat /
S01ratnml_u:7753: Rm_18.130 [31] datvā kṣamārthanaṃ kṛtvā taṃ sasaṃghaṃ praṇemire /

S01ratnml_u:7758: Rm_18.132 [33] tato bhadrāśiṣaṃ datvā bhagavān saha saṃghikaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7759: bhāsayaṃ bhadratāṃ kurvan gatvā svāśramam āśrayat //

S01ratnml_u:7762: Rm_18.134 [35] tato 'nte dhanikaś cāpi patnī putraḥ snuṣāpi ca /
S01ratnml_u:7764: Rm_18.135 [36] bhagavānn api tathā tebhyo datvā śubhāśiṣaṃ tataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7770: Rm_18.138 [39] tad dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve bhikṣavaḥ samupāśritāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7772: Rm_18.139 [40] bhagavan kiṃ purānena dhanikena vṛṣaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7773: kutra kathaṃ kadaitan naḥ sarvam ākhyātum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:7774: Rm_18.140 [41] iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭe bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7775: sarvāns tāṃ saṃghikān dṛṣṭvā tadaivaṃ samupādiśat //
S01ratnml_u:7776: Rm_18.141 [42] śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yad anena vṛṣaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7777: tat patnyā ca putreṇa snuṣayā ca tad ucyate //
S01ratnml_u:7778: Rm_18.142 [43] varāṇasyām abhūt pūrvaṃ mālikaḥ kamalābhidhaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7780: Rm_18.143 [44] patnī patnavikā nāma putraḥ kuvaliyābhidhaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7781: pāṭalokhyā snuṣā ceti vabhūvus tasya saṃmatāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:7782: Rm_18.144 [45] tadaikasmin dine tasya gṛhāntike prapuṣpite /
S01ratnml_u:7784: Rm_18.145 [46] te sarve ekavastrā hi paryyāyena nṛpālaye /
S01ratnml_u:7786: Rm_18.146 [47] tadā sa ca gṛhasthās te tatrodāne jvalat prabhāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7787: dṛṣṭvā kiṃ mahojvālam udyāne iti vismitāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:7788: Rm_18.147 [48] sahasā te samutthāya tatrodyāne nirīkṣituṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7790: Rm_18.148 [49] tatra te samupāśritya dṛṣṭvā taṃ dhyānasaṃsthitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7792: Rm_18.149 [50] tatra te svagṛhāsīnāḥ prātas tatpūjanotsukāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7793: nirddhanās tad vyathāṃ prāpu lūnapakṣāḥ khagā iva //
S01ratnml_u:7794: Rm_18.150 [51] tadā sa mālikas tasmai pūjāṃ kartuṃ samutsukaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7795: tad dravyaṃ svagṛhe samyag anviṣya samalokayat //
S01ratnml_u:7796: Rm_18.151 [52] tatra gṛhe sa sarvatra samanviṣya samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7797: kañci mātram api dravyam alabdhaivaṃ vyaciṃtayat //
S01ratnml_u:7798: Rm_18.152 [53] aho mayā purā pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ kiṃ yato 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:7799: akiṃcanyo daridro 'smi kim atra jīvitena me //
S01ratnml_u:7800: Rm_18.153 [54] yato na vidyate dravyaṃ kiṃ cid api gṛhe mama /
S01ratnml_u:7801: tat kena kariṣyāmi pūjām asya mahātmanaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:7802: Rm_18.154 [55] atrāyaṃ svayam āgatya mamodyāne samāśritaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7804: Rm_18.155 [56] tad asya sugatasyātra karttavyā satkṛtir mayā /
S01ratnml_u:7805: kadāyaṃ puri ramyatra samāgachet svayaṃ punaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:7806: Rm_18.156 [57] tat prātaḥ śūnyapātreṇa gached ito mamātmavit /
S01ratnml_u:7807: tan mamātra bhave śūnyam iva janmāpi nisphalaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:7808: Rm_18.157 [58] yato mānyo 'bhipūjyo yaṃ pūjyate na kathaṃ cana /
S01ratnml_u:7809: tatra kiṃ jāyate bhadraṃ puṇyaṃ vāsya kathaṃ kutaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:7810: Rm_18.158 [59] puṇyaṃ vinātra saṃsāre kiṃ sāraṃ janma nisphalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7811: bhuktvāpi kiṃ sukhāny atra suciraṃ jīvite nanu //
S01ratnml_u:7812: Rm_18.159 [60] puṇyārthe jīvitaṃ janma tad atra yadi naśyati /
S01ratnml_u:7814: Rm_18.160 [61] tan mṛtyur me varaṃ hy atra na mithyācirajīvitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7815: avaśyam eva saṃsāre sarvatra maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:7816: Rm_18.161 [62] kim evaṃ dehapuṣṭena bhuktvā duḥkhāṃ sarvadā /
S01ratnml_u:7817: tat kenāpi pradānena pūjayeyam imaṃ jinaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:7818: Rm_18.162 [63] puṇyena sadgatiṃ yāyāṃ pāpena durgatiṃ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:7819: tat pāpaṃ parityaktuṃ puṇyaṃ prāptu yateya hi //
S01ratnml_u:7820: Rm_18.163 [64] yady atra pūjyate nāyaṃ drakṣyate ca kadā kuha /
S01ratnml_u:7821: buddhapūjāṃ vinā bhadre puṇyaṃ ca lapsyate kutaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:7822: Rm_18.164 [65] yāvan na prāpyate puṇyaṃ tāvad durgaticāraṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7824: Rm_18.165 [66] tad atra śraddhayā kiṃcin mātreṇāpi svavastunā /
S01ratnml_u:7826: Rm_18.166 [67] iti dhyātvā viniścitya mālikaḥ saṃpramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7827: bhāryāṃ putraṃ snuṣāṃ cāpi samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:7828: Rm_18.167 [68] aye priye snuṣe putra yūyaṃ śṛṇuta madvacaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7829: yad atra kartum ichāmi tatra yūyaṃ prasādataḥ //

S01ratnml_u:8203: Rm_19.152 [51] tat tāḍanaravaṃ śrutvā sa pratyekajinaḥ sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8204: gopālāṃs tān samāmaṃtrya punar evaṃ samādiśat //

S01ratnml_u:8373: tatrānyasmin vane prāpto bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ //

S01ratnml_u:8388: Rm_20.20 [20] alpotsukābhavatv atra bhagavantaḥ kiṃ kuto bhayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:8390: Rm_20.21 [21] tadā sa mahiṣo duṣṭas taṃ munīndraṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:8392: Rm_20.22 [22] tatra tadgaṃdham āghrāya dṛṣṭvā taṃ raktacīvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:8394: Rm_20.23 [23] tatra tena jinendreṇa pañcasiṃhā mahoddhatāḥ /

S01ratnml_u:9513: Rm_23.145 [45] iti proktaṃ tayā patnyā śrutvā śreṣṭhī sa bodhitaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:9524: Rm_23.150 [50] evaṃ sā pāpinī pretī jātāṃ jatāṃs tathātmajān /
S01ratnml_u:9526: Rm_23.151 [51] evaṃ nārada vijñāya viramya pātakāt sadā /
S01ratnml_u:9528: Rm_23.152 [52] saddharmasya vipāke hi sarvadā maṃgalaṃ bhave /
S01ratnml_u:9529: pātakasya sadā duḥkhaṃ viśrite sya tathobhayaṃ //

S01ratnml_u:9548: Rm_23.162 [62] iti saṃprārthite tena nāradena sa sarvavit /

S01ratnml_u:9551: upāyaṃ samayaṃ cāpi pravakṣyāmy adhunā tathā //
S01ratnml_u:9554: Rm_23.165 [65] sukhāvatyā vinirgatya sarvāl lokān prabhāsayan /
S01ratnml_u:9557: kim adya me mahatsaukhyam iti proktvābhyaciṃtayat //
S01ratnml_u:9558: Rm_23.167 [67] aho saukhyaṃ samutpannaṃ prabhāveyaṃ prasāritā /
S01ratnml_u:9559: nūnam atra mahāsatvaḥ satvān uddhartum āgatāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:9560: Rm_23.168 [68] yasyedṛk satkṛpādṛṣṭiḥ satveṣv evaṃ prasaryyati /
S01ratnml_u:9562: Rm_23.169 [69] iti dhyātvā viniścitya sā pretī prativismitā /
S01ratnml_u:9563: tasyaivā smaraṇaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhe dṛṣṭaṃ samutsukā //
S01ratnml_u:9564: Rm_23.170 [70] tadā sa bhagavāṃs tatra lokanāthaḥ kṛpāmayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:9566: Rm_23.171 [71] taṃ prabhāsaṃtam āyātaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi pretakāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:9568: Rm_23.172 [72] svāgataṃ bhagavan nātha prasīda parameśvara /
S01ratnml_u:9570: Rm_23.173 [73] sarvadā bhavatām eva śaraṇaṃ saṃvrajāmahe /

S01ratnml_u:9572: Rm_23.174 [74] iti tat prārthite sarve lokanāthaḥ kṛpānidhiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:9574: Rm_23.175 [75] yadīchatha sadā saukhyaṃ yūyaṃ sarve samāhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:9575: triratnaṃ smaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhajata śraddhayā mudā //

S01ratnml_u:9578: Rm_23.177 [77] ity ādiṣṭaṃ jagacchāstrā lokanāthena tena te /

S01ratnml_u:9581: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā smṛtvā bhajeyur ānatāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:9582: Rm_23.179 [79] tadā tatsmṛtipuṇyena sarve te pretikās tataḥ /

S01ratnml_u:9586: Rm_23.181 [81] tataḥ sarve 'pi te satvā bodhisatvāḥ śubhaṃkarāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:9588: Rm_23.182 [82] tadā sā pāpinī pretī sarvapāpavimocitā /
S01ratnml_u:9590: Rm_23.183 [83] evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre sadgatiṃ sukhavāṃchibhiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:9592: Rm_23.184 [84] triratnabhajanodbhūtaṃ puṇyaṃ na kṣiṇuyāt kvacit /
S01ratnml_u:9594: Rm_23.185 [85] ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa nārado yatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:9596: Rm_23.186 [86] iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ mayātra vakṣyate /
S01ratnml_u:9597: matvā rājaṃs tvam apy evaṃ triratnaṃ bhaja sarvadā //
S01ratnml_u:9598: Rm_23.187 [87] prajāś cāpi tathā dharmaṃ śrāvāyitvā prabodhayan /
S01ratnml_u:9600: Rm_23.188 [88] tatas te sarvadā bhadraṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /

S01ratnml_u:9627: vaṇigbhiḥ sārthavāhaiś ca tathā śilpigaṇair api //
S01ratnml_u:9628: Rm_24.11 [11] grāmyai jānapadaiś cāpi kārpaṭikaiḥ satīrthikaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:9634: Rm_24.14 [14] tadaiva samaye tatra rājagṛhe purottame /

S01ratnml_u:9671: Rm_24.32 [32] tatra sa samupāsṛtyādrākṣīt tam śrīghanaṃ muniṃ /
S01ratnml_u:9677: Rm_24.35 [35] dṛṣṭvā sa muditas tatra sāṃjaliḥ purato vrajan /
S01ratnml_u:9679: Rm_24.36 [36] tatra tasyāśayaṃ śuddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa bhagavāṃs tathā /
S01ratnml_u:9681: Rm_24.37 [37] tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sa uttaraḥ pramoditaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:9695: Rm_24.43 [43] kumāra śāsane bauddhe pravrajituṃ yadīchasi /
S01ratnml_u:9696: anujñāṃ mātur āsādya prāgacha dāsyate tadā //
S01ratnml_u:9697: Rm_24.44 [44] ity ādiṣṭe munīndreṇa sa uttaraḥ prabodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:9698: tatheti caraṇau tasya muner natvā gṛhaṃ yayau //
S01ratnml_u:9699: Rm_24.45 [45] tatra gṛhe samāsādya sa uttaraḥ pramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:9700: jananyāś caraṇau natvā sāṃjalir evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:9701: Rm_24.46 [46] mātar adya vihāre 'haṃ gachāmi saugatāśrame /
S01ratnml_u:9703: Rm_24.47 [47] tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā tṛṣṇā me varddhyate punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:9705: Rm_24.48 [48] dhanyās te hi śubhātmānaḥ pariśuddhatrimaṃḍalāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:9706: saṃbuddhaśāsane sthitvā sadā dharmaṃ pibanti ye //
S01ratnml_u:9707: Rm_24.49 [49] aham api sadā tatra saṃbuddhaśāsane caran /
S01ratnml_u:9708: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ labdhum ichāmi jananī dhruvaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:9709: Rm_24.50 [50] tat pravrajyāvrataṃ dhṛtvā carituṃ saugatāśrame /
S01ratnml_u:9710: ichāmi sāṃprataṃ mātas tad anujñāṃ pradehi me //
S01ratnml_u:9711: Rm_24.51 [51] iti putrāditaṃ śrutvā matā sā prahatāśayā /

S01ratnml_u:9713: Rm_24.52 [52] kim eva vadase putra maivaṃ me purato vadaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:9714: kim arthaṃ svagṛhaṃ tyaktvā pravrajitu tvam ichasi //
S01ratnml_u:9715: Rm_24.53 [53] kiṃ te duḥkhaṃ kuto jātaṃ mayā kiṃ cin na dṛśyate /

S01ratnml_u:9717: Rm_24.54 [54] adyāpi tava tātasya śokādhiḥ śāmyate na me /

S01ratnml_u:9719: Rm_24.55 [55] iti mātroditaṃ śrutvā sa uttaraḥ kumārakaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:9722: gṛhe 'pi mahatī saṃpad asti bhogyaṃ yathechayā //
S01ratnml_u:9723: Rm_24.57 [57] anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ kṣaṇadhvaṃsi śarīrakaṃ /

S01ratnml_u:9725: Rm_24.58 [58] saṃpac cāpi sthirā naivaṃ kasya śrī sarvadā sthirā /
S01ratnml_u:9726: sarveṣām api jaṃtūnāṃ sarvatra maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:9727: Rm_24.59 [59] sarve 'pi prāṇinaḥ kāle tyaktvā sarvān parigrahān /
S01ratnml_u:9729: Rm_24.60 [60] eko 'pi vidyate naiva mṛtyuprāpte sahānugaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:10533: Rm_26.2 [2] bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /

S01ratnml_u:10547: Rm_26.9 [9] yogibhir yatibhiś cāpi nirgranthibhiś ca tāpasaiḥ /

S01ratnml_u:10551: Rm_26.11 [11] grāmyair jānapadaiś cāpi kārpaṭikais tathāparaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:10555: Rm_26.13 [13] tadā tatra pure rājā prasenajin nṛpādhipaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:10557: Rm_26.14 [14] tad dṛṣṭvā tīrthikāḥ sarve īrṣyāroṣāhatāśayāḥ /

S01ratnml_u:10563: Rm_26.17 [17] tadā sarve vayaṃ lokai niṃdyamānaḥ samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:10564: katham atra cariṣyāmas tad anyatra caremahi //
S01ratnml_u:10565: Rm_26.18 [18] iti sarvair api prokte tīrthikopāsako dvijaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:10566: sarvāns tāns tīrthikaṃ dṛṣṭvā punar evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:10567: Rm_26.19 [19] bhavaṃto ma viṣīdatvaṃ kartuṃ arhati sarvathā /
S01ratnml_u:10568: tad upāyaṃ kariṣyāmi yenānyatra carej jinaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:10569: Rm_26.20 [20] iti tāns tīrthikān sarvān bodhayitvā sa durmatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:10570: nṛpater antike gatvā sādaram evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:10571: Rm_26.21 [21] śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yad dhitaṃ te tad ucyate /
S01ratnml_u:10573: Rm_26.22 [22] yad ayaṃ muṇḍito bhikṣuḥ kuladharmavināśakṛt /
S01ratnml_u:10576: svayaṃ naṣṭaḥ parāṃś cāpi nāśayitum ihāgataḥ //
S01ratnml_u:10577: Rm_26.24 [24] tad asya darśanaṃ rājaṃ karttavyaṃ na kadā cana /
S01ratnml_u:10578: grahītavyaṃ na nāmāpi śrotavyaṃ nāpi tad vacaḥ //

S01ratnml_u:10581: Rm_26.26 [26] darśanaṃ ye prakurvanti tasya bhikṣor durātmanaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:10583: Rm_26.27 [27] ye ca śṛṇvanti tad vākyaṃ sarve te nilayaṃ gatāḥ /

S01ratnml_u:10587: Rm_26.29 [29] ye ca dānaṃ prakurvanti tatrāśirluhitāśayāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:10588: te 'pi ca narake yātā duḥkhāny evam avāpnuyuḥ //

S01ratnml_u:10591: Rm_26.31 [31] ye ca taiḥ saha tiṣṭhanti te sarve pāpasaṃgitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:10593: Rm_26.32 [32] gṛhnanti ye ca mannāma teṣāṃ geheṣu sarvadā /
S01ratnml_u:10594: lakṣmīr maiva śrayet tatra nairṛtir eva saṃśrayet //
S01ratnml_u:10595: Rm_26.33 [33] ye buddhaṃ bhajanty atra te te sarve 'py adharmiṇaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:10597: Rm_26.34 [34] iti matvā mahārāja sadā bhadraṃ yadīchasi /
S01ratnml_u:10598: satkāraṃ darśanaṃ tasya karttavyaṃ naiva ke cana //
S01ratnml_u:10599: Rm_26.35 [35] kiṃ dharmaṃ saugataṃ dharmaṃ yan mithyā parikalpitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:10600: tat tasya duryater dharmaṃ śrotavyaṃ naiva kena cit //
S01ratnml_u:10601: Rm_26.36 [36] yasya dharmo hi sarvatra vedaśāstre na gaṇyate /

S01ratnml_u:10609: Rm_26.40 [40] kim evaṃ durmate buddho dharmarājo 'pi niṃdyate /

S01ratnml_u:10611: Rm_26.41 [41] yo loke samutpannaḥ sarvakleśān vinirjayan /

S01ratnml_u:10623: Rm_26.47 [47] tataḥ sa bhagavānn eva sarvatraidhātukeṣv api /
S01ratnml_u:10624: agraḥ śreṣṭho mahāñ jeṣṭho nānyaḥ kaścid ato 'dhikaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:10625: Rm_26.48 [48] tasmād asya munīndrasya satkāraṃ śraddhayā sadā /
S01ratnml_u:10627: Rm_26.49 [49] ye buddhe śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gachaṃti durgatiṃ /

S01ratnml_u:10629: Rm_26.50 [50] śṛṇvanti ye ca tad dharmaṃ te 'pi no yānti durgatiṃ /

S01ratnml_u:10632: sadā dharmaratāḥ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yānti sukhāvatiṃ //
S01ratnml_u:10633: Rm_26.52 [52] evaṃ ye ye triratnānāṃ sarvadā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:10637: Rm_26.54 [54] tenāyaṃ bhagavānn eva jagannātho jagadguruḥ /
S01ratnml_u:10639: Rm_26.55 [55] tenāsya sadguroḥ śāstuḥ śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:10640: saddharmaṃ sarvadā śrutvā kartum arhati satkṛtiṃ //
S01ratnml_u:10641: Rm_26.56 [56] ye cāpy asya munīndrasya pratikṣipanti śāsanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:10642: sadgatiṃ naiva te yānti durgatim eva sarvadā //

S01ratnml_u:10647: Rm_26.59 [59] tena te 'pi mahāsatvās triratnopāsakā api /
S01ratnml_u:10648: śraddhayā praṇatiṃ tesāṃ karttum arhanti sarvadā //
S01ratnml_u:10649: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā tīrthikopāsakaś ca saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:10650: Rm_26.60 [60] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā tīrthikopāsakaś ca saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:10652: taṃ buddhopāsakaṃ dṛṣṭvā punar evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:10653: Rm_26.61 [61] ā kim evaṃ tvayā proktaṃ kiṃ buddho 'tāpasā 'yatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:10655: Rm_26.62 [62] tat tasya pūraṇasyāgre buddhaḥ kiṃ vaktum utsahet /

S01ratnml_u:10666: yasya nāsti dayā satve sa kim śāstā jagadguruḥ //
S01ratnml_u:10667: Rm_26.68 [68] yo dṛṣṭvā sakalān satvān kṛpayā saṃprabodhayan /

S01ratnml_u:10671: Rm_26.70 [70] nāsti buddhasamaḥ kaś cit sarvasatvahitaṃkaraḥ /

S01ratnml_u:10679: Rm_26.74 [74] ā evam ucyate ko 'tra pūraṇāt para uttamaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:10681: Rm_26.75 [75] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā saṃbuddhopāsako 'pi saḥ /

S01ratnml_u:10683: Rm_26.76 [76] buddhād anyo viśiṣṭaḥ kas traidhātubhuvaneṣv api /

S01ratnml_u:10688: sarvasvaṃ me tavādhīnaṃ dāsaś cāpi bhavāmy ahaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:10689: Rm_26.79 [79] yadi buddhād viśiṣṭo hi pūraṇo 'rhaṃ mahāmatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:10690: sarvasvaṃ te mamādhīnaṃ dāsaś cāpi bhaveḥ khalu //
S01ratnml_u:10691: Rm_26.80 [80] iti tenodite tatra saṃbuddhopāsako 'pi saḥ /

S01ratnml_u:10697: Rm_26.82 [82] gachadhvaṃ maṃtriṇaḥ sarve buddhatairthikayor api /
S01ratnml_u:10699: Rm_26.83 [83] iti rājñā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te maṃtriṇo janāḥ /

S01ratnml_u:10701: Rm_26.84 [84] bhavanto nṛpater evam ājñāṃ śrutvā samāhitāḥ /

S01ratnml_u:10715: Rm_26.91 [91] tathā devā aneke ca taddarśanakutūhalāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:10719: Rm_26.93 [93] tīrthikopāsakas tatra sa gomaye praleṣite /

S01ratnml_u:10733: Rm_26.100 [100] tad dṛṣṭvā dhikpravādaṃ ca śrutvā sa tairthiko 'patat /
S01ratnml_u:10736: bhrastaskaṃdhaḥ kare kaṇḍaṃ sthāpya tasthau vimurchitaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:10737: Rm_26.102 [2] tad dṛṣṭvā sa prasannātmā buddhopāsako mudā /

S01ratnml_u:10742: smṛtvā natvā tathā satyaṃ prārthayad evam ādarāt //

S01ratnml_u:10761: Rm_26.114 [14] tat samālokya sarve te dvijādi paurikā janāḥ /
