S01ratnml_u:11319: Rm_28.6 [6] ekasmin samaye tatra śrāvastyā bahir āśrame /
S01ratnml_u:11321: Rm_28.7 [7] tadā sa bhagavāṃs tatra bhikṣusaṃghaiḥ puraskṛtaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11323: Rm_28.8 [8] tad dharmadeśanāṃ śrotuṃ sarve lokāḥ samāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11324: devā daityāś ca nāgāś ca yakṣagaṃdharvakinnarāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11325: Rm_28.9 [9] siddhā vidyādharāś cāpi garuḍā rākṣasā api /
S01ratnml_u:11326: ṛṣayo brāhmaṇā vijñā rājānaḥ kṣatriyā api //
S01ratnml_u:11327: Rm_28.10 [10] vaiśyā rājakumārāś ca maṃtriṇaś ca mahājanāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11328: vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca gṛhasthāḥ śilpino 'pi ca //
S01ratnml_u:11329: Rm_28.11 [11] grāmyā jānapadāś cāpi kārpaṭikādayo 'pi ca /
S01ratnml_u:11330: tīrthikā api te sarve jetārāme upāgatāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11331: Rm_28.12 [12] vihāre taṃ jagannāthaṃ dṛṣṭvā sāṃjalayo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:11333: Rm_28.13 [13] tatas te muditāḥ sarve parivṛtya samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11335: Rm_28.14 [14] tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sarvāns tān samupasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:11337: Rm_28.15 [15] tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve lokāḥ prabodhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11339: Rm_28.16 [16] tasminn avasare tatra paṃcāla uttarādhipaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11341: Rm_28.17 [17] tayoḥ paṃcālayo rājño viruddhāsy abhimāninoḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11343: Rm_28.18 [18] pravarttite sadā yuddhe tayo rājño hi māninoḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11345: Rm_28.19 [19] tadā tau kṣatriyau krūrau parasparavighātinau /
S01ratnml_u:11347: Rm_28.20 [20] tad dṛṣṭvā nṛpatī rājā prasenajin sa kauśalaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11349: Rm_28.21 [21] yad etau nṛpatī vīrau nityaṃ yuddhābhikāṃkṣiṇau /
S01ratnml_u:11351: Rm_28.22 [22] sarve 'pi maṃtriṇo 'mātyāḥ sarve lokāś ca yodhinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11353: Rm_28.23 [23] evaṃ teṣāṃ sadā nityaṃ hiṃsākarmābhirāgiṇāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11354: saddharme śravaṇe vāpi gocaraṃ naiva vidyate //
S01ratnml_u:11355: Rm_28.24 [24] dharmaṃ vinātra saṃsāre kiṃ sāraṃ janma mānuṣe /
S01ratnml_u:11357: Rm_28.25 [25] dhig janma mānuṣe teṣāṃ kevalaṃ pāpasādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11359: Rm_28.26 [26] ye cātra saugataṃ dharmaṃ na śṛṇvanti kadā cana /
S01ratnml_u:11361: Rm_28.27 [27] sadā te māracaryāyāṃ sthitvā kleśābhimāninaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11363: Rm_28.28 [28] tataḥ svayaṃ paribhraṣṭā bhraṃśayantaḥ parān api /
S01ratnml_u:11367: Rm_28.30 [30] narakeṣu bhramantas te sadā duḥkhābhibhojinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11369: Rm_28.31 [31] tad eṣāṃ sarvalokānāṃ bhadrārthaṃ hitakāraṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11371: Rm_28.32 [32] yāvad etau nṛpau vīrau viruddhau nopaśāmyataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11372: tāvad atra bhuvi kvāpi maṃgalaṃ na bhavet sadā //
S01ratnml_u:11373: Rm_28.33 [33] tad etau nṛpatī tāvad bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11375: Rm_28.34 [34] etau hi kṣatriyau vīrau pāṃcālau mānagarvitau /
S01ratnml_u:11377: Rm_28.35 [35] buddha eva jagacchāstā dharmarājaḥ prabodhayan /
S01ratnml_u:11379: Rm_28.36 [36] tad atra sahasā gatvā prārthayeyaṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11380: nūnaṃ buddhānubhāvāt tau nṛpau mitratvam āpsyataḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11381: Rm_28.37 [37] iti niścitya rājā sa prasenajit samutthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11382: vihāre sahasā gatvā nanāma taṃ munīśvaraṃ //
S01ratnml_u:11383: Rm_28.38 [38] tatra sa purato gatvā sāṃjaliḥ samupāśrayan /
S01ratnml_u:11385: Rm_28.39 [39] bhagavan nātha sarvajña vijānīyād bhavān api /
S01ratnml_u:11387: Rm_28.40 [40] yad etayor viruddhe ta sarve lokā virodhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11388: tad atra sarvadā yuddhaṃ pravarttate divāniśaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:11389: Rm_28.41 [41] tat tesāṃ sarvalokānāṃ saddharme gocaraṃ kadā /
S01ratnml_u:11390: sadā yuddhābhisaktās te sādhayeyuḥ śubhaṃ kathaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:11391: Rm_28.42 [42] tad atra bhagavāñc chāstā bodhayaṃs tau narādhipau /
S01ratnml_u:11393: Rm_28.43 [43] iti saṃprārthite tena rājñā sa bhagavān muniḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11395: Rm_28.44 [44] tataḥ sa nṛpatī rājā matvā śāstrādhivāsitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11396: sāṃjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā muditaḥ svālayaṃ yayau //
S01ratnml_u:11397: Rm_28.45 [45] tataḥ sa bhagavān pātram ādāya cīvarāvṛtaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11398: bhāsayan bhadratāṃ kurvan pratasthe saha sāṃghikaiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11399: Rm_28.46 [46] evaṃ sarvatra mārgeṣu bhāsayaṃ sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11401: Rm_28.47 [47] tatra sa bhagavāṃ prāpto bhābhiḥ saṃbhāsayan kramāt /
S01ratnml_u:11403: Rm_28.48 [48] tatra sa bhagavān prātaḥ sasaṃghaḥ saugatāśrame /
S01ratnml_u:11405: Rm_28.49 [49] tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve lokāḥ pramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11409: Rm_28.51 [51] tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpatiḥ sa pramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11411: Rm_28.52 [52] tasminn avasare tatra mṛgadāve samāśritaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11415: Rm_28.54 [54] tatra sa nṛpatir vīraś caturaṃgavalaiḥ saha /
S01ratnml_u:11417: Rm_28.55 [55] tatra sa yāmyapāṃcālarājā taṃ ripum āgataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11418: niśamya sahasotthāya natvā ha taṃ munīśvaraṃ //
S01ratnml_u:11419: Rm_28.56 [56] bhagavan nātha sarvajña sa me vairā ihāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11420: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi tad anujñāṃ dadātu me //
S01ratnml_u:11421: Rm_28.57 [57] iti tena narendreṇa prārthite sa jineśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11423: Rm_28.58 [58] nṛpate mā vibheṣī tvaṃ dhairyyam ālambya tiṣṭhata /
S01ratnml_u:11424: tad upāyaṃ kariṣyāmi yenāsau te vaśe caret //
S01ratnml_u:11425: Rm_28.59 [59] ity ādiśya sa sarvajñaś caturaṅgabalānvitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11427: Rm_28.60 [60] sa sainyādhipatir vīraś caturaṅgabalaiḥ saha /
S01ratnml_u:11433: Rm_28.63 [63] tatra sa dūrato dṛṣṭvā śrīghanaṃ taṃ sabhāśritaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11435: Rm_28.64 [64] tatra sa nṛpati rājā samupetya kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11437: Rm_28.65 [65] tataś cirāt samutthāpya sa pāṃcalo narādhipaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11439: Rm_28.66 [66] tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā nṛpatiṃ taṃ samāśritaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11441: Rm_28.67 [67] tad āryasatyam ākarṇya nṛpatiḥ so 'bhibodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11443: Rm_28.68 [68] tataḥ sa nṛpatī rājā samutthāya kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11444: praṇatvā bhagavaṃtaṃ taṃ prārthayad evam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:11445: Rm_28.69 [69] bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:11446: tan me 'trānugrahaṃ kṛtvā samyag ādeṣṭum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:11447: Rm_28.70 [70] yad atra bhagavan satvāḥ pravarttanto bhavodadhau /
S01ratnml_u:11449: Rm_28.71 [71] karmaṇā kena devāḥ syur mānuṣāḥ kena karmaṇā /
S01ratnml_u:11450: daityāś ca karmaṇā kena tat samyak samupādiśa //
S01ratnml_u:11451: Rm_28.72 [72] tiryañcaḥ karmaṇā kena pretāś ca kena karmaṇā /
S01ratnml_u:11452: nārakāḥ karmaṇā kena tat sarvaṃ samupādiśa //
S01ratnml_u:11453: Rm_28.73 [73] tatrāpy anekarūpāś ca sarve bhinnāśayā api /
S01ratnml_u:11455: Rm_28.74 [74] etat sarvaṃ samākhyāya bhavāñ chāstā jagad guruḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11457: Rm_28.75 [75] iti saṃprārthite tena rājñā sa bhagavān sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11461: Rm_28.77 [77] kāyavāgmānasaṃ karmakṛtaṃ yac ca śubhāśubhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11462: lokas tasya phalaṃ bhukte karttā nānyo 'sti kasya cit //
S01ratnml_u:11463: Rm_28.78 [78] iti sarve kṛpāviṣṭās trailokye guravo jināḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11464: uktavantas tathā tad dhi karmaṇo yasya yat phalaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:11465: Rm_28.79 [79] karmaṃ kartuṃ vihātuṃ ca sadasadgatihetukaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11467: Rm_28.80 [80] saṃvaddhyānyāñ ca hi santi saṃjīvaṃ yānti te dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11469: Rm_28.81 [81!] saṃvaddhyānyāñ ca hi santi saṃjīvaṃ yānti te dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11471: saṃjīvanti yatas tatra tena saṃjīva ucyate //
S01ratnml_u:11474: Rm_28.83 [83] kālasūtreṇa saṃsūḍya pāṭyante dāruvad yataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11475: jvaladbhiḥ krakacais tatra kālasūtras tataḥ smṛtaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11476: Rm_28.84 [84] dāvādau dahanair dāhaṃ dehināṃ vidadhāti ye /
S01ratnml_u:11477: sa tīvrajvalanair jantus tapyate tapane raṭan //
S01ratnml_u:11478: Rm_28.85 [85] tīvraṃ tapanasaṃtāpaṃ tanoty eva niraṃtaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11481: saṃtāpayati cānyāṃś ca tapyate sa pratāpane //
S01ratnml_u:11482: Rm_28.87 [87] pratāpayati tatrasthān satvāns tīvreṇa vahninā /
S01ratnml_u:11485: anyāṃś ca prāṇino ghnaṃti saṃghātaṃ yānti te narāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11486: Rm_28.89 [89] saṃhatās tatra ghātyaṃte samyagvāhaiva vaṃyayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11488: Rm_28.90 [90] kāyavāgmānasaṃ tāpaṃ ye kurvantīha dehināṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11489: kaṭukyapaṭikā ye ca rauravaṃ yānti te nārāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11490: Rm_28.91 [91] tīvreṇa vahninā tatra dahyamānā niraṃtaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11491: raudraṃ ravaṃ vimuṃcanti yatas tasmāt sa rauravaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:11492: Rm_28.92 [92] devadvijaguror dravyaṃ hṛtaṃ yair duḥkhinām iha /
S01ratnml_u:11494: Rm_28.93 [93] raudratvād vahnidāhasya ravasya ca mahattayā /
S01ratnml_u:11495: rauravo hi mahāṃs tasya mantva rauravād api //
S01ratnml_u:11496: Rm_28.94 [94] kṛtvā guṇādhike tīvram apakāraṃ nihatya ca /
S01ratnml_u:11498: Rm_28.95 [95] asthīny api viśīryyante raudrāgnau tatra dehināṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11499: yato na vīciḥ saukhyasya nāvīcir udāhṛtaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11500: Rm_28.96 [96] mithodroharatā ye traṇe ghnantīva dehinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11501: pāpād asinakhās te tu jāyante duḥkhabhāginaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11502: Rm_28.97 [97] nakhā evāsayas teṣām āyasā jvalitāḥ kharāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11503: tair anyonyaṃ nikṛntanti yat tenāsinakhāḥ smṛtāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11510: Rm_28.101 [1] ayoguḍāni bhujyante prataptāni punaḥ punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11512: Rm_28.102 [2] krūraiḥ śvabhir ayodraṃṣṭraiḥ kṛtyante vivaśā bhṛśaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11513: varṣakoṭi raṭanto 'pi ye narāḥ kheṭake ratāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11514: Rm_28.103 [3] matsyādīñ jalajān hatvā jvalanty amradravodakāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11515: yāti vaitaraṇīṃ śaśvad vahninā dahyate naraḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11518: Rm_28.105 [5] pīḍā vahubhir ākāraiḥ kṛtā yair duḥkhinām iha /
S01ratnml_u:11519: pīḍyante te ciraṃ taptair yatra mudgaraparvataiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11521: Rm_28.106 [6] bhedakā dharmasetūnāṃ ye cāsan mārgavāhinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11523: kṣuradhārācitaṃ mārgaṃ gatvā krāmanti te narāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11524: Rm_28.107 [7] nakhaiḥ saṃcūrṇya yūkādīñ cūrṇyante meṣaparvatai /
S01ratnml_u:11525: bhūyo bhūyo mahākāyāḥ krandantas te śaracchataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:11526: Rm_28.108 [8] vrataṃ yas tu samāśritya saṃpanno parirakṣati /
S01ratnml_u:11528: Rm_28.109 [9] aṇunāpi hi yaḥ kaścin mithyājīvena jīvati /
S01ratnml_u:11530: Rm_28.110 [10] dṛṣṭvāpi vrīhimadhyasthān prāṇinaś cūrṇayanti ye /
S01ratnml_u:11531: āyasai mukhalais taptaiḥ kṣobhyante te punaḥ punaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11534: sarveṣām eva duḥkhānāṃ vījaṃ mṛd vābhibhedataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11535: kāyavāgmānasaṃ karma pāpaṃ yat tad aṇv api varttayet /
S01ratnml_u:11542: jāyante mukharā dhṛṣṭāś capalātmānaś ca vāyasāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11547: Rm_28.117 [6] dātāraḥ krodhanāḥ krūrā narā nāgamaharddhikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11549: Rm_28.118 [7] kṛtaṃ yat pāpakaṃ karma svayaṃ vākkāyamānasaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11550: tiryañcas tena jāyante tan manogatim ākṛthāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11554: Rm_28.120 [2] viheṭhayanti ye bālā vaṃcayanty api tṛṣṇayā /
S01ratnml_u:11557: jāyaṃte ye narāḥ pretā 'ṣṭās te galagaṇḍakāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11558: Rm_28.122 [4] dānaṃ nivārayaty eva na hi kiṃ tid dadāti yaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11560: Rm_28.123 [5] dhanaṃ rakṣati vaṃśārthe na bhuṃkte na dadāti yaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11561: dattādāyī tataḥ pretaḥ śrāddhabhoktā sa jāyate //
S01ratnml_u:11563: bhoktā viṭśleṣmavāntānāṃ pretya pretaḥ sa jāyate //
S01ratnml_u:11564: Rm_28.125 [7] apriyaṃ vakti yaḥ krodhād vākyaṃ marmavibhedataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11565: bbavanty ulkāmukhaḥ pretaḥ suciraṃ tena karmaṇā //
S01ratnml_u:11566: Rm_28.126 [8] kurute kalahaṃ yas tu niṣkṛpaḥ krūramānasaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11568: Rm_28.127 [9] grāmakūṭau dadāty eva yo janaṃ pīḍayanty api /
S01ratnml_u:11570: Rm_28.128 [10] nirdayāḥ prāṇino ghnanti bhakṣyārthaṃ ye dadanty api /
S01ratnml_u:11574: Rm_28.130 [12] krodhanāḥ piśunaḥ kiñcidarthārthaṃ yaḥ prayachati /
S01ratnml_u:11577: saṃpradānaratā nityaṃ bhūtāḥ pretya bhavanti te //
S01ratnml_u:11578: Rm_28.132 [14] krūrāḥ krūddhāḥ pradātāraḥ priyā sarvasurā ca ye /
S01ratnml_u:11579: jāyante pretya yakṣās tu krūrātmānaḥ surāpriyāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11580: Rm_28.133 [15] mātāpitṛgurūn yānair ye nayanti yathepsitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11582: Rm_28.134 [16] tṛṣṇāmātsaryadoṣeṇa pretā bhavanty amī sadā /
S01ratnml_u:11583: yakṣādayaḥ śubhaiḥ kliṣṭair atas tān parivarjayet //
S01ratnml_u:11586: jāyate hinsayā svalpām ato hiṃsāṃ vivarjayet //
S01ratnml_u:11587: Rm_28.136 [2] kuṣṭharogajvaronmādā ye cānye vyādhayo nṛṇāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11589: Rm_28.137 [3] yo na harttā parasvānāṃ na vañcavit prayachati /
S01ratnml_u:11591: Rm_28.138 [4] adattaṃ vittam ādāya dānāni ca dadāti yaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11592: sa pretya dravyavān bhūtvā bhūyo bhavati nirdhanaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11593: Rm_28.139 [5] yo na harttā na dātā ca na cātikṛpaṇo naraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11594: kṛtsnena mahatā dravyaṃ sthiraṃ sa labhate dhruvaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:11595: Rm_28.140 [6] na harttā yaḥ parasvānāṃ tyāgavān vītamatsaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11596: ahāryaṃ vipulaṃ vittam iṣṭam ca labhate naraḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11598: sukhī ca sa labhen nityaṃ yo dadātīha bhojanaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:11599: Rm_28.142 [8] salajjo rūpavān bhogī suchāyaḥ prāṇināṃ priyaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11600: sa bhaved vastralābhī ca yo vāsānsi prayachati //
S01ratnml_u:11601: Rm_28.143 [9] āvāsaṃ yo dadātīha suprasannena cetasā /
S01ratnml_u:11602: prāsādāḥ sarvakāmāś ca jāyante tasya dehinaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:11604: bhavanti sukhino nityaṃ yānāni ca labhanti te //
S01ratnml_u:11607: Rm_28.146 [12] puṣpair abhyarcitaḥ śrīmān śaraṇyaḥ sarvadehināṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11608: samṛddhitaḥ sa syād ārāmaṃ yaḥ prayachati //
S01ratnml_u:11613: Rm_28.149 [15] gavādīnn yo dadātīha bhojyaṃ rasasamanvitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11614: balavān varṇavān bhogī dīrghāyuḥ sa bhaven naraḥ //

S01ratnml_u:13388: Rm_33.88 [88] yasmin dine prajāteyaṃ kṣemaṃ bhavati sarvataḥ /

S01ratnml_u:13396: Rm_33.92 [92] tatra tasya śiśo rājā kṛtvā jātimahaṃ pitā /
S01ratnml_u:13397: sarvāñ jñātīn samāhūya pura evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:13398: Rm_33.93 [93] bhavaṃto dārakasyāsya putrasya me śubhākṛteḥ /

S01ratnml_u:13401: sarve 'py ekatra saṃgamya mithar evaṃ samabruvan //
S01ratnml_u:13402: Rm_33.95 [95] yad ayaṃ jātamātro 'pi kṣemaṃ karoti sarvataḥ /

S01ratnml_u:13408: Rm_33.98 [98] yad ayaṃ jātamātro 'pi kṣemaṃ karoti sarvataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13410: Rm_33.99 [99] etat taiḥ kathitam śrutvā brahmadattaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /

S01ratnml_u:13419: Rm_33.103 [3] tataḥ sa daharaḥ kāntaḥ kumāro ratilālitaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:13428: Rm_33.107 [7] tadā sā bhāvinī kṣemā svasakhībhiḥ samanvitā /

S01ratnml_u:13432: Rm_33.109 [9] tataḥ sa dūtam āhūya bodhayitvā prasādayan /

S01ratnml_u:13439: ratnamālāṃ tvam ādāya bhadre tasyai samarpaya //
S01ratnml_u:13440: Rm_33.113 [13] ity uktvā ratnamālāṃ tāṃ kṣemāsakhīkare rahaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13441: datvā sa dūta āmaṃtrya sahasā svapuraṃ yayau //
S01ratnml_u:13442: Rm_33.114 [14] tatra sāpi sakhī tasyāḥ kṣemāyāḥ purato gatā /

S01ratnml_u:13450: Rm_33.118 [18] are re kiṃ vadasy evaṃ svāmī me kātra vidyate /

S01ratnml_u:13452: Rm_33.119 [19] ity uktaṃ sā sakhī śrutvā kṣemāyā durituḥ prabhoḥ /

S01ratnml_u:13456: Rm_33.121 [21] tata utthāya sā kṣemā kanyāpi sahasā pituḥ /

S01ratnml_u:13458: Rm_33.122 [22] tāta kāmārthinī nāham api tu sadguṇārthinī /

S01ratnml_u:13460: Rm_33.123 [23] yad ahaṃ śāsane bauddhe pravrajitvā samāhita /

S01ratnml_u:13464: Rm_33.125 [25] ity arthitaṃ tayā putryā śrutvā sa kośalādhipaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:13468: Rm_33.127 [27] naivaṃ putri mayā kartuṃ śakyate tat kṣamasva me /
S01ratnml_u:13469: yat te janmani me rāṣṭre kṣemam evaṃ prajāyate //
S01ratnml_u:13470: Rm_33.128 [28] tadāpi tvaṃ pratijñaya brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13472: Rm_33.129 [29] tad yathā me pratijñātaṃ vacanaṃ pūrayātmaje /
S01ratnml_u:13473: mā kṛthāḥ sarvathā kṣeme pravrajyāsādhane mama //
S01ratnml_u:13474: Rm_33.130 [30] yathā mayā pratijñātaṃ kariṣye na tad anyathā /
S01ratnml_u:13475: matveti me vacaḥ śrutvā kuladharme carātmaje //
S01ratnml_u:13476: Rm_33.131 [31] evaṃ pitroditaṃ śrutvā sā kṣemā prahatāśayā /

S01ratnml_u:13480: Rm_33.133 [33] gacha sādho narendrasya brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13482: Rm_33.134 [34] yad iyaṃ me sutā kṣemā pravrajituṃ samichati /

S01ratnml_u:13488: Rm_33.137 [37] jaya eva yadarthe 'haṃ preṣito 'tra mahībhṛtā /

S01ratnml_u:13540: Rm_33.163 [63] tan māṃ bhavodadhau magnāṃ kṛpayoddhartum arhati /

S01ratnml_u:13553: Rm_33.169 [69] ity ādiśya punas tasyāḥ saṃbodhipadasādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13555: Rm_33.170 [70] tad āryyadharmam ākarṇya kṣemā paribodhitā /
S01ratnml_u:13557: Rm_33.171 [71] tataḥ sā muditā kanyā dṛṣṭasatyā prasāditā /
S01ratnml_u:13558: sāṃjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā prārthayac caivam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:13559: Rm_33.172 [72] bhagavan sarvavin nātha sadaivaṃ kṛpayā bhavān /
S01ratnml_u:13560: dṛṣṭvā māṃ saugate dharme niyojya trātum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:13561: Rm_33.173 [73] ity arthitaṃ tayā śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /

S01ratnml_u:13563: Rm_33.174 [74] tadā sā kanyakā kṣemā saṃbuddhaśaraṇaṃ gatā /

S01ratnml_u:13591: Rm_33.188 [88] kṣemaṃkaraḥ kumāro 'pi sarve 'pi brāhmaṇāś ca te /

S01ratnml_u:13593: Rm_33.189 [89] paurāś cāpi striyo 'nye 'pi dārakā dārikā api /

S01ratnml_u:13597: Rm_33.191 [91] namas te bhagini kṣeme yat te 'haṃ kāmalālasāḥ /

S01ratnml_u:13599: Rm_33.192 [92] yad evaṃ tvaṃ mahābhijñāpadaprāptā maharddhikā /

S01ratnml_u:13888: Rm_34.65 [65] anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ duḥkhaśūnyam anātmakaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13889: puṇyam eva jagatsāraṃ matvā tac cinutādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:13893: sa hitvā janma saṃsāre duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati //
S01ratnml_u:13894: Rm_34.68 [68] ity udghoṣaiḥ surān sarvāñ codayitvā samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13895: sarve te raśmayas tatra puraḥ pratyāyayur muneḥ //
S01ratnml_u:13896: Rm_34.69 [69] tatra te raśmayaḥ sarve 'py ekībhūtāś ca piṇḍitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13898: Rm_34.70 [70] tad dṛṣṭvā sabhāsīnāḥ sarve lokāḥ savismayāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13899: kiṃ śāstehādiśed dharmam ity evaṃ samacintayat //
S01ratnml_u:13901: bhagavantaṃ tam ānamya prārthayad evam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:13902: Rm_34.72 [72] nāhetupratyayaṃ śāstar hasanti sugatāḥ kvacit /
S01ratnml_u:13903: tat kim arthañ jagannātha bhavān hasati sāṃprataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:13904: Rm_34.73 [73] yad bhavataḥ smitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve ime sabhājanāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13906: Rm_34.74 [74] tad yad arthe bhavān smitaṃ muṃcati taj jagadguro /
S01ratnml_u:13908: Rm_34.75 [75] ity ānandoditaṃ śrutvā bhagavān munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13909: tam ānandaṃ sabhāṃ cāpi samālokyaivam ādiśat //
S01ratnml_u:13910: Rm_34.76 [76] evam etat tathānaṃda yathākhyātaṃ tvayā kila /
S01ratnml_u:13911: nāhetupratyayaṃ buddhā muñcaṃti hi smitaṃ kva cit //
S01ratnml_u:13912: Rm_34.77 [77] yadarthe 'ham ihānanda smitaṃ muñcāmi sāṃprataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13913: tat satyaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇuta yūyam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:13914: Rm_34.78 [78] yad ayaṃ śraddhayānanda sudhīr udyānapālakaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13917: vinipātam ayaṃ kvāpi gamiṣyati kadā cana //
S01ratnml_u:13923: Rm_34.82 [82] vimalo nāma satvānāṃ hitakarī śubhaṃkaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13926: Rm_34.83 [83] evam ānaṃda vijñāya saṃbuddhaśāsane kvacit /
S01ratnml_u:13927: kiñcid vāpi pradātavyaṃ tat phalaṃ syān mahattaraṃ //
S01ratnml_u:13928: Rm_34.84 [84] ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te sāṃghikādayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13930: Rm_34.85 [85] so 'pi cārāmikaḥ śrutvā vyākṛtaṃ sugatena tat /
S01ratnml_u:13932: Rm_34.86 [86] tac chrutvā sa mahādātā gṛhastho 'nāthapiṇḍadaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13933: sāñjalis taṃ jinaṃ natvā muditaḥ svagṛhaṃ yayau //
S01ratnml_u:13934: Rm_34.87 [87] tataḥ sa bhagavāṃc chāstā samutthāya sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13936: Rm_34.88 [88] tataḥ āramikaḥ so 'pi sarvādā saṃpramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13938: Rm_34.89 [89] iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
S01ratnml_u:13939: tvayāpy evaṃ mahārāja bhaja ratnatrayaṃ sadā //
S01ratnml_u:13940: Rm_34.90 [90] lokāś cāpi tathā rājaṃ bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13942: Rm_34.91 [91] tena te maṅgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhavet sadā /
S01ratnml_u:13944: Rm_34.92 [92] iti tenārhatādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13946: Rm_34.93 [93] āramikasyedam ihāvadānaṃ śṛṇvanti ye ye ca niśāmayanti /
S01ratnml_u:13947: te sarvam evaṃ śubhasatsukhāni bhuktvā prayaāsyanti jinālayan te //
S01ratnml_u:13951: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā prārthayec caivam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:13952: Rm_35.2 [2] bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13954: Rm_35.3 [3] iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena śrutvā so 'rhaṃ sudhīr yatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13956: Rm_35.4 [4] śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me gurubhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13958: Rm_35.5 [5] tadyathā bhagavāc chāstā śākyasiṃho munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13960: Rm_35.6 [6] saṃbuddhaḥ sa tathā tatra pure kapilavastuni /
S01ratnml_u:13962: Rm_35.7 [7] tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra pure kapilavastuni /
S01ratnml_u:13967: tayā saha samāraktaḥ sa śrīmān paricārayan //
S01ratnml_u:13968: Rm_35.10 [10] yathākāmaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā rarāma saṃpramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13971: Rm_35.11 [11] tataḥ sā samaye sūta dārakaṃ divyasuṃdaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13973: Rm_35.12 [12] tasya janmany anekāni mahāścaryakarāṇy api /
S01ratnml_u:13975: Rm_35.13 [13] tam abhiśobhitaṃ jātam śrutvā sa janako mudā /
S01ratnml_u:13977: Rm_35.14 [14] tataḥ sa mudito jñātīn āhūya saha vāṃdhavaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13978: kṛtva jātimahaṃ tasya nāmā hi khyātum abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:13979: Rm_35.15 [15] bhavanto jñātayaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvāsya lakṣaṇaṃ yathā /
S01ratnml_u:13981: Rm_35.16 [16] iti tenoditaiḥ śrutvā sarve te jñātayas tathā /
S01ratnml_u:13982: tasya nimittam ālokya taṃ śākyam evam abruvan //
S01ratnml_u:13983: Rm_35.17 [17] sādho yaj jāyate ātmābhaiḥ śobhayati puraṃ tataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13984: śobhita iti nāmāsya bhavatu prathitaṃ bhuvi //
S01ratnml_u:13985: Rm_35.18 [18] iti tai jñātibhiḥ sarve samākhyātaṃ niśamya saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13989: Rm_35.20 [20] yadā so dārakaḥ prauḍhaḥ kumāratvam avāptavān /
S01ratnml_u:13990: tadā pitrā sa vidyārthī guruhaste samarppitaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:13991: Rm_35.21 [21] tataḥ sa guruṇā śāstrā kramāl lipir aśiṣyate /
S01ratnml_u:13993: Rm_35.22 [22] tataḥ sa śobhito dhīmān sarvavidyāṃ vicaksaṇaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13995: Rm_35.23 [23] sadā sa tīrthikārāme gatvā sa tīrthikaiḥ saha /
S01ratnml_u:13997: Rm_35.24 [24] tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra nyagrodharucirāśramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13998: sa bhagavān sabhāsīno dharmam ādeṣṭum ārabhat //
S01ratnml_u:13999: Rm_35.25 [25] tadā te bhikṣavaḥ sarve bhikṣuṇyo 'pi samāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14001: Rm_35.26 [26] bodhisatvā mahāsatvās tathānye śrāvakā api /
S01ratnml_u:14002: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarve te samupācaran //
S01ratnml_u:14003: Rm_35.27 [27] tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā parivṛtya samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14006: catvāro lokapālāś ca sarve lokādhipā api //
S01ratnml_u:14009: Rm_35.30 [30] yatayo yoginaś cāpi nirgranthās tīrthikā api /
S01ratnml_u:14011: Rm_35.31 [31] rājānaḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā amātyā maṃtriṇo janāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14014: grāmyā jānapadāś cāpi tathā kārpaṭikā api //
S01ratnml_u:14015: Rm_35.33 [33] sarve te samupāgatya dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:14017: Rm_35.34 [34] sāṃjalayaḥ punar natvā parivṛtyā samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14019: Rm_35.35 [35] tataḥ sa śobhitaś cāpi tac chrutvā kauṭukānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14020: tatra tāṃ parṣadaṃ draṣṭuṃ sahasā samupācarat //
S01ratnml_u:14021: Rm_35.36 [36] tatra sa sahasopetya prādrakṣīt taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14026: dṛṣṭvā sa suprasannātmā natvā kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14028: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tāṃ sarvāṃ samupasthitān //
S01ratnml_u:14030: tadāryadharmam ākarṇya sarve te sa surādayaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:14034: tadā sa śobhitaś cāpi śrutvāryasatyam uttamaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14043: taṃ munīndraṃ jagannāthaṃ svaivaṃ prārthayan mudā //
S01ratnml_u:14044: Rm_35.46 [46] bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14046: Rm_35.47 [47] iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14048: Rm_35.48 [48] yadi tvaṃ śāsane bauddhe pravrajituṃ samichasi /
S01ratnml_u:14049: pitur ājñāṃ samāsādya prehi dāsyāmi te vrataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14050: Rm_35.49 [49] ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa śobhito mudā /
S01ratnml_u:14051: pādau tasya muner natvā sahasā niryayau tataḥ //
S01ratnml_u:14052: Rm_35.50 [50] tatra sa svagṛhe gatvā pādau natvā puraḥ sthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14053: pitror etat samākhyāya prārthayad evam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:14054: Rm_35.51 [51] tātāham adya gachāmi nyagrodharucire vane /
S01ratnml_u:14055: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ buddhaṃ paśyāmi parṣadāśritaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14056: Rm_35.52 [52] dhanyās te śrāvakāḥ sarve bhikṣavo bhadrikāśikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14058: Rm_35.53 [53] teṣām eva hi saṃsāre sāphalyaṃ janma mānuṣe /
S01ratnml_u:14059: ye bhajanti munīndrasya śāsane śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:14060: Rm_35.54 [54] teṣāṃ caivaṃ susāraṃ syān saṃsāre bhavacāraṇe /
S01ratnml_u:14061: ye saddharmaṃ munīndrasya śrutvā caraṃti saṃvaraṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14062: Rm_35.55 [55] teṣāṃ cāpi bhave sāraṃ janmadravyaguṇārjanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14063: satkāraiḥ sāṃghike sevāṃ kṛtvā caranti ye vrataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14064: Rm_35.56 [56] kiṃ teṣāṃ mānuṣe janma nisphalaṃ sarvasādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14065: ye dhyātvāpi jinaṃ smṛtvā bhajaṃti na kadā cana //
S01ratnml_u:14066: Rm_35.57 [57] teṣāṃ ca kiṃ bhave janma kevalaṃ pāpasādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14067: ye na śṛṇvaṃti saddharmaṃ saṃbuddhabhāṣitaṃ kva cit //
S01ratnml_u:14068: Rm_35.58 [58] teṣāṃ ca nisphalaṃ janma mānuṣye duḥkhasādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14069: ye na kurvanti satkāraṃ sāṃghikeṣu kadā cana //
S01ratnml_u:14070: Rm_35.59 [59] evaṃ ye paśuvad gehe bhogyaṃ bhuktvā vasaṃti vai /
S01ratnml_u:14071: teṣāṃ kiṃ janma saṃsāre pāpaduḥkhārtham eva hi //
S01ratnml_u:14072: Rm_35.60 [60] evaṃ te prāṇinaḥ sarve bhramaṃti bhavasāgare /
S01ratnml_u:14073: yato yair dṛśyate kvāpi triratnaṃ na kadā cana //
S01ratnml_u:14074: Rm_35.61 [61] tathāsmākam api cātra saṃsāre janma nisphalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14076: Rm_35.62 [62] dharmārthajanmasaṃsāre yadi dharmo na labhyate /
S01ratnml_u:14078: Rm_35.63 [63] tad varaṃ mṛtyur adyevaṃ vinā dhārmārthasādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14080: Rm_35.64 [64] na prāptaṃ bhagavatpūjā mahotsāhaṃ kadāpi yaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14081: dharmo 'pi na śrutaḥ kaścin na kārāḥ sāṃghike kṛtāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:14082: Rm_35.65 [65] bhītebhyo nābhayaṃ dattaṃ daridrāśā na pūritā /
S01ratnml_u:14083: duḥkhāya kevalaṃ mātur gatās te garbhaśalyatāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14084: Rm_35.66 [66] dhanyās te sukhino loke subhadrāḥ śubhabhāvinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14086: Rm_35.67 [67] ye buddhe śaraṇaṃ gatvā dhyātvā smṛtvā samāhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14088: Rm_35.68 [68] sarve satvahitārthaṃ ca dānaṃ datvā yathepsitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14104: Rm_35.76 [76] te eva sugatiṃ yāṃti yāṃti cānte jinālaye /
S01ratnml_u:14105: saṃbodhiṃ ca samāsādya bhaveyuḥ sugatā api //
S01ratnml_u:14106: Rm_35.77 [77] iti satyaṃ munīndreṇa samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya me /
S01ratnml_u:14110: Rm_35.79 [79] kiṃ ca me janmakāle yad idaṃ yuḥ śobhitāruṣā /
S01ratnml_u:14112: Rm_35.80 [80] tat sarvaṃ me purā bhadrakarmadharmavipākataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14113: saṃpadyate 'dhunā nūnaṃ viddhi mā tv anyathā pita //
S01ratnml_u:14114: Rm_35.81 [81] etan nūnam iti matvā bhūyo 'pi me manas tathā /
S01ratnml_u:14116: Rm_35.82 [82] etad dhetor ahaṃ tāta prārthayāmy evam ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:14117: tad anujñāṃ pradattaṃ me yadi vāṃchāsti vā śubhe //
S01ratnml_u:14119: gatvā divyasukhāny eva bhuktvā ciraṃ nivatsyatha //
S01ratnml_u:14120: Rm_35.84 [84] tataḥ kāle divaś cyutvā martyaloka ihāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14124: Rm_35.86 [86] tatas tat puṇyapākena saṃghānāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14126: Rm_35.87 [87] tatas tat puṇyapākena bodhicittam avāpsyatha /
S01ratnml_u:14128: Rm_35.88 [88] tataḥ pāramitāḥ sarvāḥ pūrayitvā yathākramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14132: Rm_35.90 [90] anityaṃ khalu samṣāraṃ jīvitaṃ kṣaṇabhaṃguraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14134: Rm_35.91 [91] saṃpado 'pi sthirā naiva satkṣaṇaṃ ca sudurlabhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14135: mānuṣye sarvadā janma labhyate na sudurllabhaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14136: Rm_35.92 [92] tatrāpi durlabhā dharme matir jātāpi na sthirāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14137: dharmaṃ tu saugataiḥ śreṣṭhaṃ yat saṃbodhipadasādhanaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14138: Rm_35.93 [93] tat saṃbodhipadaprāptyai dharmaṃ ichāmi saugataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14139: tad anujñāṃ pradatvā me mano harṣayata drutaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14140: Rm_35.94 [94] dharmaṃ vinātra kiṃ sāraṃ bhogyair arthair guṇair api /
S01ratnml_u:14141: kiṃ kāmasukhaṃ bhuktvā sthitvā ca paśuvad gṛhe //
S01ratnml_u:14142: Rm_35.95 [95] tad anujñāṃ na datyaśyen sthāsyāmi na gṛhe 'py ahaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14144: Rm_35.96 [96] tatra ko nirjane sthitvā caritvā duṣkaraṃ tapaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14146: Rm_35.97 [97] kasya mṛtyu bhave nāsti kutra mṛtyor bhayaṃ na hi /
S01ratnml_u:14147: sarvalokān grasen mṛtyur eko 'pi sa mahāvaliḥ //
S01ratnml_u:14148: Rm_35.98 [98] tad atra kiṃ viṣādena yad damopāyam atra na /
S01ratnml_u:14149: avaśyaṃ bhāvino bhāvā bhavanti mahatām api //
S01ratnml_u:14150: Rm_35.99 [99] mṛtyukāle sahāyo 'pi ko 'pi nāsti sahānugaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14151: dharma eva tadaiko hi sahāyaḥ syāt sahānugaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:14152: Rm_35.100 [100] evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre sthātuṃ nechanti sajjanāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14154: Rm_35.101 [1] tathāham api tan mṛtyubhayaṃ dṛṣṭvābhiśaṃkitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14156: Rm_35.102 [2] iti dharme nidheddhaṃ mā kiṃ cid vā vaktum arhatha /
S01ratnml_u:14158: Rm_35.103 [3] iti tenātmajenaivaṃ saṃprārthitaṃ niśamya tau /
S01ratnml_u:14160: Rm_35.104 [4] tatas tau dhairyam ālambya tam eva svātmajaṃ cirāt /
S01ratnml_u:14162: Rm_35.105 [5] tataḥ sa janakaḥ śākyas taduktaparibodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14163: galadaśrumukho dṛṣṭvā taṃ putram evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:14164: Rm_35.106 [6] hā putra kiṃ atrāhaṃ vadeya sāṃprataṃ khalu /
S01ratnml_u:14165: yat tvam eva sudhīr vijñaḥ paṇḍito 'si vicakṣaṇaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:14166: Rm_35.107 [7] yat tvaṃ śāsane bauddhe pravrajituṃ samichasi /
S01ratnml_u:14167: tac chāstuḥ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ cara samāhitaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:14168: Rm_35.108 [8] iti pitroditaṃ śrutvā sa sobhitaḥ pramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14169: pitroḥ pādān praṇatvaiva sahasā niryayau gṛhāt //
S01ratnml_u:14170: Rm_35.109 [9] tataḥ sa sahasā gatvā nyagrodhatarumaṇḍite /
S01ratnml_u:14172: Rm_35.110 [10] yatra sa purato gatvā kṛtāṃjalipuṭo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:14173: praṇatvā taṃ jagannāthaṃ prārthayad evam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:14174: Rm_35.111 [11] bhagavan nātha sarvajña prāpyānujñāṃ samāvraje /
S01ratnml_u:14175: tad bhavān sāṃprataṃ mahyaṃ pravrajyāṃ dātum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:14176: Rm_35.112 [12] bhavatāṃ śaraṇe sthitvā pravrajya saugataṃvrataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14178: Rm_35.113 [13] iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14179: savyena pāṇinā tasya śiraḥ spṛṣṭvaivam ādiśat //
S01ratnml_u:14180: Rm_35.114 [14] ehi ca vatsa samādhāya vrataṃ carasva saugataṃ /

S01ratnml_u:14468: Rm_36.31 [30] iti saṃprārthite tena sā muktā saṃpradānikā /
S01ratnml_u:14469: tāṃ pradātuṃ samichantī taṃ vipram evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:14470: Rm_36.32 [31] sādhu vipra kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭha mā vrajasvānyataḥ kvacit /
S01ratnml_u:14471: pitror ājñāṃ samāyācya dāsyāmi te imām api //
S01ratnml_u:14472: Rm_36.33 [32] ity uktvā sa samāśvāsya brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ pralobhitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14473: sahasā purato gatvā pitror evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:14474: Rm_36.34 [33] pitar amba gṛhe 'smākaṃ brāhmaṇo 'rthī samāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14476: Rm_36.35 [34] tad imāṃ dātum ichāmi tasmai viprāya sādhave /
S01ratnml_u:14477: tad anujñāṃ pradattaṃ me yady asti vāṃ dayām api //
S01ratnml_u:14478: Rm_36.36 [35] iti putryoditaṃ śrutvā sa pitā vismayāhataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14479: tāṃ putrīṃ suciraṃ dṛṣṭvā paribhāṣyaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:14480: Rm_36.37 [36] bho vatsa kiṃ samīkṣyaivaṃ svamastaka samudbhavāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14481: netravat katham utkṛtya pradadyād arthine sute //
S01ratnml_u:14482: Rm_36.38 [37] yadi dātuṃ samichā te brāhmaṇāyārthine sute /
S01ratnml_u:14484: Rm_36.39 [38] iti pitroditaṃ śrutvā sā muktā duhitā sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14485: janakaṃ taṃ samālokya praṇatvā caivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:14486: Rm_36.40 [39] śṛṇu tāta yad arthe 'haṃ svaśiraḥsaṃbhavām api /
S01ratnml_u:14488: Rm_36.41 [40] anityaṃ khalu saṃsāre mānuṣye janma durlabhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14489: kṣaṇadhvaṃsi śarīraṃ ca jīvitaṃ ca tṛṇāmbuvat //
S01ratnml_u:14490: Rm_36.42 [41] tatrāpi bahavo rogāḥ saṃpado 'py aticaṃcalaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14491: durlabhā kṣaṇasaṃpac ca dharmamatiś ca durlabhā //
S01ratnml_u:14492: Rm_36.43 [42] kiṃ nityam atra saṃsāre ko hi nityasthito bhave /
S01ratnml_u:14493: ity anityām imāṃ muktāmālāṃ ditsāmy ahaṃ pita //
S01ratnml_u:14494: Rm_36.44 [43] ko 'nyatra mānuṣā dehād dānaṃ kartuṃ praśaknuyāt /
S01ratnml_u:14495: ity āpy ahaṃ samīkṣyātra dātum iche kajām api //
S01ratnml_u:14496: Rm_36.45 [44] kasyātra vigrahe mṛtyor viśvāsaṃ vidyate khalu /
S01ratnml_u:14498: Rm_36.46 [45] kasyātra jīvitaṃ kāye svechayā samavasthitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14499: evaṃ vijñāya tātemaṃ mālāṃ ditsāmi puṣpavat //
S01ratnml_u:14500: Rm_36.47 [46] ko nātra pīḍyate rogaiḥ sakleśair devasaṃbhavaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14501: ity evaṃ samīkṣyaimāṃ dātum ichāmi muktikāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14502: Rm_36.48 [47] kasya saṃpat sthirā gehe astāś capi sthitir na hi /
S01ratnml_u:14504: Rm_36.49 [48] kasya cātra śubhe dṛṣṭir jāyāt tiṣṭhec ca sarvadā /
S01ratnml_u:14505: evaṃ vāpi parijñāya ditsāmīmāṃ kajām api //
S01ratnml_u:14506: Rm_36.50 [49] sadā na jāyate naivaṃ dharme matiḥ kathaṃ cana /
S01ratnml_u:14507: iti dṛṣṭvāpi me cittam imāṃ ditsati puṣpavat //
S01ratnml_u:14508: Rm_36.51 [50] imāṃ me daivasaṃjātāṃ śiraḥsthāṃ keśasādṛśīṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14510: Rm_36.52 [51] kiyat kālaṃ ca jīveyaṃ sarveṣāṃ maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14512: Rm_36.53 [52] yad iyaṃ me śirojāpi prāṇena saha nakṣyati /
S01ratnml_u:14513: tad dattā vāpy adattāpi sarvathāpi vinakṣyati //
S01ratnml_u:14514: Rm_36.54 [53] etad devaṃ samīkṣye māṃ muktāṃ puṣpasrajaṃ yathā /
S01ratnml_u:14515: kajām api samuddhṛtya dātum ichāmy ahaṃ pita //
S01ratnml_u:14516: Rm_36.55 [54] tad atra mā kṛthā vighnaṃ mama saddharmasādhane /
S01ratnml_u:14517: tad anujñāṃ pradatvā me prārthitaṃ saphalaṃ kuru //
S01ratnml_u:14518: Rm_36.56 [55] yadi na dīyate 'nujñāṃ dānavighnaphalaṃ lābheḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14519: tato te duṣkṛtir jāyāt tato hi durgatiṃ vrajeḥ //
S01ratnml_u:14520: Rm_36.57 [56] yady anujñāṃ pradānena satyaṃ pūrayase mama /
S01ratnml_u:14521: tatas te sukṛtir jāyāt tena yāyād dhi sadgatiṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14522: Rm_36.58 [57] sadgatau sarvadā saukhyaṃ bhuktvā careḥ śubheṣv api /
S01ratnml_u:14523: tataḥ krameṇa saṃbodhiṃ prāpya buddhatvam āpnuyāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:14524: Rm_36.59 [58] evaṃ vījñāya tātātra vārayituṃ na me 'rhati /
S01ratnml_u:14525: tad anujñapya me satyaṃ saṃpūrayitum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:14526: Rm_36.60 [59] iti putryā tayākhyātaṃ śrutvā pitā sa bodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14527: tāṃ muktāṃ sumātiḥ putrīṃ samālokyaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:14528: yat tvayaivaṃ samākhyātaṃ tat sarvaṃ satyam eva hi /
S01ratnml_u:14529: Rm_36.61 [60] yat tvayaivaṃ samākhyātaṃ tat sarvaṃ satyam eva hi /
S01ratnml_u:14531: yadi śraddhāsti te dātuṃ pradehi kiṃ nivāraye //
S01ratnml_u:14532: Rm_36.62 [61] iti pitrābhyanujñāte sā muktā parimoditā /
S01ratnml_u:14533: tāṃ śiraḥsadbhavāṃ muktāṃ mālām utkartum aichata //
S01ratnml_u:14534: Rm_36.63 [62] tadā sā jananī dṛṣṭvā tāṃ muktāṃ svātmajāṃ priyāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14535: śirojām api tāṃ muktāṃ mālām utkartu vāṃchinīṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14536: Rm_36.64 [63] sahasā gāḍham āliṃgya vārayituṃ samudyatā /
S01ratnml_u:14538: Rm_36.65 [64] hā priye svātmaje putrī katham ajñāsi sāṃprataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14540: Rm_36.66 [65] yac chirojāṃ samutkṛtya muktāmālāṃ svadaivajāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14541: kim anyad iha paśyanti viprāya dātum ichasi //
S01ratnml_u:14542: Rm_36.67 [66] yadi dāne 'tivāṃchā te pradehi tad yad ipsitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14543: imām eva śirojatāṃ mā dāḥ kasmai cid arthine //
S01ratnml_u:14544: Rm_36.68 [67] dam iyaṃ svatanūdbhūtā sahajā jīvitendraiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14545: tad iyaṃ katham utkṛtya dātavyeti vicāraya //
S01ratnml_u:14547: tadeyaṃ nakṣyate nūnaṃ jīvitena saha dhruvaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14548: Rm_36.70 [69] vinaṣṭe jīvite kāye ko dharmaṃ sādhayet punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14550: Rm_36.71 [70] dharmamūlaṃ hi saṃsāre satkāyajīvitaṃ kila /
S01ratnml_u:14556: Rm_36.74 [73] yat svajīve na pakṣyaivaṃ kim arthe dātum ichasi /
S01ratnml_u:14558: Rm_36.75 [74] svakāyajīvitaṃ tyaktvā kim arthe puṇyasādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14560: Rm_36.76 [75] iti satyaṃ mayākhyātaṃ hitārthaṃ te priyātmaje /
S01ratnml_u:14561: śrutvemaṃ netravad rakṣyā mā dāḥ kasmai cid arthine //
S01ratnml_u:14562: Rm_36.77 [76] yadi te 'sti vṛṣe vāṃchā datveto 'nyad yathepsitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14563: gṛhe vrataṃ caraty evaṃ sukhena puṇyam arjaya //
S01ratnml_u:14564: Rm_36.78 [77] etatpuṇyavipākena sarvatra te śubhaṃ bhavet /
S01ratnml_u:14565: sarvadā durgatiṃ naiva yāyāt sadā tu sadgatiṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14566: Rm_36.79 [78] evaṃ matvātmaje śrutvā saddharmaṃ saugatoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14567: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā gṛhe vrataṃ sukhaṃ cara //
S01ratnml_u:14570: Rm_36.81 [80] iti mātrā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā muktātmajāpi sā /
S01ratnml_u:14575: tam eva śrīghanaṃ smṛtvā tasthau niścaritāśayāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:14576: Rm_36.84 [83] tām evāṃ saṃsthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14577: svapna iva samābhāṣya muktām evaṃ vyabodhayat //
S01ratnml_u:14578: Rm_36.85 [84] vatse mātra viṣīda tvaṃ pradeyeyaṃ kajāpi te /
S01ratnml_u:14580: Rm_36.86 [85] iti saṃbhāṣitaṃ śrutvā svapne iva samutthitā /
S01ratnml_u:14582: Rm_36.87 [86] tataḥ sā taṃ jagannāthaṃ smṛtvā taccintayākulā /
S01ratnml_u:14583: kim etat satyam evaṃ syād iti jñātuṃ samaichata //
S01ratnml_u:14584: Rm_36.88 [87] tataḥ sā svayam uddhṛtya svaśiraḥsthāṃ svapāṇinā /
S01ratnml_u:14588: Rm_36.90 [89] tāṃ samālokya sā muktā kanyātivismayānvitā /
S01ratnml_u:14589: sahasā purato gatvā mātur evaṃ nyavedayat //
S01ratnml_u:14591: yathā mayā pratijñātaṃ pūryyeta me tathā dhruvaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14592: Rm_36.92 [91] ity uktvā sā mudā muktā samuddhṛtāṃ śiroruhāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14593: ye ubhe darśayitvāgre mātur evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:14594: Rm_36.93 [92] mātar ahaṃ vipannāśā śayyā talasamāśritā /
S01ratnml_u:14596: Rm_36.94 [93] yadā me dhyānasuptāyā hṛdi nidropasarpate /
S01ratnml_u:14598: Rm_36.95 [94] pradeyeyaṃ śirojātā muktāmālā tvayā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:14600: Rm_36.96 [95] iti śrutvā prabuddhāhaṃ kim etat sūnṛtaṃ bhavet /
S01ratnml_u:14604: Rm_36.98 [97] ity uktvā sā sutā muktā tasyā mātuḥ puro mudā /
S01ratnml_u:14605: muktāṃ mālāṃ upasthāpya darśayanty evam āha ca //
S01ratnml_u:14606: Rm_36.99 [98] imāṃ mātur jagacchāstre mudā saṃkalpayāmy ahaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14607: tad enāṃ trijagacchāstre saṃpradātuṃ vrajeya hi //
S01ratnml_u:14608: Rm_36.100 [99] iti putryā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sā jananī mudā /
S01ratnml_u:14609: tāṃ muktāsrajam ālokya tac chirojāṃ ca harṣitā //
S01ratnml_u:14610: Rm_36.101 [100] muhur muhuḥ samīkṣantī tāṃ sutām evam abravīt /
S01ratnml_u:14611: dhanyāsi bhadrikā putri tvayā yathā samīhitaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14612: Rm_36.102 [1] tathā te siddhyate nūnaṃ saṃbuddhasyānubhāvātaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14613: tad imāṃ tvaṃ samādāyā yathā saṃkalpitaṃ tvayā //
S01ratnml_u:14614: Rm_36.103 [2] tathā tasmai munīndrāya prābhyarcya dātum arhasi /
S01ratnml_u:14615: tathā te 'ṅgīkṛtaṃ putri tat satyaṃ setsyate dhruvaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14616: Rm_36.104 [3] etatpuṇyānubhāvaiś ca sarvadā sadgatiṃ vrajeḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14618: Rm_36.105 [4] tathā cāsmai dvijāyaivam ādāya dātum arhati /
S01ratnml_u:14619: tathā te 'ṅgī kṛte siddhe sarvatra maṃgalaṃ bhavet //
S01ratnml_u:14620: Rm_36.106 [5] tathā cāsmai dvijāyaivam ādāya dātum arhati /
S01ratnml_u:14621: tathā te 'ṅgī kṛte siddhe sarvatra maṃgalaṃ bhavet //
S01ratnml_u:14622: saphalaṃ mānuṣe janma sadā ca sadgatau sthitiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:14624: sā tatheti pratiśrutya tathā kartuṃ samaichata //
S01ratnml_u:14625: Rm_36.108 [7] tathā saitatpravṛttāṃtaṃ bharttur agre nyavedayat /
S01ratnml_u:14627: Rm_36.109 [8] tasminn avasare tatra śrāvastyāṃ jetakāśrame /
S01ratnml_u:14629: Rm_36.110 [9] tatra sa trijagacchāstā bodhicaryāṃ prakāśayan /
S01ratnml_u:14631: Rm_36.111 [10] tadā te bhikṣavaḥ sarve śrāvakāś cailakādayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14633: Rm_36.112 [11] upāsakagaṇāś cāpi tathā copāsikā api /
S01ratnml_u:14635: Rm_36.113 [11!] tathā śakrādayo devā brahmādyā brahmacāriṇaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14638: yatayo yoginaś cāpi nirgranthās tīrthikā api //
S01ratnml_u:14639: Rm_36.115 [] ṛṣayo brāhmaṇāś cāpi tapaśvino maharddhikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14641: Rm_36.116 [24] śreṣṭhino maṃtriṇo 'mātyā gṛhasthāś ca mahājanāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14642: vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca paurikāḥ śilpino 'pi ca //
S01ratnml_u:14644: sarve te samupāgatya dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā //
S01ratnml_u:14647: Rm_36.119 [17] tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14648: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:14650: Rm_36.120 [18] tat saddharmaṃ samākarṇya sarve lokāḥ [prabodhikāh] prabodhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14652: Rm_36.121 [19] tadā sā kanyakā muktā sakhībhiḥ saha moditā[ḥ] /
S01ratnml_u:14654: Rm_36.122 [20] tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā natvā sā sāṃjalir mudā /
S01ratnml_u:14656: Rm_36.123 [21] tatrāgre tām upasthapya muktāmālāṃ kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14657: pādau natvā prasannāsyā dharmaṃ śrotum upāśrayat //
S01ratnml_u:14658: Rm_36.124 [22] tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasyā dṛṣṭvāśayaṃ viśuddhitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14660: Rm_36.125 [23] tat saddharmaṃ samākarṇya sā muktā paribodhitā /
S01ratnml_u:14662: Rm_36.126 [24] tatra sā kanyakā muktā satkāyadṛṣṭiparvataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14664: Rm_36.127 [25] tataḥ sā bhadrikā muktā dṛṣṭasatyā pramoditā /
S01ratnml_u:14665: sāṃjaliś caraṇau śāstur natvā svagṛham āyayau //
S01ratnml_u:14666: Rm_36.128 [26] tataḥ sā ca samādāya muktāmālaṃ svamūrddhajaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14668: Rm_36.129 [27] tāṃ muktāsrajam ādāya brāhmaṇaḥ saṃpramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14670: Rm_36.130 [28] tathā sā muditā gatvā sarvārthibhyo yathepsitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14672: Rm_36.131 [29] tadā tasyā guṇāñ chrutvā bahavaḥ kāmarāgiṇaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14674: Rm_36.132 [30] kumārā bhurbhujā tasyāḥ pitaraṃ puṣyam ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:14676: Rm_36.133 [31] tathā dvijakumārāś ca maṃtriputrāś ca kāminaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14678: Rm_36.134 [32] sārthavāhasutāś cāpi tathā śilpisutā api /
S01ratnml_u:14680: Rm_36.135 [33] sarve te tāṃ subhadrāṃgīṃ muktāṃ muktābhyalaṃkṛtāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14682: Rm_36.136 [34] savastrālaṃkāraratnāni datva dūtaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak /
S01ratnml_u:14683: tasyās taṃ janakaṃ puṣyaṃ prārthayann evam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:14684: Rm_36.137 [35] tathā taiḥ prārthyamāno 'sau puṣyo dūtaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak /
S01ratnml_u:14685: tad dattaṃ prābhṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasthau taṃ kṣubhitāśayaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:14686: Rm_36.138 [36] tata utthāya puṣyaḥ sa śokāgāre viṣaṇṇadhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14688: Rm_36.139 [37] hāre duḥkhaṃ prajātaṃ me kiṃ kariṣyāmi sāṃprataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14689: ekaiva duhitā me 'sti yācakā bahavo 'pi me //
S01ratnml_u:14690: Rm_36.140 [38] yady ekasmai pradāsyāmi sarve 'nye syur mama dviṣaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14691: atrāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi yad upāyaṃ na manyate //
S01ratnml_u:14692: Rm_36.141 [39!] yady ekasmai pradāsyāmi sarve 'nye syur mama dviṣaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14693: atrāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi yad upāyaṃ na manyate //
S01ratnml_u:14695: Rm_36.142 [40] tatraivaṃ saṃsthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā janakaṃ taṃ samohitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14697: Rm_36.143 [41] tāta kiṃ te mano duḥkhaṃ yad evaṃ tiṣṭhase 'dhumā /
S01ratnml_u:14699: Rm_36.144 [42] iti saṃprārthite putryā tayā sa janakaḥ sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14700: taṃ muktāṃ svātmajaṃ dṛṣṭvā sucirād evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:14701: Rm_36.145 [43] ayi putri subhadrāṃgī kim atrāhaṃ vadeya hi /
S01ratnml_u:14702: yat tvam ekā sutā me 'sti yācakā bahavās tava //
S01ratnml_u:14703: Rm_36.146 [44] yady ekasmai pradāsyāmi tvām ekaṃ divyasuṃdarīṃ /
S01ratnml_u:14704: te sarve 'nye bhaveyur me śatravo hy apakāriṇaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:14705: Rm_36.147 [45] iti cintāvidagdhātmā tiṣṭhāmy evaṃ hi nānyathā /
S01ratnml_u:14706: tad upāyaṃ na paśyāmi yato me jāyate bhayaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14707: Rm_36.148 [46] iti pitroditaṃ śrutvā sā muktā duhitā punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:14708: janakaṃ taṃ samālokya bodhayanty evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:14709: Rm_36.149 [47] nāhaṃ kāmārthinī tāta saṃbuddhaśāsane gatā /
S01ratnml_u:14710: pravrajya saṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā cariṣyāmi śubhāṃ cariṃ //
S01ratnml_u:14711: Rm_36.150 [48] iti me niścitaṃ cittam anyathā na karomi hi /
