S01ratnml_u:15482: Rm_37.274 [24] bhagavan nātha sarvajña vijānīte bhavān api /
S01ratnml_u:15483: yad iyaṃ dhīmatī sādhvī bhagavaccharaṇam āgatā //
S01ratnml_u:15484: Rm_37.275 [25] yad iyaṃ sāṃprataṃ śāstur upadeśād yathāvidhi /
S01ratnml_u:15486: Rm_37.276 [26] tad atra samupāgatya kṛpayāsmai dayānidhe /
S01ratnml_u:15488: Rm_37.277 [27] iti saṃprārthya sā śāntamatis taṃ trijagadguruṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15490: Rm_37.278 [28] prakṣiptāni tayā tāni sāmbulājākṣatāṇy api /
S01ratnml_u:15492: Rm_37.279 [29] tatas tāni pragacchanti vihāyasā vihaṅgavat /
S01ratnml_u:15494: Rm_37.280 [30] tatrasthasya munīndrasya murddhā pari vihāyasi /
S01ratnml_u:15496: Rm_37.281 [31] tad dṛṣṭvā bhikṣavaḥ sarve sāṃghikās te savismayāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15498: Rm_37.282 [32] tatrānandaḥ samutthāya sāṃjaliḥ purato gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15500: Rm_37.283 [33] bhagavan kuta etāni sāmbulājākṣatāny api /
S01ratnml_u:15502: Rm_37.284 [34] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā bhagavāṃ sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15504: Rm_37.285 [35] yaḥ kāśīpure vipro viṣṇudāso daridritaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15506: Rm_37.286 [36] tayor bhārya ubhe sādhvau śāntamatī ramopamā /
S01ratnml_u:15508: Rm_37.287 [37] tābhyāṃ śrīvasudhārāyā vrataṃ caritum ichyate /
S01ratnml_u:15509: tad idaṃ nimaṃtraṇārthaṃ me upahāraṃ samāgataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:15510: Rm_37.288 [38] tasmāc chrīvasudhārāyā vratavidhiṃ tvam ātmanā /
S01ratnml_u:15511: upadeṣṭuṃ tayor gehe kāśyāṃ gaṃtuṃ samarhasi //
S01ratnml_u:15512: Rm_37.289 [39] ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvānaṃdas tatheti saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15513: śāstur ājñāṃ śirodhṛtvā kāśyāṃ vihāyasā yayau //
S01ratnml_u:15514: Rm_37.290 [40] tatrākāśān sa ānaṃdaḥ śāṃtamater gṛhe puraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15516: Rm_37.291 [41] tatrasthaṃ taṃ samālokya śāntamatiḥ sa dhīmatī /
S01ratnml_u:15518: Rm_37.292 [42] tatra sā samupāsṛtya śāṃtamatiḥ sadhīmatī/
S01ratnml_u:15519: tam ānaṃdaṃ samālokya natvaivaṃ prārthayan mudā //
S01ratnml_u:15520: Rm_37.293 [43] bhadanta caraṇau vaṃde bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā /
S01ratnml_u:15522: yad asmākaṃ bhavāñ chāstā tad gṛhe samupāśrayan /
S01ratnml_u:15523: Rm_37.294 [44] yad asmākaṃ bhavāñ chāstā tad gṛhe samupāśrayan /
S01ratnml_u:15526: Rm_37.295 [45] yad iyaṃ dhīmatī bhadrā bhavatām upadeśataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15528: Rm_37.296 [46] tad asyai śrīmahādevyā vratavidhiṃ yathākramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15530: Rm_37.297 [47] iti saṃprārthitaṃ śāntamatyā tayā niśamya saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15531: ānaṃdas te ubhe dṛṣṭvā tatheti pratyabhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:15532: Rm_37.298 [48] tataḥ sā dhīmatī natvā sāṃjalis taṃ jinātmajaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15536: Rm_37.300 [50] tad bhavān kṛpayā śāstar gṛhe me samupāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15537: yathāvidhi samādiśya vrataṃ me dātum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:15538: Rm_37.301 [51] tayaivaṃ prārthitaṃ śrutvā sa ānaṃdo jinātmajaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15539: tatra utthāya dhīmatyās tasyā gṛhe upācarat //
S01ratnml_u:15540: Rm_37.302 [52] tatra sā dhīmatī sādhvī śāntamatyā samanvitā /
S01ratnml_u:15542: Rm_37.303 [53] tataḥ sā dhīmatī tasya śāstuḥ śuddhāmbunā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:15546: Rm_37.305 [55] tayeti prārthitaṃ śrutvā sa ānaṃdaḥ prasannadhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15547: tad dattāsana āśritya tasthau dhyātvā prabhāsayan //
S01ratnml_u:15548: Rm_37.306 [56] taṃ dṛṣṭvā brāhmaṇaḥ so 'pi viṣṇudāsaḥ prasāditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15550: Rm_37.307 [57] tataḥ sā dhīmatī sādhvī sāṃtamatīsamanvitā /
S01ratnml_u:15552: Rm_37.308 [58] tataḥ sā praṇatiṃ kṛtvā nīcāsanasamāśritā /
S01ratnml_u:15553: tam ānaṃdaṃ mahābhijñaṃ sāṃjalir evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:15554: Rm_37.309 [59] bhadanta bhavatām ājñāṃ dhṛtvāhaṃ śirasā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:15556: Rm_37.310 [60] tad bhadanta bhavāñ chāstā tad vidhiṃ me yathākramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15558: Rm_37.311 [61] iti saṃprārthite tena viṣṇudāsena saddhiyā /
S01ratnml_u:15559: śrutvānaṃdaḥ sa saṃpaśyans taṃ dvijam evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:15560: Rm_37.312 [62] śṛṇu vipra munīndreṇa yāthādiṣṭaṃ mayā śrutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15561: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrīvratasya vidhiṃ kramāt //
S01ratnml_u:15562: Rm_37.313 [63] bhādrapade 'śite pakṣe tṛtīyāyāṃ tithau tathā /
S01ratnml_u:15563: māghe vāpi śite pakṣe śuklapakṣe 'pi vā sadā //
S01ratnml_u:15564: Rm_37.314 [64] tīrthe devālaye śuddhabhūpradeśe gṛheṣu vā /
S01ratnml_u:15566: Rm_37.315 [65] prātar utthāya tīrtheṣu snātvā śucisamācaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15572: Rm_37.317 [67] subhūmau maṇḍalaṃ samyag varttayitvā yathāvidhi /
S01ratnml_u:15574: Rm_37.318 [68] maṃḍalasya vahis tasya jvālāvalyā vahiḥ punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15576: Rm_37.319 [69] veṣṭayitvā tato vāhye kramān saṃsthāpayed ghaṭān /
S01ratnml_u:15578: Rm_37.320 [70] tātra śrīvasudhāṃ devīṃ sagaṇāṃ vidhinā kramāt /
S01ratnml_u:15580: Rm_37.321 [71] tṛtīyāyāṃ tathā prātaḥ snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15582: Rm_37.322 [72] ādau guruṃ samabhyarcya ratnatrayaṃ samarcayet /
S01ratnml_u:15584: Rm_37.323 [73] sagaṇāṃ tāṃ samāvāhya datvā pādārgham ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:15587: tatas taddhāraṇīṃ samyak paṭhen maṃtrāṇi ca kramāt //
S01ratnml_u:15588: Rm_37.325 [75] tataḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ stutvā kuryāś ca pāpadeśanāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15589: puṇyānumodanāṃ cāpi kuryāc ca praṇatiṃ smaran //
S01ratnml_u:15590: Rm_37.326 [76] kuryāt pradakṣiṇāny evam aṣṭāṅgaiḥ praṇamet punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15592: Rm_37.327 [77] tato valiṃ pradatvā ca sa bhūtān paritoṣayet /
S01ratnml_u:15593: tataḥ kṣamārthanāṃ kṛtvā vratasūtraṃ ca prārthayet //
S01ratnml_u:15596: Rm_37.329 [79] tato guruṃ samārādhya deyād dānaṃ samichitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15598: Rm_37.330 [80] tatas tṛtīyā yāme 'hneḥ prāśnuyād yavapūrakān /
S01ratnml_u:15600: Rm_37.331 [81] pālanānte punaḥ snātvā tāṃ śrīdevīm anusmaran /
S01ratnml_u:15601: taddhāraṇīṃ paṭhan rātrau pūjayec ca samāhitaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:15602: Rm_37.332 [82] evaṃ nityaṃ catuḥ saṃdhyaṃ pūjayec chrīvasuṃdharāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15603: tat paredyus tathābhyarcya tan maṃḍalaṃ visarjayet //
S01ratnml_u:15604: Rm_37.333 [83] tad rajāṃsi samādāya saṃnidhāya śubhe ghaṭe /
S01ratnml_u:15606: Rm_37.334 [84] śeṣarajaḥ sa nirmālyaṃ nadyāṃ nāgān yathāvidhi /
S01ratnml_u:15608: Rm_37.335 [85] tatas taj jalam ādāya gṛhe gatvā samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15610: Rm_37.336 [86] tatas tan sagaṇaṃ cakraṃ samabhyarcya yathāvidhi /
S01ratnml_u:15612: Rm_37.337 [87] tathā tat sagaṇaṃ cakraṃ kṛtvā kṣamārthanāṃ tataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15613: sāṃjaliś ca kramān natvā visarjayet prasādayan //
S01ratnml_u:15614: Rm_37.338 [88] tadā śrīvasudhā devī svayam āgatya tadgṛhe /
S01ratnml_u:15616: Rm_37.339 [89] tatas tatra gṛhe nityaṃ maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15618: Rm_37.340 [90] evaṃ tasyā mahādevyā vasulakṣmyā vratodbhavaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15619: puṇyaṃ mahad asaṃkhyeyam aprameyaṃ vidur jināḥ //
S01ratnml_u:15620: Rm_37.341 [91] evaṃ mahattaraṃ puṇyaṃ vijñāya dvija tat tathā /
S01ratnml_u:15621: śraddhaye tadvrataṃ kuryā yadi saṃpattim ichasi //
S01ratnml_u:15622: Rm_37.342 [92] yaś ca tāṃ śrīmahādevīṃ vasudhārām anusmaran /
S01ratnml_u:15623: yat kāryyam ārabhet tasya tat sarvaṃ hi samṛddhyati //
S01ratnml_u:15624: Rm_37.343 [93] ratnārthī labhate ratnaṃ dhanārthī labhate dhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15625: bhogyārthī labhate bhogyaṃ yaso 'rthī labhate yaśaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:15626: Rm_37.344 [94] dravyārthī labhate dravyān guṇārthī labhate guṇān /
S01ratnml_u:15627: vidyārthī labhate vidyāṃ śubhārthī labhate śubhaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:15628: Rm_37.345 [95] mānyārthī labhate mānyaṃ jayārthī labhate jayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15629: dharmārthī labhate dharmān sukhārthī labhate sukhaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:15630: Rm_37.346 [96] rājyārthī labhate rājyaṃ gṛhārthī labhate gṛhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15631: kṣetrārthī labhate kṣetrān rasārthī labhate rasān //
S01ratnml_u:15632: Rm_37.347 [97] bhāryārthī labhate bhāryāṃ sutārthī labhate sutāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15633: putrārthī labhate putrān pautrārthī pautram āpnuyāt //
S01ratnml_u:15634: Rm_37.348 [98] jñānārthī labhate jñānaṃ mokṣārthī mokṣam āpnuyāt /
S01ratnml_u:15636: Rm_37.349 [99] sarvāṇi dravyajātāni vastrādi bhūṣaṇāny api /
S01ratnml_u:15638: Rm_37.350 [100] tato dānāni dadyāt sa śuddhaśīlaḥ samācaret /
S01ratnml_u:15639: kṣāntiṃ ca bhāvayen nityaṃ dharmavīryyaṃ samārabhet //
S01ratnml_u:15640: Rm_37.351 [1] tathā dhyānaṃ samādhāya prajñābdhiṃ saṃtared drutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15642: Rm_37.352 [2] sadbuddhibalavān dhīraḥ sa bodhijñānam āpnuyāt /
S01ratnml_u:15645: Rm_37.353 [3] evaṃ brāhmaṇa vijñāya saddharmmaṃ yadi vāṃchasi /
S01ratnml_u:15646: tāṃ śrīdevīṃ mahālakṣmīṃ vasudhārāṃ sadā bhaja //
S01ratnml_u:15647: Rm_37.354 [4] tathā te sarvadā gehe maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15648: sarvatreha paratrāpi bhaven nūnaṃ na saṃśayaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:15649: Rm_37.355 [5] tathā dānāni datvā tvaṃ svayaṃ tadvrataṃ saṃcaran /
S01ratnml_u:15654: Rm_37.357 [7] sarve 'pi sugatā bodhisatvāś cāpi jinātmajāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15657: Rm_37.358 [8] iti tenārhatādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa brāhmaṇo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:15659: Rm_37.359 [9] tataḥ sa viṣṇudāso 'pi bhāryāṃ tāṃ dhīmatīṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:15661: Rm_37.360 [10] priye dhanyāsi kalyāṇī yad ahaṃ tvatprayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15662: śrīdevyā vrataṃ ratnaṃ prāpnomi sāṃprataṃ khalu //
S01ratnml_u:15663: Rm_37.361 [11] tad yathānena śāstrātra samādiṣṭaṃ tathā khalu /
S01ratnml_u:15664: śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatvā vāṃchāmi carituṃ vrataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:15665: Rm_37.362 [12] tat tvam api samādhāya mayā sārddhaṃ tathādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:15666: śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ caritum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:15667: Rm_37.363 [13] iti bhartroditaṃ śrutvā dhīmatī sānumoditā /
S01ratnml_u:15668: bharttāraṃ taṃ samālokya punar evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:15669: Rm_37.364 [14] tathā satyaṃ samādhāya śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatau /
S01ratnml_u:15671: Rm_37.365 [15] ity uktvā sā satī bhadrā dhīmatī sahasādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:15673: Rm_37.366 [16] tatas taṃ gurum ānaṃdaṃ natvā sā sāṃjalir mudā /
S01ratnml_u:15674: tad vratārambham ādhātuṃ prārthayed evam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:15677: Rm_37.368 [18] tayeti prārthitaṃ śrutvā sa ānaṃdo jinātmajaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15679: Rm_37.369 [19] tatra bhūśodhanaṃ kṛtvā sa ānaṃdo yathāvidhi /
S01ratnml_u:15681: Rm_37.370 [20] tathā tau daṃpatī tīrthe snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtau /
S01ratnml_u:15683: Rm_37.371 [21] tatas tau daṃpatī tasya śāstur ādeśataḥ kramāt /
S01ratnml_u:15685: Rm_37.372 [22] gavyaiḥ kāmādi vastūni sarvāṇi śuddhitāny api /
S01ratnml_u:15687: Rm_37.373 [23] ādau guruṃ samabhyarcya tato ratnatrayaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:15689: Rm_37.374 [24] tatas tanmaṇḍale devīṃ sagaṇāṃ śrīvasuṃdharāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15690: dhyātvā tathā samāvāhya datvā pādārgham ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:15691: Rm_37.375 [25] tatas tāṃ sagaṇāṃ devīṃ samabhyarcya yathākramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15698: tatas tau sāṃjalī sthitvā prakṣitvā pāpadeśanāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15699: Rm_37.378 [28] tatas tau sāṃjalī sthitvā prakṣitvā pāpadeśanāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15704: Rm_37.380 [30] tato dānaṃ pradatvaivaṃ gurave 'pi sudakṣiṇāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15705: tataḥ kṣamārthanāṃ kṛtvā samāptaṃ cakratur vrataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:15706: Rm_37.381 [31] tato gurus tayoḥ śāstā vratasūtraṃ samarppayat /
S01ratnml_u:15708: Rm_37.382 [32] tato guruṃ puraskṛtya yathoktaṃ vratapālanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15709: kṛtvā tataḥ punaḥ snātvā devīṃ dhyātvā niṣedituḥ //
S01ratnml_u:15710: Rm_37.383 [33] tato rātrau samādhāya sagaṇāṃ vasuṃdharāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15711: devīṃ dhyātvā samabhyarcya dharmmaṃ śrutvā niṣedatuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:15712: Rm_37.384 [34] tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtau /
S01ratnml_u:15713: tathā tāṃ sagaṇāṃ devīm āvāhyānarcatuḥ kramāt //
S01ratnml_u:15714: Rm_37.385 [35] tatas tad vratasaṃpūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ sadakṣiṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15715: pradatvā gurave natvā tan maṇḍalaṃ vyasarjatāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:15716: Rm_37.386 [36] tatas tad rajam ādāya bhaṃḍāgāre yathoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15717: nidhāya tat sa nirmālyaṃ śeṣaṃ nadyāṃ yathāvidhiṃ //
S01ratnml_u:15718: Rm_37.387 [37] gurur nāgān samabhyarcya samarpya prākṣipaj jale /
S01ratnml_u:15719: tatas taj jalam ādāya mahotsāhair gṛhaṃ yayau //
S01ratnml_u:15720: Rm_37.388 [38] tata gṛhe tad ambhobhir abhiṣiṃcya samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15722: Rm_37.389 [39] tatas tau daṃpatī natvā sāṃjali sādaraṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:15724: Rm_37.390 [40] tatas tasyā gṛhe devī vasundhārā svayaṃ sthitā /
S01ratnml_u:15726: Rm_37.391 [41] sarvadravyābhisaṃpūrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā tau daṃpatī gṛhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15728: Rm_37.392 [42] aho satyaṃ jagacchāstur yathādiṣṭaṃ tathā khalu /
S01ratnml_u:15729: tathāvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatvā devyā vrataṃ carevahi //
S01ratnml_u:15730: Rm_37.393 [43] ity uktvā tau prasīdaṃtau śaraṇaṃ gatvā samāhitau /
S01ratnml_u:15732: Rm_37.394 [44] tadārabhyaḥ sadārthibhyo datvā dānaṃ yathārthitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15734: Rm_37.395 [45] tato 'sau yatir ānaṃdas tau samāmaṃtrya daṃpatī /
S01ratnml_u:15736: Rm_37.396 [46] tatra sa taṃ jagannāthaṃ praṇatvā sāṃjaliḥ punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15738: Rm_37.397 [47] tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tam ānaṃdaṃ sabhāṃ ca tāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15740: Rm_37.398 [48] dhanyā sā dhīmatī śāntamatī cāpi subhāvinī /
S01ratnml_u:15743: Rm_37.399 [49] tan me ubhe mahatpuṇyalābhinyau śrīsamanvite /
S01ratnml_u:15748: Rm_37.401 [51] ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te sarvasāṃghikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15749: tāṃ śrīvasuṃdharāṃ devīṃ smṛtvā nityaṃ prabhejire //
S01ratnml_u:15750: Rm_37.402 [52] tadā tasyāḥ pitā viprā dhīmatyā duhitur gṛhe /
S01ratnml_u:15752: Rm_37.403 [53] tataḥ sa brāhmaṇo bhāryāṃ dhīmatyā mātaraṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:15754: Rm_37.404 [54] kiṃ tvayānuśrutaṃ bhārye dhīmatyā yad gṛhe 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:15756: Rm_37.405 [55] iti bhartrā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sā vismayānvitā /
S01ratnml_u:15757: katham etad bhavet satyam iti taṃ patim abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:15758: Rm_37.406 [56] iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā hariśarmāpi sa dvijaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15760: Rm_37.407 [57] priye śrutaṃ mayā satyaṃ dhīmatyā yad gṛhe 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:15762: Rm_37.408 [58] yadi naitat pratīto 'pi janaiḥ sā dhīmatī sutā /
S01ratnml_u:15764: Rm_37.409 [59] kathaṃ saṃjāyate saṃpan mahatī te gṛhe 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:15765: etat satyaṃ tvayā putrī puro me kathyatām iti //
S01ratnml_u:15766: Rm_37.410 [60] evaṃ bhartrā samākhyātaṃ śrutva sā dhīmatīprasūḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15768: Rm_37.411 [61] śṛṇu sakhi sutāyā me dhīmatyā yad gṛhe 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:15770: Rm_37.412 [62] iti śrutaṃ mayā satyaṃ draṣṭum ichāmi tat khalu /
S01ratnml_u:15771: tat tāṃ sutāṃ samāhūya samādarād ihānaya //
S01ratnml_u:15772: Rm_37.413 [63] iti tayā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sā supriyā sakhī /
S01ratnml_u:15774: Rm_37.414 [64] tatra sā samupāsṛtya dhīmatīṃ tāṃ subhadrikāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15776: Rm_37.415 [65] bhadre 'haṃ preṣitā mātrā tvadāhvānaṃ pratīha tat /
S01ratnml_u:15778: Rm_37.416 [66] iti tayā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sā dhīmatī mudā /
S01ratnml_u:15779: hasantī tāṃ sakhīṃ mātuḥ samālokyaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:15780: Rm_37.417 [67] ayi māṃ smarate mātā kim arthaṃ sāṃprataṃ kathaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15781: tadāhaṃ na smṛtā mātrā dāridriyaduḥkhinī yadā //
S01ratnml_u:15782: Rm_37.418 [68] tathāpy ahaṃ mukhaṃ mātur draṣṭum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15784: Rm_37.419 [69] ity uktvā dhīmatī sātha putraṃ ca bhūṣaṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15786: Rm_37.420 [70] svayaṃ ca sā prasādhitvā duṣyapaṭṭāmvarāvṛtā /
S01ratnml_u:15788: Rm_37.421 [71] tataḥ sakhyā tayā sārddhaṃ putraputrīsamanvitā /
S01ratnml_u:15789: saṃprasthitā janaiś cāpi saha mātur gṛhe yayau //
S01ratnml_u:15790: Rm_37.422 [72] tatra sā jananī dṛṣṭvā dhīmatīṃ tāṃ samāgatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15791: taṃ suputraṃ suputrīṃ ca paśyantī samupācaran //
S01ratnml_u:15792: Rm_37.423 [73] tatra tāṃ jananīṃ dṛṣṭvā dhīmatī sātmajānvitā /
S01ratnml_u:15794: Rm_37.424 [74] jananī sāpi tāṃ putrīṃ putraputrīsamanvitāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15796: Rm_37.425 [75] tataḥ sā dhīmatī putrī putraputrīsamanvitā /
S01ratnml_u:15799: dṛṣṭvā sa janako 'py evaṃ paśyan pratyudyayau mudā //
S01ratnml_u:15800: Rm_37.427 [77] janakaṃ taṃ samālokya dhīmatī sātmajānvitā /
S01ratnml_u:15802: Rm_37.428 [78] pitāpi sa samālokya dhīmatīṃ tāṃ śubhāṃśikāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15803: putraputryau ca saṃbhāṣya papracha kauśalaṃ mudā //
S01ratnml_u:15804: Rm_37.429 [79] pitā sa jananī sāpi dhīmatīṃ tāṃ subhāvinīṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15805: pautraṃ pautrīṃ ca saṃdhṛtvā svagṛhe jagmatur mudā //
S01ratnml_u:15806: Rm_37.430 [80] tatra sā jananī tasyāḥ pautryāḥ pautrasya cādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:15808: Rm_37.431 [81] tad āsanaṃ samāstīrya tāṃ putrīṃ svayam ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:15809: pautraṃ pautrīṃ ca tān sarvān saṃdhṛtvā saṃnyaveśayat //
S01ratnml_u:15811: putrīṃ putram upasthāpya tasthau sā dhīmatī smitā //
S01ratnml_u:15812: Rm_37.433 [83] tām āgatāṃ samākarṇya sarve 'pi jātayo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:15813: sahasā draṣṭum āgatya sā daraṃ samupāyayuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:15814: Rm_37.434 [84] tathā te vāṃdhavāḥ sarve suhṛtminrajanā api /
S01ratnml_u:15815: tāṃ tathā svagṛhāyātāṃ kuśalaṃ praṣṭum āyayuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:15816: Rm_37.435 [85] tathā tāś ca bhaginyo 'pi tāsāṃ sarve 'pi cātmajāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15817: tāṃ dhīmatīṃ tathāyātāṃ śrutvā draṣṭu samā yayuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:15818: Rm_37.436 [86] evam anye 'pi lokāś ca dhīmatīṃ tāṃ subhūṣaṇāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15821: te sajñātyādayaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā vismayam āyayuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:15823: sarve tāṃ sādaraṃ natvā paprachuḥ kuśalaṃ mudā //
S01ratnml_u:15824: Rm_37.439 [89] tathā sā dhīmatī cāpi jñātivaṃdhusuhṛjjanān /
S01ratnml_u:15826: Rm_37.440 [90] tataḥ sā jananī tasyai dhīmatyai sādarān mudā /
S01ratnml_u:15828: Rm_37.441 [91] tathā sautāya sautāyai bhojanaṃ surasānvitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15830: Rm_37.442 [92] gṛhṇāṇa surasaṃ bhogyaṃ bhukṣva hṛd dhīmati priye /
S01ratnml_u:15831: yo sauta saute ca saudārdda procyutaṃ yadabhīpsitaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:15832: Rm_37.443 [93] janako vitathya sarvo bhaginyo bhrātaro 'pi ca /
S01ratnml_u:15833: bhātṛjāyāṃ sukhāś cāpi tasyāś cakruḥ samādaraṃ //
S01ratnml_u:15834: Rm_37.444 [94] tathādarāṃ kṛtaṃ sarve śrutvā sā dhīmatī tadā /
S01ratnml_u:15836: Rm_37.445 [95] naivāhaṃ mānitā hy ebhir nāyaṃ putro 'pi mānitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15837: na ca yaṃ mānitā putri dhanam evātra manyate //
S01ratnml_u:15838: Rm_37.446 [96] yadā na me gṛhe saṃpad daridro 'haṃ ca duḥkhinī /
S01ratnml_u:15839: tademe sarva ete 'pi nāpi 'paśyan mukhaṃ mama //
S01ratnml_u:15840: Rm_37.447 [97] idānīṃ me gṛhe saṃpaj jātā tat sukhānvitāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15841: evaṃ mate 'pi sarve māṃ mānayaṃti samādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:15842: Rm_37.448 [98] yad ahaṃ mānitā naiva dhanam evābhimānyate /
S01ratnml_u:15843: tad yasya taiḥ kriyate mānyaṃ sa bhuṃjyād idam ādaraṃ //
S01ratnml_u:15844: Rm_37.449 [99] iti sā manasā dhyātvā sarvāṇi bhūṣaṇāny api /
S01ratnml_u:15845: svāni putrasya putryāś ca saṃnirīkṣya samādade //
S01ratnml_u:15846: Rm_37.450 [100] tataḥ sā dhīmatī kāṃśasthālyāṃ sarvāṇi tāny api /
S01ratnml_u:15848: Rm_37.451 [1] bho bho bhavanti sarvāṇi bhūṣaṇāni priyāṇi me /
S01ratnml_u:15849: idaṃ saurasikaṃ bhojyaṃ prāśnuta svechayā sukhaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:15850: Rm_37.452 [2] saṃsāre mānanīyaṃ hi dhanam eva sadādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:15851: dhanānurūpeṇa yal loke mānyate niṃdyate naraḥ //
S01ratnml_u:15852: Rm_37.453 [3] dhanavān puruṣo loke nīco 'pi mānyate 'guṇaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15853: nirdhanā guṇavāṃś cāpi sujāto 'pi na mānyate //
S01ratnml_u:15856: Rm_37.455 [5] yāvat saṃpad gṛhe tāval loke samādrito naraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15857: yadā saṃpad vihīne tu tadā sa bhūtavac caret //
S01ratnml_u:15858: Rm_37.456 [6] iti sābhilapanty eva sarvāṇi bhūṣaṇāny api /
S01ratnml_u:15859: tāni punaḥ samādāya yathā sthānaṃ nyayojayat //
S01ratnml_u:15860: Rm_37.457 [7] tatas tadbhojanaṃ kiṃcid bhaktvā sā svātmajānvitā /
S01ratnml_u:15861: natvaiva pitarau bharttur gṛhe yayau prasāditā //
S01ratnml_u:15862: Rm_37.458 [8] tatra sā dhīmatī bharttur viṣṇudāsasya pādayoḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15864: Rm_37.459 [9] etad bhāryāsamākhyātaṃ śrutvā sa brāhmaṇaḥ patiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15865: muditas tāṃ sukalyāṇīṃ bhāryaṃ dṛṣṭvaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:15866: Rm_37.460 [10] dhanyo 'si tvaṃ sukalyāṇī yat te samupādeśataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15870: Rm_37.462 [12] ity uktvā brāhmaṇo bharttā viṣṇudāsaḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15871: dhīmatīṃ taṃ sukalyāṇīṃ natvaivaṃ punar abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:15872: Rm_37.463 [13] priye tava prasādena sāphalyaṃ janma me 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:15874: Rm_37.464 [14] tan mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tat sarvaṃ kṣīyate 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:15875: saṃpattiḥ saṃprajātā ca naiva kṣīṇā bhave dhi naḥ //
S01ratnml_u:15876: Rm_37.465 [15] tathā vayaṃ sadāpy asyāḥ śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15879: yāvajjīvaṃ śubhaṃ kṛtvā bhuktvā saukhyaṃ caremahi //
S01ratnml_u:15882: Rm_37.468 [18] iti bhartroditaṃ śrutvā dhīmatī sānumoditā /
S01ratnml_u:15884: Rm_37.469 [19] tataḥ sā dhīmatī tasyāḥ śāṃtamateḥ purogatā /
S01ratnml_u:15887: pāpaṃ me kṣīyate sarvaṃ taj janma saphalaṃ bhave //
S01ratnml_u:15888: Rm_37.471 [21] saṃpattiḥ saṃprajātā me naiva kṣīṇā bhaved api /
S01ratnml_u:15889: tad yāvajjīvitaṃ devyāḥ śaraṇastho bhajāni hi //
S01ratnml_u:15890: Rm_37.472 [22] tvam eva śāstā na cānyā hi saddharmopadeśinī /
S01ratnml_u:15892: Rm_37.473 [23] ity udite tam āśrutvā śāṃtamatiś ca sā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:15893: dhīmatīṃ tāṃ samālokya punar evam abhāṣāta //
S01ratnml_u:15898: Rm_37.476 [26] iti matvātra saṃsāre śubhaṃ dharmārthasādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15899: dharmo lokahitārthāya tal lokārthe dharmam ācareḥ //
S01ratnml_u:15900: Rm_37.477 [27] iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā dhīmatī sā prabodhitā /
S01ratnml_u:15902: Rm_37.478 [28] tataḥ prabhṛti sā sādhvī dhīmatī sarvadā gṛhe /
S01ratnml_u:15903: śrīdevyā bhajanaṃ kṛtvā datvā dānaṃ śubhe 'carat //
S01ratnml_u:15904: Rm_37.479 [29] tathā tasyā gṛhe saṃpad dine dine pravarddhitā /
S01ratnml_u:15906: Rm_37.480 [30] tathā sā dhīmatī dṛṣṭvā sarvasaṃpatpravarddhitāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15907: mudā lokahitaṃ kṛtvā pracacāra śubhe sadā //
S01ratnml_u:15908: Rm_37.481 [31] iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
S01ratnml_u:15909: tathā tvam api rājendra vasudhārāvrataṃ cara //
S01ratnml_u:15911: Rm_37.482 [32] prajāś cāpi mahārāja bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15913: śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇe sthāpya vrataṃ cāraya sarvadā //
S01ratnml_u:15914: Rm_37.483 [33] tathā te sarvadā kṣemaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15916: Rm_37.484 [34] iti tenārhatādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15918: dhīmatyā ye 'vadānaṃ śubhaphaladam idaṃ suprasannāḥ śṛṇvanti /
S01ratnml_u:15925: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:15926: Rm_38.2 [2] bhadanta śrotum ichāmi vasudhārāvrataṃ kadā /
S01ratnml_u:15927: kena kuha kathaṃ martyaloke pracāritaṃ purā //
S01ratnml_u:15928: Rm_38.3 [3] tad atra no bhavāñ cchāstar yathā pravarttitaṃ purā /
S01ratnml_u:15930: Rm_38.4 [4] iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan mahāmatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15932: Rm_38.5 [5] śṛṇu rājan yathākhyātaṃ guruṇā me srutaṃ mayā /
S01ratnml_u:15934: Rm_38.6 [6] tadyathā bhagavān buddhaḥ śākyamunis tathāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15936: Rm_38.7 [7] sa ekasamaye tatra kauśānvyā upakaṇṭhike /Ms: ekaḥ samaye
S01ratnml_u:15938: Rm_38.8 [8] tadā śakrādayo devā brahmādi brāhmaṇā api /
S01ratnml_u:15941: siddhā vidyādharāś cāpi tathā cāpy apsarogaṇāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:15942: Rm_38.10 [10] yogino yatayas tīrthā ṛṣayo brahmacāriṇaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15943: rājāno rājaputrāś ca vaiśyāś ca maṃtriṇo janāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:15944: Rm_38.11 [11] amātyāḥ sainikāś cāpi gṛhasthāś ca mahājanāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15945: vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca śilpinaḥ paurikā api //
S01ratnml_u:15948: Rm_38.13 [13] sarve te tatra kauśāṃvyā ghoṣilārāma āgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15950: Rm_38.14 [14] dṛṣṭvā te muditāḥ sarve praṇatvā samupāsṛtāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15952: Rm_38.15 [15] dṛṣṭvā te muditāḥ sarve praṇatvā samupāsṛtāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15955: Rm_38.16 [16] tatra te tatsabhāsīnā bhikṣavaḥ śrāvakā api /
S01ratnml_u:15960: sāṃjaliḥ purataḥ sthitvā natvaivaṃ prārthayan muniṃ //
S01ratnml_u:15961: Rm_38.19 [19] bhagavan sarvavic chāstān ime sarve sabhājanāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15965: Rm_38.21 [21] ity ānaṃdena bhadreṇa prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15967: Rm_38.22 [22] śṛṇv ānanda pravakṣyāmi munīndreṇa yathoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:15969: Rm_38.23 [23] tadyathābhūt purā rājā sūryodayābhidho nṛpaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15976: Rm_38.26 [26] tataḥ sarvatra deśeṣu durbhikṣam abhavad bhuvi /
S01ratnml_u:15977: tadā te manujāḥ sarve daridrā abhavan kramāt //
S01ratnml_u:15978: Rm_38.27 [27] tatas te nirdhanāḥ sarve kṣutpipāsāhatāturāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15981: Rm_38.28 [28] tataḥ sarve 'pi te lokā andhā iva kumārgagāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15985: Rm_38.30 [30] tadā sarve 'pi satvāś ca kṣuttṛṣṇāgnyahidāhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15987: Rm_38.31 [31] tadaikasmin dine tatra tuṣitabhuvane sthitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15989: Rm_38.32 [32] sarvās tā militā martyaloke gaṃtuṃ samipsavaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15991: Rm_38.33 [33] tatas tān manujān sarvān daridrān pāpacāriṇaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15992: dṛṣṭvā tāḥ sakalā devyā dayārttā evam abruvan //
S01ratnml_u:15993: Rm_38.34 [34] aho duḥkhaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ yat pāpe niratā narāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15997: Rm_38.36 [36] tatas te manujāḥ sarve śrutvā dṛṣṭvānumoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:15998: śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatvā careyur vratam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:15999: Rm_38.37 [37] tadā tatpuṇyasaṃpūtāḥ sarve te mānavā api /
S01ratnml_u:16001: Rm_38.38 [38] tatas te manujāḥ sarve daśakuśalasaṃratāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16007: Rm_38.41 [41] iti hetor vayaṃ sarvāḥ śrīdevyāḥ purato gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16009: Rm_38.42 [42] ity evaṃ saṃmataṃ kṛtvā sarvā devvyo 'pi tās tataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16011: Rm_38.43 [43] tatra tāḥ sakalā devyaḥ sāṃjalaya upāsṛtāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16013: Rm_38.44 [44] bhagavati mahādevi vijānīyād bhavaṃty api /
S01ratnml_u:16014: yan manuṣyā daridrās te bhavanti pāpacāriṇaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16015: Rm_38.45 [45] tad bhavatī prayatnena manujāns tān suduḥkhitān /
S01ratnml_u:16017: Rm_38.46 [46] iti saṃprārthite tābhir devībhiḥ sā vasundharā /
S01ratnml_u:16018: tā devī sakalā dṛṣṭvā prasannāsyaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:16019: Rm_38.47 [47] aho duḥkhaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ yatra śāstā na sadguruḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16022: durbhagā nirdayāḥ krūrāḥ pateyur narake dhruvaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16023: Rm_38.49 [49] iti hetor ahaṃ tesāṃ martyānāṃ duḥkhaśāṃtaye /
S01ratnml_u:16025: Rm_38.50 [50] iti niścitya sā devī vasulakṣmī kṛpārditā /
S01ratnml_u:16026: tatra samādhim ādhāya trimurttiṃ sā samādadhau //
S01ratnml_u:16028: tṛtīyikā kumāryyāś ca trimūrttir iti sā dadhe //
S01ratnml_u:16029: Rm_38.52 [52] tataḥ sā śrīmahādevī gaṃtuṃ martyālaye svayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16031: Rm_38.53 [53] naṃdīmukhāśvaghoṣau yan mayā saṃprārthitaṃ yathā /
S01ratnml_u:16032: tathā tan me mahatkāryaṃ harttum arhatha sarvathā //
S01ratnml_u:16033: Rm_38.54 [54] ity ādiṣṭaṃ tayā devyā niśamya tau kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16035: Rm_38.55 [55] devi kiṃ te mahat kāryaṃ tadā jñāpayatu dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16036: yathādiṣṭaṃ bhavaty āśu kariṣyāvas tathā khalu //
S01ratnml_u:16037: Rm_38.56 [56] iti tābhyāṃ samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sā śrīvasuṃdharā /
S01ratnml_u:16039: Rm_38.57 [57] śṛṇuta bhadramukhau yan me kāryaṃ vāṃ tan mayocyate /
S01ratnml_u:16040: tathā yuvāṃ samādhāya karttum arhatha sāṃprataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16041: Rm_38.58 [58] yan narā bhūtale sarve daridrā atiduḥkhitā /
S01ratnml_u:16043: Rm_38.59 [59] tat tān sarvān samuddharttum ichāmi sarvathā 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:16044: tridhā mūrttim ahaṃ dhṛtvā gacheyaṃ tan mahītale //
S01ratnml_u:16045: Rm_38.60 [60] tayo rājā mahīpālaḥ sarvalokādhipaḥ prabhuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16046: taṃ evaṃ prathamaṃ dharme vinīya yojayemahi //
S01ratnml_u:16047: Rm_38.61 [61] yatra rājā svayaṃ dharme sthitvā caret samāhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16048: tatra sarve 'nugā rājño dharme careyur ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:16050: Rm_38.62 [62] yatrābhinirato rājā carate 'py aśubhe śubhe /
S01ratnml_u:16052: tatra sarve 'pi lokās te pracareyur hi sādaraṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16053: Rm_38.63 [63] ity ādau nṛpati dharme yojanīyaḥ prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16054: tataḥ sa nṛpatiḥ sārvāl lokān dharme niyojayet //
S01ratnml_u:16055: Rm_38.64 [64] tataḥ sarve 'pi lokās te daśākuśalavaimukhāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16056: saddharme hi ratā bhadre pracareyuḥ samāhitāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16057: Rm_38.65 [65] tataḥ sarve 'pi te lokāḥ parasparahitonmukhāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16059: Rm_38.66 [66] tatas te sarvadā śreyaḥ kṛtvā yāyuḥ sukhāvatīṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16061: Rm_38.67 [67] tataḥ kramāt samādhāya sarvapāramitāsv api /
S01ratnml_u:16063: Rm_38.68 [68] tatas te bodhisatvāḥ syuḥ saddharmaguṇaratninaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16065: Rm_38.69 [69] tataḥ sarve 'pi te dhīrāḥ pariśuddha trimaṇḍalāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16067: Rm_38.70 [70] iti hetor ahaṃ teṣāṃ satvānāṃ vinayārthataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16069: Rm_38.71 [71] tad yuvāṃ me vaco dhṛtvā gantum arhatha bhūtale /
S01ratnml_u:16070: tatra gatvā prayatnena sarvathāhara taṃ nṛpaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16071: Rm_38.72 [72] tato 'haṃ taṃ vaśīkṛtya bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16073: Rm_38.73 [73] iti tayā mahādevyā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya tau /
S01ratnml_u:16075: Rm_38.74 [74] bhadre devi tavādeśaṃ dhṛtvāvāṃ śirasā tathā /
S01ratnml_u:16077: Rm_38.75 [75] ity uktvā tau prasannāsyau kṛtāṃjalipuṭo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:16078: pādau devyāḥ praṇatvaivaṃ prajagmatus tato bhuvi //
S01ratnml_u:16079: Rm_38.76 [76] trimūrttirūpam ādhāya vasulakṣmīr api svayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16081: Rm_38.77 [77] tatra tau bhūtale gatvā prāpaśyataṃ samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16083: Rm_38.78 [78] dṛṣṭvā tāv ubhau tatra kṣaṇaṃ viśramya saṃsthitau /
S01ratnml_u:16086: tat katham iha rājānam apaharttuṃ carevahi //
S01ratnml_u:16087: Rm_38.80 [80] tatra nandīmukhaḥ prāha divyastrīsuṃdaraṃ vapuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16089: Rm_38.81 [81] nūnaṃ sa nṛpatī rājā dṛṣṭvā nau divyasuṃdaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16091: Rm_38.82 [82] tadāvāṃ sahasāhṛtya nṛpatiṃ taṃ prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16093: Rm_38.83 [83] iti saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā vidhāya ca susaṃmataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16099: Rm_38.85 [85] tayos tat surasaṃgītaṃ śrutvā tatpuravāsinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16101: Rm_38.86 [86] dṛṣṭvā te divyarūpāṃśe sarve te vismayānvitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16102: devakanye ime nūnam iti proktvā samīkṣire //
S01ratnml_u:16103: Rm_38.87 [87] divyāṃśe te samālokya sarve te vismayoddhatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16104: aho citram iti proktvā pratyāyayuś cirāt puraṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16105: Rm_38.88 [88] tatra te surakanyāṃśe naikasthāne niṣedatuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16107: Rm_38.89 [89] tathā te caritaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te paurikā api /
S01ratnml_u:16109: Rm_38.90 [90] tatas te paurikā lokāḥ sādbhutaśaṃkitāśayāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16111: Rm_38.91 [91] jaya deva mahārāja vijānīyā bhavānn api /
S01ratnml_u:16112: tathāpy atra mahac citraṃ vijñaptuṃ vayam āgatāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16113: Rm_38.92 [92] tad atra surarāmāṃśe ubhe striyau sulakṣaṇau /
S01ratnml_u:16115: Rm_38.93 [93] pratidinaṃ caturdikṣu tathā te devakanyake /
S01ratnml_u:16117: Rm_38.94 [94] tan nimittaṃ kathaṃ rājaṃ cchubhaṃ vā syād athāśubhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16118: iti praṣṭuṃ samāyāmo vayaṃ sarve 'pi nānyathā //
S01ratnml_u:16119: Rm_38.95 [95] iti taiḥ paurikaiḥ sarvair niveditaṃ niśamya saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16120: mahīpatiḥ kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvā tato dṛṣṭvaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:16121: Rm_38.96 [96] strībhir ālāpitaṃ gītaṃ śubhāya na bhavet kvacit /
S01ratnml_u:16122: ity uktvā sa viṣaṇṇātmā manasaivaṃ vyacintayat //
S01ratnml_u:16123: Rm_38.97 [97] kṣemaṃ neme bhaven nūnaṃ yat te striyau na mānave /
S01ratnml_u:16125: Rm_38.98 [98] tad atra kiṃ bhaven nūnaṃ tan nimittaṃ śubhaṃ na hi /
S01ratnml_u:16126: kim upāyaṃ kariṣyāmi na manye ko hitaṃ diśet //
S01ratnml_u:16127: Rm_38.99 [99] iti ciṃttā viṣaṇṇātmā nṛpatiḥ sa viniśvasan /
S01ratnml_u:16129: Rm_38.100 [100] tathā sthitaṃ narendraṃ taṃ matvā vahir anirgataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16131: Rm_38.101 [1] aśvaghoṣa narendro 'sau tathāpi na vahiś caret /
S01ratnml_u:16132: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāvo yan nṛpo na vahiś caret //
S01ratnml_u:16133: Rm_38.102 [2] iti tenoditaṃ śrutva so 'śvaghoṣo vicintayan /
S01ratnml_u:16134: taṃ nandimukham ālokya bodhayann evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:16135: Rm_38.103 [3] śṛṇu naṃdimukhopāyaṃ yena nṛpaḥ sa nicaret /
S01ratnml_u:16136: tad ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tan nṛpāharaṇaṃ prati //
S01ratnml_u:16137: Rm_38.104 [4] yat tatra nṛpater gehe māyāgninābhidhakṣyate /
S01ratnml_u:16138: tadā sa nṛpatis trastaḥ kopito niḥsared vahi //
S01ratnml_u:16139: Rm_38.105 [5] tadā taṃ nṛpatiṃ dūrāt samāhṛtya prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16141: Rm_38.106 [6] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā nandīmukhaḥ sa bodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16142: tathā hīti pratiśrutya tathā kartuṃ samaichata //
S01ratnml_u:16143: Rm_38.107 [7] tatas tau saṃmataṃ kṛtvā tato 'py antarhitau drutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16145: Rm_38.108 [8] tad dṛṣṭvā nṛpatis trastaḥ sahasā niścarans tataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16146: upāyais taj jvaladvahniṃ śamayām āsa satvaraṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16147: Rm_38.109 [9] tataḥ sa bhūpatī rājā taccintāparikheṭitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16149: Rm_38.110 [10] aho sadyaphalaṃ hy etad yat strīgītanimittajaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16150: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi yenaitac chāmyate 'śubhaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16151: Rm_38.111 [11] bhūyo 'py atra bhaved anyan mahotpātam amaṃgalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16152: katham atra pratīkāraṃ kariṣyāmi na manyate //
S01ratnml_u:16153: Rm_38.112 [12] iti ciṃtāviṣaṇṇātmā nṛpatiḥ sa vimohitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16155: Rm_38.113 [13] tathāpi svālayāsīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā vahir ayāyinaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16157: Rm_38.114 [14] tathāpi sa nṛpo rājā naiva vahir viniḥsaret /
S01ratnml_u:16158: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāvo yenāśu niścaren nṛpaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16159: Rm_38.115 [15] tataś cāpi samālokya so 'śvaghoṣo vicintayan /
S01ratnml_u:16161: Rm_38.116 [16] bho sakhe sa mahārājas tathāpi nātra niścaret /
S01ratnml_u:16162: tad atra kiṃ vilambena yatnena taṃ harevahi //
S01ratnml_u:16165: Rm_38.118 [18] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā naṃdīmukhas tatheti sā /
S01ratnml_u:16168: iti tau saṃmataṃ kṛtvā tatrodyāne prajagmatuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16169: Rm_38.120 [20] tatra tau samupālokya puṣkariṇīṃ manoramāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16171: Rm_38.121 [21] tato nandīmukho dṛṣṭvā tam udyānaṃ manoramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16172: puskariṇīṃ ca prāmodya gaṃdhāḍhyām evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:16173: Rm_38.122 [21!] ahodyānaṃ manoramyaṃ suramyaṃ ca saro varaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16175: Rm_38.123 [22] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā so 'śvaghoṣo viciṃtayan /
S01ratnml_u:16176: udyānaṃ tat saro dṛṣṭvācirād evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:16177: Rm_38.124 [23] yathābhilaṣitaṃ devyāḥ sādhayeva tathā drutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16178: tan nṛpatim apāharttuṃ tad idaṃ dhvaṃsayāvahe //
S01ratnml_u:16179: Rm_38.125 [24] ity uktvā saumataṃ kṛtvā tāv ubhau mahadāśrayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16183: Rm_38.127 [26] tatra tau prasarantau tad udyānaṃ tat saro 'pi ca /
S01ratnml_u:16185: Rm_38.128 [27] tau varāhau samālokya traste udyānapālakaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16186: sahasā sa vinirgatya tato rājakule yayau //
S01ratnml_u:16187: Rm_38.129 [28] tatra sa samupāsṛtya rājñaḥ pādau kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16189: Rm_38.130 [29] jaya deva vijānīyā yad udyāne sarovaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16191: Rm_38.131 [30] tad atra sahasā deva sarvasainyajanānn api /
S01ratnml_u:16192: samupāhūya tau haṃtuṃ preṣayasva drutaṃ vane //
S01ratnml_u:16193: Rm_38.132 [31] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sa rājā parikopitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16194: sahasā sainyam āhūya svayaṃ tau hantum udyayau //
S01ratnml_u:16195: Rm_38.133 [32] tataḥ sa nṛpatī rājā samaṃtrīsainyapaurikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16197: Rm_38.134 [33] tatra sa nṛpatir dṛṣṭvā samaṃtrisainyapaurikān /
S01ratnml_u:16198: tān sarvān samupāmaṃtrya punar evam upādiśat //
S01ratnml_u:16199: Rm_38.135 [34] bho bhavanto janāḥ sarve sajjīkṛtya samāhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16201: Rm_38.136 [35] ahaṃ prāgdiśi tiṣṭhāmi yāmye 'mātyāḥ samaṃtriṇaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16203: Rm_38.137 [36] evaṃ sarve 'py amātyādyāḥ sarvadikṣu samāhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16205: Rm_38.138 [37] yatra sthāne varāhau tau boddhuṃ naivābhiśaknutha /
S01ratnml_u:16206: yataś cāsau parāyetāṃ taddiksthān daṇḍayeya hi //
S01ratnml_u:16207: Rm_38.139 [38] iti me vacanaṃ śrutvā sarve yūyaṃ samāhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16209: Rm_38.140 [39] iti rājñā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi te janāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16211: Rm_38.141 [40] tathā rājā sthitaḥ prācyāṃ yāmye 'mātyagaṇās tathā /
S01ratnml_u:16212: senānyo paścimāyāṃ ca paurās tasthus tathottare //
S01ratnml_u:16213: Rm_38.142 [41] evaṃ te sanṛpā lokāḥ sāmātyasainyapaurikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16215: Rm_38.143 [42] evaṃ te sarvato dikṣu nirudhya samavasthitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16217: Rm_38.144 [43] tat savādyamahārāvaṃ śrutvā tau tān upasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:16221: Rm_38.146 [45] tatra sa nṛpatis tābhyāṃ spṛśyamāno vimūrchitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16223: Rm_38.147 [46] tataś cirāt samutthāya kutremāv iti lokya saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16225: Rm_38.148 [47] tathā te maṃtriṇo 'mātyāḥ sainyalokāś ca paurikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16229: Rm_38.150 [49] tatra tau māyikau tyaktvā vārāhadeham āśu tau /
S01ratnml_u:16231: Rm_38.151 [50] tatra so 'śvo mahāvegād vāyunā riva mahājavi /
S01ratnml_u:16233: Rm_38.152 [51] tatas te maṃtriṇo 'mātyāḥ sainānyaḥ sainikāḥ prajāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16242: Rm_38.156 [55] tatra sa mūrchito rājā kṣaṇaṃ tasthāv acetanaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16244: Rm_38.157 [56] tataḥ sena samāśvāsya dhṛtvā taṃ nṛpam ātmanā /
S01ratnml_u:16246: Rm_38.158 [57] tataḥ sa nṛpa ālokya tam aśvaṃ samupasthitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16247: tṛṣārtto niḥśvasan senaṃ muhur dṛṣṭvaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:16248: Rm_38.159 [58] aho sena mahat kaṣṭaṃ jāyate nāv ihā 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:16250: Rm_38.160 [59] tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāvo yat sarve nirvṛto janāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16251: sudūre nirjane 'raṇye ko 'tra mārgaṃ hi nirdiśet //
S01ratnml_u:16254: Rm_38.162 [61] tad atra sahasā sena mama jīvitarakṣaṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16256: Rm_38.163 [62] iti rājñoditaṃ śrutvā sa seneḥ sahasotthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16257: svāminaṃ taṃ samāśvāsya paśyann evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:16258: Rm_38.164 [63] mā viṣīdāta rājendra yat kṣatriyo 'si dhīravān /
S01ratnml_u:16259: tad bhavān dhairyam ālambya muhurttaṃ sthātum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:16260: Rm_38.165 [64] yatas tato 'pi vānviṣya pāṇīyam amṛtopamaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16262: Rm_38.166 [65] tad yāvannātra pāṇīyaṃ dhṛtvāgachāmi sarvathā /
S01ratnml_u:16263: tāvad dhairyaṃ samālambya tiṣṭhāśvena saha prabho //
S01ratnml_u:16264: Rm_38.167 [66] iti vijñapya seno 'sau svāminaṃ taṃ narādhipaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16266: Rm_38.168 [67] tatra sa samupālokya sarvatrāpy abhilokayan /
S01ratnml_u:16268: Rm_38.169 [68] tatra suranadīśabdaṃ śrutvā senaḥ sa satvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16270: Rm_38.170 [69] tatra tīraṃ samāsādya suranadyāḥ samāditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16272: Rm_38.171 [70] tatra sa parituṣṭātmā samaṃtato vilokayan /
S01ratnml_u:16274: Rm_38.172 [71] tān apsarogaṇān dṛṣṭvā sa seno vismayānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16275: mudā vilokayann eva tasthau citrārppitā yathā //
S01ratnml_u:16276: Rm_38.173 [72] tatrasthaṃtaṃ samālokya sarvā apsaraso 'pi tāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16277: katham atrāgataḥ kas tvaṃ prehīti samakandayan //
S01ratnml_u:16278: Rm_38.174 [73] iti tābhiḥ samāhūtaṃ śrutvā sa sena ātmanā /
S01ratnml_u:16280: Rm_38.175 [74] tatra sa samupāśritya sarvāns tān apsarogaṇān /
S01ratnml_u:16282: Rm_38.176 [75] mahādevyā vijānīdhvaṃ yat trailokyeṣu viśrutaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16284: Rm_38.177 [76] yan nṛpasya varāhābhyāṃ udyānaṃ dhvaṃsitaṃ tataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16285: tau varāhau nihaṃtuṃ sa nṛpo 'nudhāvati drutaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16286: Rm_38.178 [77] aśvenāpahṛto rājā sa mayaikena naujjhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16290: Rm_38.180 [79] tad ambu sarvato 'nviṣya kutrāpi labhyate na hi /
S01ratnml_u:16292: Rm_38.181 [80] atra me bhāgyayogena preṣito 'ham ihāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16294: Rm_38.182 [81] ity uktvā sena ālokya sāṃjaliḥ purato gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16296: Rm_38.183 [82] bho devyo bhavantyo 'pi kim artham iha tiṣṭhatha /
S01ratnml_u:16297: vaktavyaṃ cet tad arthaṃ me samupādeṣṭum arhatha //
S01ratnml_u:16299: sā taṃ senaṃ samāmaṃtrya purar evam upādiśat //
S01ratnml_u:16300: Rm_38.185 [84] mānava tvaṃ na jānāsi yad idaṃ vratam uttamaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16302: Rm_38.186 [85] iti devyā tayākhyātaṃ śrutvā senaḥ sa moditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16303: tad vrataṃ dharttum ichaṃs tāṃ devīṃ natvaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:16304: Rm_38.187 [86] prasīda me mahādevi yac chrīdevyā idaṃ vrataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16305: aham api samichāmi dhartuṃ tan me upādiśa //
S01ratnml_u:16306: Rm_38.188 [87] iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sā devī paritoṣitā /
S01ratnml_u:16307: taṃ senaṃ sudhiyaṃ dhīraṃ matvaivam abravīt punaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16308: Rm_38.189 [88] mānava vadi te vāṃchāpy asti śrīvasudhāvrate /
S01ratnml_u:16309: tat tāvad iha saṃpaśya samāpyetā 'dhunā vrataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16310: Rm_38.190 [89] paścāt te 'haṃ samākhyāya śrīdevyā vratasādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16312: Rm_38.191 [90] ity uktvā sāpsaro devī sarvās tā apsarogaṇāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16314: Rm_38.192 [91] tatra tāḥ samupāśritya sarvā devyā yathākramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16316: Rm_38.193 [92] tad vrataṃ samupālokya sa seno 'bhyanumoditaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:16659: praṇatvādāya taṃ bhūpaṃ smṛtvā na bubhuje svayaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16660: Rm_38.358 [57] tadā divyapsarorūpaṃ tyaktvā sākṣāt trimūrttidhṛk /
S01ratnml_u:16662: Rm_38.359 [58] darśayām āsa rūpaṃ svaṃ prabhāmaṇḍalavarttitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16663: anyā devyo 'pi rūpaṃ svaṃ dhṛtvā devīṃ vasuṃdharāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16666: Rm_38.361 [60] tataḥ sa sena utthāya tāṃ devīṃ sagaṇāṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:16668: Rm_38.362 [61] tataḥ sa sena ādhāya sapaṃcāmṛtapiṣṭakaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16669: taṃ jalaṃ ca samādhāya sahasā nṛpāṃtike yayau //
S01ratnml_u:16670: Rm_38.363 [62] tatra sa sena ālokya nṛpaṃ durād upāgataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16672: Rm_38.364 [63] tataḥ sa sena ālokya taṃ nṛpaṃ sāṃjalir mudā /
S01ratnml_u:16674: Rm_38.365 [67!] tam amṛtādikaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa vismito nṛpaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16675: kiṃ vilaṃvaṃ kṛtaś caitad ity evaṃ tam apṛchata //
S01ratnml_u:16676: Rm_38.366 [68] iti pṛṣṭe narendreṇa sa senaḥ samupāśritaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16677: taṃ narendraṃ samālokya vinayann evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:16678: Rm_38.367 [69] kṣamasva bho mahārāja yad arthe me vilaṃvitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16679: tat sarvaṃ samupākhyāya bhavantaṃ bodhayāny api //
S01ratnml_u:16680: Rm_38.368 [70] idaṃ tāvan mahārāja suranadyamṛtaṃ pivā /
S01ratnml_u:16681: idaṃ paṃcāmṛtaṃ cāpi bhukṣvedaṃ ca supiṣṭakaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16682: Rm_38.369 [71] ity uktvā sa samādāya kamaṇḍaluṃ samarppayat /
S01ratnml_u:16683: bhogyaṃ paṃcāmṛtaṃ cāpi piṣṭakaṃ cāgrataḥ prabhoḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16684: Rm_38.370 [72] tad amṛtādikaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa mudito nṛpaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16686: Rm_38.371 [73] tataḥ sa nṛpatis tuṣṭo nistṛṣṇāhlāditāśayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16687: taṃ ca paṃcāmṛtaṃ bhogyaṃ bubhuje piṣṭakāny api //
S01ratnml_u:16688: Rm_38.372 [73!] tataḥ sa nṛpatis tuṣṭo mahānaṃdapramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16689: taṃ senaṃ sumatiṃ dhīraṃ samālokyaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:16690: Rm_38.373 [74] tvam apīdaṃ sudhākalpam amṛtaṃ piva sanmate /
S01ratnml_u:16691: bhukṣva pacāmṛtaṃ bhogyaṃ piṣṭakaṃ cedam uttamaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16692: Rm_38.374 [75] iti rājñā samādiṣṭe sa senaḥ pratimaṃḍitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16693: tad amṛtādikaṃ sarvam ādāya bubhuje svayaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16694: Rm_38.375 [76] tatas tac cheṣam ādāya sa senaḥ paritoṣitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16696: Rm_38.376 [77] so 'pi cāśvaḥ samālokya tat sarvam amṛtādikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16698: Rm_38.377 [78] tataḥ sa nṛpati rājā pariśuddhāśayo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:16699: taṃ senaṃ tam upāmaṃtrya punar evam apṛchata //
S01ratnml_u:16700: Rm_38.378 [79] aho sena tvam ānītaṃ yad etad amṛtādikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16701: kutaḥ kathaṃ samāsādya tat satyaṃ vaktum arhasi //
S01ratnml_u:16702: Rm_38.379 [80] ity evaṃ prārthite rājñā sa senaḥ sāṃjalir mudā /
S01ratnml_u:16703: svāminaṃ taṃ nṛpaṃ natvā samālokyaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:16704: Rm_38.380 [81] śṛṇu rājan samādhāya yad etad amṛtādikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16706: Rm_38.381 [82] yad atra tvaṃ tṛṣārtto 'si tadarthe 'haṃ sasaṃbhramaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16707: jalam anveṣituṃ tatra vane paśyan bhramāmy ahaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16708: Rm_38.382 [83] kutrāpi dṛśyate nātra pānīyaṃ nirjane vane /
S01ratnml_u:16709: tato dūrataraṃ gatvā jalam anveṣituṃ bhrame //
S01ratnml_u:16710: Rm_38.383 [84] tatrāpi dṛśyate naiva jalaṃ kvāpi samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16714: Rm_38.385 [86] tatra tāsāṃ samālokya samākraṃdaṃti sādaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16715: tato 'haṃ tatprabhāvena tāṃ nadīṃ laṃghayan vraje //
S01ratnml_u:16716: Rm_38.386 [87] tatra māṃ samupāhūya sarvā tā apsarogaṇāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16717: kutaḥ katham ihāyāsi tvaṃ vadeti babhāṣire //
S01ratnml_u:16718: Rm_38.387 [88] tato 'haṃ samupāsṛtya tāḥ sarvā apsarogaṇāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16719: sāṃjaliḥ sādaraṃ natvā pura evaṃ nivedaya //
S01ratnml_u:16722: Rm_38.389 [90] tan niśamya sa bhūpālaḥ samaṃtrisainyapaurikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16723: saha bhogyaṃ samāruhya varāhau haṃtuṃ udyayau //
S01ratnml_u:16726: Rm_38.391 [92] tatas tau dvau mahāghorau varāhau saha sāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16728: Rm_38.392 [93] tatra sa nṛpatiḥ kopāt tau varāhāv anudrutaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16729: aśvam āruhya vegena praviṣṭo bhramate vane //
S01ratnml_u:16730: Rm_38.393 [94] tatra sa nṛpatir aśvād vegāt pradhāvato 'patat /
S01ratnml_u:16732: Rm_38.394 [95] tasya rājñas tṛṣārttasya jalam anveṣituṃ bhraman /
S01ratnml_u:16733: kutrāpi nirjane 'raṇye jalaṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ na hi //
S01ratnml_u:16734: Rm_38.395 [96] tato dūrataraṃ gatvā jalam anviṣya sarvataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16736: Rm_38.396 [97] etad artham ahaṃ devyo dūrataḥ sahasāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16737: tad bhavantyaḥ prasīdaṃtu dṛśyaṃte bhāgyato mayā //
S01ratnml_u:16738: Rm_38.397 [93] bhavantyo 'pi kim arthe 'tra viharanti samāśritāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16739: iti pṛṣṭe mayā tāś ca devyaḥ sarvāḥ prasāditāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16740: Rm_38.398 [99] ādarān māṃ samāmaṃtrya pura evaṃ babhāṣire /
S01ratnml_u:16741: mānava tvaṃ na jānīṣe yad iheva mamāśritā /
S01ratnml_u:16742: tad arthaṃ samupākhyāyas tat saṃśṛṇu samāhitaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16743: Rm_38.399 [100] yā śrībhagavatī devī māheśvarī vasuṃdharā /
S01ratnml_u:16744: tasyā vrataṃ vayaṃ sarvā caritum iha saṃsthitāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16745: Rm_38.400 [1] tad atra no vrataṃ paśyaṃ kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭha samāhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16747: Rm_38.401 [2] iti tābhiḥ samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāhaṃ saṃpramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16748: tatheti prativijñapya tad vrataṃ draṣṭum āśrame //
S01ratnml_u:16749: Rm_38.402 [3] tatas tā apsarodevyaḥ sarvās tatra yathākramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16751: Rm_38.403 [4] tatra tā maṃḍale devīṃ sagaṇāṃ śrīvasuṃdharāṇ /
S01ratnml_u:16753: Rm_38.404 [5] japastotrādikaṃ kṛtvā sarvāḥ sāṃjalayaś ca tāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16755: Rm_38.405 [6] tatas tā apsarodevyaḥ sarvāḥ samāptite vrate /
S01ratnml_u:16757: Rm_38.406 [7] mahyam api tathā dattaṃ tābhiḥ sarvābhir ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:16759: Rm_38.407 [8] smṛtvā bhavaṃtam ādāya tābhir dattaṃ samādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:16761: Rm_38.408 [9] tato 'haṃ sāṃjalir natvā tā devīḥ sakalā api /
S01ratnml_u:16762: tathā caritum ālocya prārthayāmi vidhiṃ vrate //
S01ratnml_u:16763: mayā saṃprārthitaṃ śrutvā yā tad devī gaṇādhipā /
S01ratnml_u:16764: Rm_38.409 [10] mayā saṃprārthitaṃ śrutvā yā tad devī gaṇādhipā /
S01ratnml_u:16766: sā tad vratavidhiṃ samyak samādiśati me kramāt //
S01ratnml_u:16767: Rm_38.410 [11] tat sarvaṃ samupādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāhaṃ saṃpramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16768: tathā tad vratam ārādhya prechāmi carituṃ sadā //
S01ratnml_u:16769: Rm_38.411 [12] tat sarvaṃ samupādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāhaṃ saṃpramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16770: tathā tad vratam ārādhya prechāmi carituṃ sadā //
S01ratnml_u:16772: Rm_38.412 [13] tatas tāḥ sakalā devīḥ prārthayitvā samādārāt /
S01ratnml_u:16773: idaṃ divyāmṛtaṃ bhojyaṃ prādāya sahasā care //
S01ratnml_u:16774: Rm_38.413 [14] iti heto mahārāja vilamvo jāyate tathā /
S01ratnml_u:16775: tat kṣamasva prabho mātra raukṣyaṃ kṛthāḥ prasīda me //
S01ratnml_u:16776: Rm_38.414 [15] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sa rājā vismayānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16777: tad darśanotsuko dṛṣṭvā taṃ senam etad abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:16778: Rm_38.415 [16] aho āścaryyam atra yad vasudhārā vrataṃ śrutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16780: Rm_38.416 [17] mayā na śrūyate kvāpi dṛśyate na kadā cana /
S01ratnml_u:16781: tad draṣṭuṃ sena me cittaṃ samabhilaṣati dhruvaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16782: Rm_38.417 [18] tasmāt tvaṃ tatra māṃ nītvā tā devī darśaya drutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16783: iti rājñoditaṃ śrutvā sa senaḥ sacivaḥ sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16784: tatheti prativijñapya tatra rājñā saha caran //
S01ratnml_u:16786: daivayogāt kṣaṇāt prāptau tatra sthāne samaikṣatāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16787: Rm_38.419 [20] tadā tatra na tā devyaḥ sthitāḥ sarvā divaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16789: Rm_38.420 [21] tatra sa nṛpatis tāsāṃ devīnāṃ darśanaṃ kvacit /
S01ratnml_u:16791: Rm_38.421 [22] tatra sa nṛpatir natvā vratasthāne kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16792: sarvatrāpi samālokya khaṃ paśyann evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:16793: Rm_38.422 [23] hā mayā labhyate nātra devīnāṃ darśanaṃ kvacit /
S01ratnml_u:16794: kiṃ mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ maṃdabhāgyo 'smy ahaṃ yataḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16795: Rm_38.423 [24] vrataṃ caritum ichāmi tat kathaṃ jñāsyate vidhiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16796: aho me daivayogena śrutam eva na darśanaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16797: Rm_38.424 [25] tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi ko 'tra me vidhim ādiśet /
S01ratnml_u:16798: yadichāmi na tat siddhaṃ vṛthaivetye pariśramaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16799: Rm_38.425 [26] iti proktvā viṣaṇṇātmā nṛpatiḥ sa vimohitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16801: Rm_38.426 [27!] iti proktvā viṣaṇṇātmā nṛpatiḥ sa vimohitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16803: hā heti ninditātmānaṃ hā me bhāgyam apīha dhik //
S01ratnml_u:16804: Rm_38.427 [28] ity evaṃ vilapann aśrupūrṇāsyo gadgadaḥ svaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16805: hṛdi lalāṭe vāhubhyāṃ tāḍayan mūrchito muhuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16806: Rm_38.428 [28!] ity evaṃ vilapann aśrupūrṇāsyo gadgadaḥ svaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16807: hṛdi lalāṭe vāhubhyāṃ tāḍayan mūrchito muhuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16808: smṛtimāṃś ca svayam api tasthau tatra viniḥsvasan //
S01ratnml_u:16809: Rm_38.429 [29] ity evaṃ taṃ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sā śrīdevī vasuṃdharā /
S01ratnml_u:16811: Rm_38.430 [30] rājan mātra viṣīda tvaṃ setsyate te 'bhilāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16812: sarvaṃ seno vijānāti tat senaṃ pṛcha tad vidhiṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16813: Rm_38.431 [31] ity ākāśāt samuccāraṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sa bhūpatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16815: Rm_38.432 [31!] yā susmṛtā suruciraṃ suṣṭhutaraṃ pravṛddhaṃ dāridryaduḥkhaduritaṃ śamate narāṇāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16816: tāṃ kalpavṛkṣasadṛśīṃ vasudhārasaṃjñāṃ bhaktyā namāmi śirasā jagato hitāya //
S01ratnml_u:16817: Rm_38.433 [2!] praṇamāmi sadā vasudhāṃ jananīṃ karuṇārdrahṛdaṃ parivīkṣya janaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16818: bahudheti bhayānvitaduḥkhataraṃ praṇamāmi sadā vasudhāṃ jananīṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16819: Rm_38.434 [3!] pāpācārasya durbuddher durbhagasya sadā mama /
S01ratnml_u:16820: kṣaṃtavyo bhūyaśaś cāgaḥ śrīvasudhe namo 'stu te //
S01ratnml_u:16821: Rm_38.435 [32] namas te bho mahādevi prasīda me kṛpāṃ kuru /
S01ratnml_u:16822: bhavaṃty atra yathādiṣṭaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā khalu //
S01ratnml_u:16823: Rm_38.436 [33] ity uktvā sa nṛpo bhūyas tatra natvā kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16824: taṃ senaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā tato 'carat pramoditaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16825: Rm_38.437 [34] tataḥ sa nṛpatir gachan sahasā muditāśayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16827: Rm_38.438 [35] tatra prātaḥ sa bhūyas tam aśvaṃ dṛṣṭvā pramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16828: rājā taṃ senam ānatvā dṛṣṭvā evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:16829: Rm_38.439 [36] sena tam aśvam āruhya gacha tvaṃ puram āśrame /
S01ratnml_u:16831: Rm_38.440 [37] iti rājñoditaṃ śrutvā sa senaḥ sāṃjalir naman /
S01ratnml_u:16833: Rm_38.441 [38] naivam atra mahārāja yan me svāmi bhavān prabhuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16834: tad bhavadvāhanaṃ hīnaṃ katham ārohayeya vai //
S01ratnml_u:16835: Rm_38.442 [39] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sūryodaya ātmavit /
S01ratnml_u:16836: rājā taṃ senam ānatvā punar evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:16837: Rm_38.443 [40] mā tvayaivaṃ pravaktavyaṃ yad adyārabhya bhavān guruḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16839: Rm_38.444 [41] iti me vacanaṃ śrutvā mamānukaṃpayā 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:16841: Rm_38.445 [42] iti rājñoditaṃ śrutvā tatheti sa prabodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16842: svayam agre 'śvam āruhya pṛṣṭhe prārohayen nṛpaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16843: Rm_38.446 [43] tataḥ sa 'śvas tadārūḍho vāyur iva samuccaran /
S01ratnml_u:16845: Rm_38.447 [44] tatra taṃ nṛpam āyātaṃ samaṃtrijanapaurikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16847: Rm_38.448 [45] tatrāśvapṛṣṭham ārūḍhaṃ nṛpaṃ senaṃ puraḥ sthitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16848: dṛṣṭvā te maṃtriṇaḥ sarve paurāś ca vismayaṃ yayuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16849: Rm_38.449 [46] tatas te maṃtriṇo 'mātyā paurāḥ sarve pramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16851: Rm_38.450 [47] tatrāśvapṛṣṭhato rājā so 'varuhya svayaṃ tataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16852: senaṃ puraḥ sthitaṃ paścād avārohayad ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:16853: Rm_38.451 [48] tato rājakule gatvā nṛpaḥ pṛṣṭhataś caran /
S01ratnml_u:16856: Rm_38.452 [49] he sene sumater atra pādaprakṣālayāgrataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16858: tvattaḥ paścād ahaṃ pādau prakṣālayāmi sāṃprataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16859: Rm_38.453 [50] iti rājñoditaṃ śrutvā sa senaḥ sāṃjalir naman /
S01ratnml_u:16861: Rm_38.454 [51] vibhramo 'si kathaṃ rājan bhavān svāmi narādhipaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16862: tat prathamaṃ tvam evātra pādau prakṣālaya prabho //
S01ratnml_u:16863: Rm_38.455 [52] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā nṛpatiḥ sa kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16864: namaṃs taṃ senam ālokya tatraivaṃ saṃnyavedayat //
S01ratnml_u:16865: Rm_38.456 [53] bho sena yad bhavāṃ chāstā mama sanmārgadeśakaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16866: tad atra prathamaṃ pādau prakṣālayitum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:16867: Rm_38.457 [54] iti saṃprārthite rājñā sa senaḥ paribodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16868: rājña ājñā hy alaṃghyeti pādau prakṣālayet puraḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16869: Rm_38.458 [55] tataḥ sa nṛpatiḥ pādau prakṣālyānusaran mudā /
S01ratnml_u:16870: taṃ senaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā prāsāde samupācarat //
S01ratnml_u:16871: Rm_38.459 [56] tatrāsane purodhāya taṃ senaṃ gurum ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:16872: nṛpatiḥ sa sabhāmadhye tasthau lokān vilokayan //
S01ratnml_u:16873: Rm_38.460 [57] tataḥ sa nṛpatir dṛṣṭvā sarvāl lokān sabhāśritān /
S01ratnml_u:16875: Rm_38.461 [58] tan nṛpādeśitaṃ śrutvā sarve lokāḥ pramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16876: śrīdevyās tad vrataṃ dharttuṃ samaichanta dhanārthinaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16877: Rm_38.462 [59] tatas sarve 'pi te lokā natvā taṃ senam ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:16878: nṛpatiṃ ca samālokya svasvālayaṃ yayur mudā //
S01ratnml_u:16879: Rm_38.463 [60] tataḥ sa nṛpatis tena senena guruṇā saha /
S01ratnml_u:16880: sānaṃdaṃ prerayām āsa dināni katicin mudā //
S01ratnml_u:16881: Rm_38.464 [16] tataḥ sa bhūpatī rājā tadvratasamayāgate /
S01ratnml_u:16883: Rm_38.465 [62] bho maṃtriṇo janāḥ sarve vratasamayam āgataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16884: tasmāt sarve mayā sārddhaṃ vrataṃ caritum arhatha //
S01ratnml_u:16885: Rm_38.466 [63] tad enaṃ senam evātra pravrajyāsadguruṃ kuru /
S01ratnml_u:16886: iti maṃtribhir ākhyātaṃ śrutvā nṛpas tatheti saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16887: taṃ senaṃ śāsane bauddhe prāvrājayad yathāvidhi //
S01ratnml_u:16888: Rm_38.467 [64] sātha pravrajito nāmnā śrīsenagupta ity abhūt /
S01ratnml_u:16890: Rm_38.468 [65] tatas tad vratam utsṛjya vajradharapadāptaye /
S01ratnml_u:16892: Rm_38.469 [66] tataḥ sa nṛpatī rājā tad vrataṃ karttum ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:16894: Rm_38.470 [67] tataḥ śrīsenaguptaḥ sa vajrācāryo yathāvidhiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16896: Rm_38.471 [68] tato bhādrapade māse dvitīyāyāṃ site tare /
S01ratnml_u:16897: prātas tīrthe śubhe snātvā śuddhavastrāvṛtaḥ sudhīḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16900: Rm_38.473 [70] tad rātrau ca samārādhya śrīdevīṃ vidhinārcayet /
S01ratnml_u:16902: Rm_38.474 [71] tataḥ prātaḥ sa ācāryyas tīrthe snātvā suvastrabhṛt /
S01ratnml_u:16904: Rm_38.475 [72] tataḥ ca gurur ācāryas trisamādhisamāhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16908: Rm_38.477 [74] tatas te vratinaḥ sarve guruṃ natvā yathākramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16910: Rm_38.478 [75] tatas te vratinaḥ sarve śridevīsaṃmukhasthitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16912: Rm_38.479 [76] tatra tāṃ śrīmahādevīṃ sagaṇāṃ vidhinā kramāt /
S01ratnml_u:16914: Rm_38.480 [77] japastotrādikaṃ kṛtvā kṛtvā ca pāpadeśanāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16916: Rm_38.481 [78] kṛtāṃjalipuṭāḥ sarve te ca kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16918: Rm_38.482 [79] piṣṭakaṃ pāyasaṃ cāpi paṃcāmṛta samanvitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16920: Rm_38.483 [80] tato lokādhipebhyo 'pi sa bhūtebhyo mahāvaliṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16922: Rm_38.484 [81] tataḥ śāstā sa ācāryaḥ prārthayitvā kṣamāṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:16924: Rm_38.485 [82] tat sūtraṃ vratinaḥ sarve ādāya guruṇārppitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16926: Rm_38.486 [83] yā rājño mahiṣī bhāryā cūḍadevīti viśrutā /
S01ratnml_u:16927: saikā tat sūtram ādāya ca vandhan evam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:16928: Rm_38.487 [84] tato vratasamāpte sā svālayaṃ samupāśritā /
S01ratnml_u:16931: maṇḍitā yā kare vaddham iti tyaktuṃ samaihata //
S01ratnml_u:16932: Rm_38.489 [86] tataḥ sā durmatī rājñī rakṣāsūtram api svayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16934: Rm_38.490 [87] tasminn avasare tatra nimvadevyāḥ sakhī vanāt /
S01ratnml_u:16936: Rm_38.491 [88] tatra sā tad vratotsāhaśabdaṃ śrutvā sa kautukā /
S01ratnml_u:16938: Rm_38.492 [89] cūḍadevyā yad utkṣiptaṃ sūtraṃ vātāyanād bahiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16939: niścaran mūrddhani tasyāḥ sakhāḥ saṃnyapatad drutaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16940: Rm_38.493 [90] sā tat sūtraṃ samādāya paśyantī kim idaṃ nv iti /
S01ratnml_u:16942: Rm_38.494 [91] tataḥ sa preṣikā devyā bhogyam aprārthayaṃty api /
S01ratnml_u:16943: tat sūtram eva dhṛtvāśu nimvavanaṃ mudācaran //
S01ratnml_u:16944: Rm_38.495 [92] tatra sā sahasā gatvā bhartṛkāyāḥ purogatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16946: Rm_38.496 [93] jayo 'stu te mahādevi yad ahaṃ rājamaṃdire /
S01ratnml_u:16948: Rm_38.497 [94] cūḍadevyā svayaṃ chitvā vratasūtram idaṃ bahiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16949: kṣiptaṃ gavākṣaraṃdhrān me mūrddhni sajati niścarat //
S01ratnml_u:16950: Rm_38.498 [95] dṛṣṭvā tad aham ādāya vratasūtram idaṃ khalu /
S01ratnml_u:16951: iti matvātra te bhogyam ayācitvā vraje drutaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16952: Rm_38.499 [96] tathāvām api he devi dhṛtvedaṃ vratasūtrakaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16954: Rm_38.500 [97] sā śrīdevī vasuṃdhārā dṛṣṭvā nau bhaktisādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:16955: svayam atra samāśritya saṃdadyād api saṃpadaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16956: Rm_38.501 [98] yadi nau daivayogena saṃpattir nātra vidyate /
S01ratnml_u:16957: puṇyaṃ tu khalu vidyeta tataḥ syāj janma sāphalaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:16958: Rm_38.502 [99] iti matvātra bho devi snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtau /
S01ratnml_u:16959: śrīdevīṃ manasā dhyātvā smṛtvā vrataṃ carāvahe //
S01ratnml_u:16960: Rm_38.503 [100] iti sakhyā samākhyātaṃ nimvadevī niśamya sā /
S01ratnml_u:16962: Rm_38.504 [1] tatas tatheha evaṃ te snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛte /
S01ratnml_u:16965: dhyātvā smṛtvā samādhāya saṃcarate vrataṃ mudā //
S01ratnml_u:16966: Rm_38.506 [3] tasminn avasare tatra sā śrīdevī vasuṃdharā /
S01ratnml_u:16968: Rm_38.507 [4] tatra sā jyāyasī vṛddhā prakīrṇaśuklamūrddhajā /
S01ratnml_u:16970: Rm_38.508 [5] bhadrike tvam ihāgacha cūḍadevyāḥ puro gatā /
S01ratnml_u:16972: Rm_38.509 [6] iti tayā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā ceṭī tatheti sā /
S01ratnml_u:16974: Rm_38.510 [7] devī mātāmahī vṛddhā jyāyasī te ihāgatā /
S01ratnml_u:16975: bhavaṃtyo darśanaṃ kartum ichantī dvāri tiṣṭhati //
S01ratnml_u:16976: Rm_38.511 [8] tad bhavaṃtī samāgacha tasyā darśanam ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:16978: Rm_38.512 [9] iti tayā samākhyātaṃ cūḍadevī niśamya sā /
S01ratnml_u:16979: na me mātāmahī kā sā dhyātvety evaṃ ca prāvadat //
S01ratnml_u:16980: Rm_38.513 [10] mama mātāmahī nāsti kāsāv iha samāgatā /
S01ratnml_u:16981: iti proktvā tvayā dvārāt sahasā preṣyatāṃ balāt //
S01ratnml_u:16982: Rm_38.514 [11] iti devyoditaṃ śrutvā tatheti sā sakhī gatā /
S01ratnml_u:16983: vṛddhāṃtikam upāśritya dṛṣṭvā tām evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:16984: Rm_38.515 [12] mātāmahī na me kā cid iti devī vadaty api /
S01ratnml_u:16985: ataḥ sā te mukhaṃ draṣṭuṃ naiveha samupāvrajet //
S01ratnml_u:16986: Rm_38.516 [13] atas tvam iha mā tiṣṭha gachātaḥ sahasā vahiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:16987: na vrajer yadi sā devī praiṣayet tvāṃ balād api //
S01ratnml_u:16988: Rm_38.517 [14] iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sā vṛddhā tata utthitā /
S01ratnml_u:16989: na tiṣṭheyam iti proktvā tataḥ śanair yayau vahiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:16990: Rm_38.518 [15] tataḥ sā śrīmahādevī vṛddhī rūpadharā tathā /
S01ratnml_u:16992: Rm_38.519 [16] tatra sā jyāyasī vṛddhā śanair dvāram upāśritā /
S01ratnml_u:16994: Rm_38.520 [17] dārike tvam ihāgacha kiṃ cin me vacanaṃ śṛṇu /
S01ratnml_u:16996: Rm_38.521 [18] etan me vacanam śrutvā nimvadevyā purogatā /
S01ratnml_u:16997: vṛddhekā te mukhaṃ draṣṭum āgateti nivedaya //
S01ratnml_u:16998: Rm_38.522 [19] iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sā ceṭī sādaraṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:16999: paśyaṃti sāṃjalir natvā tāṃ vṛddhām evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:17000: Rm_38.523 [20] mātāmahi samāgacha bhavaṃtyā gaditaṃ yathā /
S01ratnml_u:17002: Rm_38.524 [21] ity uktvā sā sakhī tasyā nimvadevyāḥ puro gatā /
S01ratnml_u:17004: Rm_38.525 [22] devi tava vicārārthe vṛddhaikeha samāgatā /
S01ratnml_u:17006: Rm_38.526 [23] iti sakhyoditaṃ śrutvā nimvadevī samutthitā /
S01ratnml_u:17007: sahasā samupāgatya tāṃ vṛddhām evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:17008: Rm_38.527 [24] svāgataṃ bhadrike jeṣṭhe mātāmahi samāvraja /
S01ratnml_u:17010: Rm_38.528 [25] ity uktvā sā subhadrāṃśā nimvadevī samādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:17012: Rm_38.529 [26] tatra sā jyāyasī vṛddhā svāsane samupāśṛtā /
S01ratnml_u:17014: Rm_38.530 [27] kiṃ ve 'tra carase vatse tan me vaktuṃ tvam arhasi /
S01ratnml_u:17015: kasminn arthe 'bhilāṣaṃ te tavāpi me puro vada //
S01ratnml_u:17016: Rm_38.531 [28] iti tayā samākhyātaṃ nimvadevī niśamya sā /
S01ratnml_u:17018: Rm_38.532 [29] kim atrāhaṃ vadiṣyāmi mandabhāgyāsmi duḥkhitā /
S01ratnml_u:17019: daridritā na me saṃpad vidyate 'tra gṛhe kvacit //
S01ratnml_u:17020: Rm_38.533 [30] vratopahārasāmagrim api kiṃ cin na vidyate /
S01ratnml_u:17022: Rm_38.534 [31] tan mayā śraddhayā bhaktimātreṇa śrīvasuṃdharāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17023: dhyātvā smṛtvā samārādhya saṃcaritam idaṃ vrataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17025: tad vidhinā vrataiḥ karttuṃ śakyate na mayā tathā //
S01ratnml_u:17028: Rm_38.537 [34] etat tayā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sā jyāyasī mudā /
S01ratnml_u:17029: taṃ rājñīṃ sasakhīṃ bhadrāṃ samālokyaivam adiśat //
S01ratnml_u:17030: Rm_38.538 [35] siddhyatu te vrataṃ pūrṇaṃ carasvevaṃ samāhitā /
S01ratnml_u:17031: śraddhayā bhaktibhāvena smṛtvā devīṃ sadā bhaja //
S01ratnml_u:17032: Rm_38.539 [36] tathā sā śrīmahādevī vasulakṣmīḥ prasāditā /
S01ratnml_u:17034: Rm_38.540 [37] tatas tasyā mahādevyāḥ prabhāvena sadā tava /
S01ratnml_u:17036: Rm_38.541 [38] tatas te sarvasaṃpattiparipūrṇaṃ bhaved gṛhe /
S01ratnml_u:17037: tatas tvaṃ svechayā dānaṃ datvārthibhyaḥ śubhe cara //
S01ratnml_u:17038: Rm_38.542 [39] etatpuṇyaparītā tvaṃ sarvadā sadgatīṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17040: Rm_38.543 [40] sākṣād arhatpadaṃ prāptā saṃbuddhālayam āpnuyāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17043: Rm_38.544 [41] ity uktvā sā mahādevī tyaktvā vṛddhākṛtiṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:17044: dhṛtvā rūpaṃ vasuṃdharyyā tasthau sarvagaṇair vṛtā //
S01ratnml_u:17045: Rm_38.545 [42] tāṃ devīṃ śrīprabhāsvaṃtīṃ sagaṇān samavasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:17046: ālokya nimvadevī sā tasthau kṣaṇaṃ suvismitā //
S01ratnml_u:17047: Rm_38.546 [43] tataḥ svapnavibuddheva sākṣāt tāṃ śrīvasuṃ dharāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17048: dṛṣṭvā sā sahasotthāya sāṃjali nyapatat puraḥ //
S01ratnml_u:17049: Rm_38.547 [44] tataḥ sā śrīmahādevī tāṃ rajñīṃ purato natāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17050: dhṛtvā hastena he vatsa uttiṣṭhety evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:17051: Rm_38.548 [45] vatse dāridryaduḥkhaṃ te naśyate sāṃprataṃ khalu /
S01ratnml_u:17052: sarvadātra gṛhe saṃpat parivṛddhā bhaved api //
S01ratnml_u:17053: Rm_38.549 [46] ity ādiṣṭaṃ tayā devyā nimvadevī niśamya sā /
S01ratnml_u:17054: utthāya sāṃjali devīṃ prādrākṣīt tāṃ vasuṃdharāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17055: Rm_38.550 [47] gṛhe cāpi mahāsaṃpat paripūrṇaṃ samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17056: paśyantī kim idaṃ svapnam ity uktvā samalokayat //
S01ratnml_u:17057: Rm_38.551 [48] tataḥ sā śrivasuṃdhārā mahādevī gaṇaiḥ saha /
S01ratnml_u:17059: Rm_38.552 [49] tatra sā nimvadevī tāṃ śrīdevīṃ sagaṇāṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:17061: Rm_38.553 [50] tataś caitanyam āṣādya sā rājñī paribodhitā /
S01ratnml_u:17062: tāṃ devīṃ sagaṇāṃ dhātvā smṛtvā tasthau samāhitaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17063: Rm_38.554 [51] tatas tasyā nimvadevyā udyāneṣu samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17067: Rm_38.556 [53] gṛhaṃ cāpi manoramyaṃ prāspādaṃ divyasaṃnibhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17069: Rm_38.557 [54] tad īdṛg bhavanaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathodyānaṃ manoramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17071: Rm_38.558 [55] tadā sa nṛpatiś cūḍadevyā vrataṃ na dhāritaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17073: Rm_38.559 [56] tataḥ so nṛpatī rājā maṃtribhiḥ paribodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17074: mahiṣīṃ tāṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ sametyevam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:17075: Rm_38.560 [57] are re hetunā kena tvayā na dhāritaṃ vrataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17076: vratasūtraṃ kathaṃ chitvā visṛṣṭaṃ tad vadasva me //
S01ratnml_u:17077: Rm_38.561 [58] iti rājñoditaṃ śrutvā cūḍadevī pragarvitā /
S01ratnml_u:17078: svāminaṃs api taṃ bhūpam anādṛtyyaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:17079: Rm_38.562 [59] mamaitac chrīsamṛddhāsti gṛhe ratnādi saṃyutā /
S01ratnml_u:17081: Rm_38.563 [60] iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā nṛpatiḥ sa prakopitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17082: prayatnād api tāṃ bhāryāṃ bodhayituṃ śaśāka na //
S01ratnml_u:17083: Rm_38.564 [61] tataḥ sa nṛpati rājā tadvratadhāraṇotsukaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17084: sakhīm ekāṃ samāhūya pura evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:17085: Rm_38.565 [62] sakhī tvaṃ me vacaḥ śrutvā gacha nimvavane 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:17087: Rm_38.566 [63] svāmī sa nṛpatī rājā vrataṃ caritum ichati /
S01ratnml_u:17088: vasulakṣmyās tvayā sārddhaṃ tad āśu gamyatām iti //
S01ratnml_u:17089: Rm_38.567 [64] sā tatheti pratiśrutya drutaṃ nimvavane gatā /
S01ratnml_u:17092: tatra tad bhavanaṃ ramyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasthau sakautukā //
S01ratnml_u:17093: Rm_38.569 [66] tataḥ sā suciraṃ dṛṣṭvā muditā vismayānvitā /
S01ratnml_u:17094: nimvadevyāḥ puro gatvā pādau natvaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:17095: Rm_38.570 [67] devi tvadantike rājñā preṣitāhaṃ samāgatā /
S01ratnml_u:17096: tad bhavaṃtī prabhor ājñāṃ śrotum arhati sāṃprataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17097: Rm_38.571 [68] sa svāmī śrīvasuṃdharyyā vrataṃ carati sapriyaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17099: Rm_38.572 [69] tattvayā saha sa svāmī vrataṃ caritum ichati /
S01ratnml_u:17100: tat tvadāhūtaye rājñā preṣitāhaṃ tathātra hi //
S01ratnml_u:17101: Rm_38.573 [70] tad bhavaṃtī prabhor ājñāṃ śiro dhṛtvā samādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:17102: tad vrataṃ carituṃ bharttrā sahāśv āgaṃtum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:17103: Rm_38.574 [71] iti tayā samākhyātaṃ nimvadevī niśamya sā /
S01ratnml_u:17104: tāṃ ceṭīṃ svāmino dūtīṃ samālokyaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:17105: Rm_38.575 [72] sakhy atra śrīvasuṃdhārāvrataṃ mayā vidhāryate /
S01ratnml_u:17107: Rm_38.576 [73] tad ahaṃ sāṃprataṃ tatra nechāmi carituṃ vrataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17109: Rm_38.577 [74] tad ahaṃ nāgamiṣyāmi tacchaitat kathitaṃ mayā /
S01ratnml_u:17110: nṛpateḥ purato gatvā vaktavyaṃ nānyathā tvayā //
S01ratnml_u:17111: Rm_38.578 [75] iti tayā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā ceṭī tatheti sā /
S01ratnml_u:17112: tāṃ rājñīṃ sāṃjalī natvā pratyāyayau nṛpālayaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17113: Rm_38.579 [76] tatra sā nṛpateḥ pādau praṇamya sāṃjaliḥ puraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17115: tat tayā kathitaṃ śrutvā sa rājā vismayāhataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17116: Rm_38.580 [77] tat tayā kathitaṃ śrutvā sa rājā vismayāhataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17118: bhūyas tāṃ ceṭikāṃ dūtīṃ samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat //
S01ratnml_u:17119: Rm_38.581 [78] bhūyo 'pi tatra gacha tvaṃ bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17121: Rm_38.582 [79] ity ādiṣṭaṃ narendreṇa śrutvā sā ceṭikāpi ca /
S01ratnml_u:17123: Rm_38.583 [80] kiṃ tatrāhaṃ gamisyāmi nimvadevīha māvrajet /
S01ratnml_u:17124: yat sā tatra mahāsaukhyaṃ bhuktvā tiṣṭhati sāṃprataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17125: Rm_38.584 [81] yat tasyā bhavanaṃ ramyaṃ prāsādaṃ bhavate 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:17129: Rm_38.586 [83] kim atra vahimoktena divyaśrī saṃpadānvitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17130: yadi tad ichasi draṣṭuṃ tatra gatvābhilokaya //
S01ratnml_u:17131: Rm_38.587 [84] evaṃ tayoditaṃ śrutvā sa rājā tṛṣitānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17132: tathā tad bhavanaṃ draṣṭuṃ sahasā gaṃtum aichata //
S01ratnml_u:17133: Rm_38.588 [85] tataḥ sa nṛpatī rājā sakhimaṃtrijanaiḥ saha /
S01ratnml_u:17136: puṣkariṇīś ca dūrāt sa rājādrākṣīn manoharāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:17137: Rm_38.590 [87] bhavanaṃ ca manoramyaṃ prāsādaṃ divyakalpitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17138: dṛṣṭvā sa mudito rājā sa śīghraṃ dvārāntike yayau //
S01ratnml_u:17139: Rm_38.591 [88] tan nṛpaṃ samupāyātaṃ dṛṣṭvā devyāḥ sakhī drutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17141: Rm_38.592 [89] devī prasīda yad bharttā svāmīha svayam āgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17142: tad bhavaṃtī prasannāsyā darśanaṃ dātum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:17143: Rm_38.593 [90] iti sakhyoditam śrutvā nimvadevī praharṣitā /
S01ratnml_u:17145: Rm_38.594 [91] tatra sa bhūpatī rājā praviśya maṃdire caran /
S01ratnml_u:17146: tāṃ devīṃ samupāmaṃtrya prayayau sahite janaiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:17147: Rm_38.595 [92] tatra taṃ prabhum āyātaṃ nimvadevī samīkṣya sā /
S01ratnml_u:17149: Rm_38.596 [93] tatra sa prabhur ālokya tāṃ bhāryāṃ śrīsamāṃśikāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17151: Rm_38.597 [94] tatra tāṃ śrīsamākāraṃ nimvadevīṃ nirīkṣya saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17152: rājā prabhuḥ svayaṃ dhṛtvā sahāsane nyaveśayat //
S01ratnml_u:17153: Rm_38.598 [95] tatas tau daṃpatī tatra sahāsane samāśritau /
S01ratnml_u:17155: Rm_38.599 [96] tataḥ sa nṛpatī svāmī sakautukapramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17157: Rm_38.600 [97] kathaṃ te bhavanaṃ ramyaṃ prāsādaṃ bhavane 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:17158: udyānaṃ ca manoramyaṃ jāyate tad vadasva me //
S01ratnml_u:17159: Rm_38.601 [98] iti pṛṣṭe nareṃdreṇa nimvadevī vinoditā /
S01ratnml_u:17160: taṃ prabhuṃ sāṃjalir natvā samālokyaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:17161: Rm_38.602 [99] śṛṇu svāmin mahārāja yadi śrotuṃ tvam ichasi /
S01ratnml_u:17162: tathāhaṃ kathayiṣyāmi yan me saṃpat prajāyate //
S01ratnml_u:17163: Rm_38.603 [100] pratyahaṃ yat tvayā dattaṃ tad bhogyaṃ yācituṃ sakhī /
S01ratnml_u:17165: Rm_38.604 [1] tatreyaṃ sahasā gatvā prāsādaikāṃtam āśritā /
S01ratnml_u:17167: Rm_38.605 [2] tad dṛṣṭvaivaṃ sakhī gṛhya kim idam iti vīkṣya sā /
S01ratnml_u:17169: Rm_38.606 [3] tad dṛṣṭvāyaṃ mayā pṛṣṭā tyaktvāhāram idaṃ kutaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17170: sūtram ādāya praiṣi tvaṃ tat katham ucyatām iti //
S01ratnml_u:17171: Rm_38.607 [4] tatheyaṃ paripṛṣṭā me vistareṇaivam abravīt /
S01ratnml_u:17172: svāmini yadi te śrotuṃ vāṃchāsti śrūyatām iti //
S01ratnml_u:17173: Rm_38.608 [5] pratyahaṃ svāmināhāraṃ dattaṃ tad yācituṃ tadā /
S01ratnml_u:17174: tatra rājakule devyā vratotsāhaṃ śṛṇomy ahaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17175: Rm_38.609 [6] tad vrataśabdam ākarṇya tatraikāṃte samāśritā /
S01ratnml_u:17176: tadā vātāyanāt kṣiptaṃ sūtraṃ patati me mama //
S01ratnml_u:17177: Rm_38.610 [7] tad idaṃ sūtram ālokyamiti vismayānvitā /ālokya kim iti?
S01ratnml_u:17178: tyaktvāhāram idaṃ sūtram ādāya sahasā vraje //
S01ratnml_u:17179: Rm_38.611 [8] ity uktveyaṃ sakhī me 'gre upasthāyāpy adarśayat /
S01ratnml_u:17181: Rm_38.612 [9] tataś ceyaṃ sakhi dṛṣṭvā premnā hitārthavāṃchinī /
S01ratnml_u:17183: Rm_38.613 [10] bhavaṃty api tathā śraddhābhaktimātreṇa sarvadā /
S01ratnml_u:17184: śrīdevīṃ manasā dhyātvā smṛtvārādhya vrataṃ cara //
S01ratnml_u:17185: Rm_38.614 [11] ity asyā vacanaṃ śrutvā tathāhaṃ bhaktimātrataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17187: Rm_38.615 [12] tadaikā jyāyasī vṛddhā mātāmahī tavāgatā /
S01ratnml_u:17188: ity ākhyāya śanair atra mamāgre samupāgatā //
S01ratnml_u:17190: tataś ca māṃ samālokya kuśalaṃ samapṛchata //
S01ratnml_u:17191: Rm_38.617 [14] tataś cāsau parijñāya mayātra vratasādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17192: kiṃ vrataṃ sadhyate vatsa iti māṃ paryapṛchata //
S01ratnml_u:17193: Rm_38.618 [15] tatas tāṃ sāṃjalir natvā nyavedayan samādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:17194: mātāmahi nu me kiṃ cid api dravyaṃ na vidyate //
S01ratnml_u:17195: Rm_38.619 [16] tad ahaṃ śraddhayā bhaktibhāvamātreṇa sādaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17196: śrīdevīṃ manasā dhyātvā smṛtvārādhya vrataṃ care //
S01ratnml_u:17197: Rm_38.620 [17] iti mayoditaṃ śrutvā sā vṛddhā parimoditā /
S01ratnml_u:17199: Rm_38.621 [18] tad upādiṣṭam ākarṇya muditā saṃpramoditā /
S01ratnml_u:17201: Rm_38.622 [19] tadā sā tajjyāyasī rūpaṃ tyaktvātra ca kṣaṇād api /
S01ratnml_u:17203: Rm_38.623 [20] ato 'haṃ sahasotthāya dṛṣṭvā tāṃ śrīvasuṃdharāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17206: sagaṇā me varaṃ datvā vyavadhānam ito 'vrajat //
S01ratnml_u:17208: idaṃ me bhavanaṃ ramyaṃ prāsādaṃ bhavate kṣaṇāt //
S01ratnml_u:17217: Rm_38.630 [27] īdṛśī mahatī saṃpat samudbhūtā mama kṣaṇāt /
S01ratnml_u:17218: tat sarvaṃ śrīmahādevyāḥ prasādād api nānyathā //
S01ratnml_u:17219: Rm_38.631 [28] iti vijñāya rājendra tasyā devyāḥ sadā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:17220: śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatvā vrataṃ caritum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:17222: yāvadbhavaṃ vrajer naiva durgatīṃ ca kadā cana //
S01ratnml_u:17223: Rm_38.633 [30] sadgatau satsukhāny eva labdho sadā śubhe caran /
S01ratnml_u:17225: Rm_38.634 [31] tataḥ pāramitāḥ sarvāḥ pūrayitvā yathākramāt /
S01ratnml_u:17226: svayaṃ caraṃ parāṃ cāpi bodhimārge niyojayet //
S01ratnml_u:17227: Rm_38.635 [32] tato māragaṇān sarvāṃ jitvā śuddhatrimaṃḍalaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17229: Rm_38.636 [33] iti tayā mahādevyāḥ samupādiṣṭam atra me /
S01ratnml_u:17230: tac chrutvā sarvadā svāmi mano 'tirocate vrataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17231: Rm_38.637 [34] tad ahaṃ sarvadā tasyāḥ śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatā /
S01ratnml_u:17233: Rm_38.638 [35] tathā bhavān api svamiñ chrīdevyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17235: Rm_38.639 [36] iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa rājābhyanumoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17236: tathā sadā mahādevyā vrataṃ caritum aichata //
S01ratnml_u:17237: Rm_38.640 [37] tatraivaṃ sa mahīpālo nimvadevyā tayā saha /
S01ratnml_u:17238: yathākāmaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā tasthau krīḍan yathechayā //
S01ratnml_u:17239: Rm_38.641 [38] evaṃ krīḍan sa rājendro nimvadevyā sahārataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17241: Rm_38.642 [39] tatraivaṃ taṃ mahīpālaṃ nimvadevyā saha sthitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17243: Rm_38.643 [40] tataḥ sā cūḍadevī taṃ svāminaṃ tatra saṃsthitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17245: Rm_38.644 [41] tataḥ sā krodhitā caṇḍī cūḍadevī pradhāvitā /
S01ratnml_u:17249: Rm_38.646 [43] tallaṃghitātipāpena sā devī tatkṣaṇād api /
S01ratnml_u:17251: Rm_38.647 [44] tatra tāṃ sahasāyātāṃ lokān dṛṣṭvā bhayotthitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17253: Rm_38.648 [45] tad virāvaṃ janāḥ sarve śrutvā tatra samutthitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17255: Rm_38.649 [46] tat kolāhalaṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā saṃtrasitāśayā /
S01ratnml_u:17257: Rm_38.650 [47] tatraikā vibhramaṃtī sā daivasaṃpreritā vane /
S01ratnml_u:17259: Rm_38.651 [48] tathā sā dūrato gatvā prādrākṣīt sarasī dvayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17260: dṛṣṭvā sā tatra tṛṣṇārttā jalaṃ pātum upācarat //
S01ratnml_u:17261: Rm_38.652 [49] tadā te sarasī yuddhaṃ parasparaṃ pracakratuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17262: dṛṣṭvā sā vismitā 'pītvā jalaṃ tasthau savismayā //
S01ratnml_u:17263: Rm_38.653 [50] tatra te sarasī dṛṣṭvā tāṃ kolavadanāṃ striyaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17264: kutra gaṃtum ihaiṣi tvam ity evaṃ paryapṛchatāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17265: Rm_38.654 [51] tat pṛṣṭaṃ sā samākarṇya sā śaṃkavismayāhatā /
S01ratnml_u:17266: kim etad iti saṃciṃtya kṣaṇaṃ tasthau vimohitā //
S01ratnml_u:17267: Rm_38.655 [52] tatra sā daivayogena pratilabhya sucetanāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17268: kiṃ mayātrāpi vaktavyam iti dhyātvā vyaciṃtayat //
S01ratnml_u:17269: Rm_38.656 [53] hā katham iha prāptāhaṃ bhramāmi nirjane vane /
S01ratnml_u:17270: kiṃ mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yena bhraṣṭā carāmy ahaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17271: Rm_38.657 [54] hā kiṃ kuryāṃ kva gacheyaṃ sahāyaikāpi me 'sti na /
S01ratnml_u:17272: sarvathātra vinaṣṭāsmi ko māṃ rakṣed ihā 'dhunā //
S01ratnml_u:17273: Rm_38.658 [55] iti ciṃtāviṣaṇṇā sā tasthau tatra nirāśitā /
S01ratnml_u:17275: Rm_38.659 [56] tad devīsmṛtipuṇyena sā karmabhāvinī sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17276: yat svayaṃ prakṛtaṃ karma tat sarvaṃ paryyabudhyatāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17277: Rm_38.660 [57] hā mayā durdhiyā tatra samyan na dhāritaṃ vrataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17278: etatpāpena nūnaṃ me jāte 'yam īdṛśī vipat //
S01ratnml_u:17279: Rm_38.661 [58] tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi kolamukhī yato 'smy ahaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17280: tat tatra kathaṃ evaṃ hi pratiyāyaṃ nṛpālayaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17281: Rm_38.662 [59] yac cāhaṃ durmatir duṣṭā svakṛtapāpabhāginī /
S01ratnml_u:17282: tad daivapreṣitā hy atra bhramāmi nirjane vane //
S01ratnml_u:17283: Rm_38.663 [60] tad atra kiṃ careyāhaṃ jīvite 'pi na me ruciḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17284: sarveṣām api jaṃtūnāṃ sarvatra maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17285: Rm_38.664 [61] iti matvāham atrāpi nirapekṣaḥ svajīvite /
S01ratnml_u:17286: śrīdevyā darśanaṃ karttuṃ smṛtvā gacheya sāṃprataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17287: Rm_38.665 [62] iti niścitya sā rājñī cūḍadevī samudyatā /
S01ratnml_u:17288: śrīdevyā darśanaṃ kartuṃ smṛtvā caritum aichata //
S01ratnml_u:17289: tataḥ sā cūḍadevī te sarasī dve samīkṣya ca /
S01ratnml_u:17290: Rm_38.666 [63] tataḥ sā cūḍadevī te sarasī dve samīkṣya ca /
S01ratnml_u:17292: upetya taj jalaṃ pītvā tīre sthitvaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:17293: Rm_38.667 [64] sarasī yad ahaṃ mūḍhā durmatī maṃdabhāginī /
S01ratnml_u:17294: tac chrīvasuṃdharāṃ devīṃ draṣṭum ihāvrajāmi hi //
S01ratnml_u:17295: Rm_38.668 [65] iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā puṣkariṇyāv ubhe 'pi te /
S01ratnml_u:17297: Rm_38.669 [7] sādhu sādhu mahābhāge vrajāstu maṃgalaṃ tava /
S01ratnml_u:17298: puna nau vacasā devīm evaṃ pṛcha tvam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:17299: Rm_38.670 [8] sādhu sādhu mahābhāge vrajāstu maṃgalaṃ tava /
S01ratnml_u:17300: puna nau vacasā devīm evaṃ pṛcha tvam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:17301: kenāvāṃ hetunā yuddhaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāvahe sadā //
S01ratnml_u:17302: Rm_38.671 [9] ity etat kathitaṃ tābhyāṃ śrutvā rājñī tatheti sā /
S01ratnml_u:17304: Rm_38.672 [10] tatrāraṇye bhramaṃtī sā kiṃ cid dūraṃ gatā tataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17306: Rm_38.673 [11] tatra sā dūrataḥ sthitvā paśyaṃs taṃ bhīmaśūkaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17307: mātrā tiṣṭha vrajānyatra sahaseti tam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:17308: Rm_38.674 [12] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sa śūkaraḥ samutthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17310: Rm_38.675 [13] kā tvaṃ kuta ihāyāsi kutra gaṃtuṃ pradhāvasi /
S01ratnml_u:17311: ekākinī kathaṃ bhrāṃto vana etad vadasva me //
S01ratnml_u:17312: Rm_38.676 [14] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sā devī praticitritā /
S01ratnml_u:17313: śanair upetya taṃ pretaṃ saṃpaśyann evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:17316: Rm_38.678 [16] iti tad gaditaṃ śrutvā śūkaraḥ so 'tivismitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17317: tāṃ devīṃ samupāśritya paśyann evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:17318: Rm_38.679 [17] sādhu sādhvi mahābhāge vrajāstu te sumaṃgalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17320: Rm_38.680 [18] bhūyo me vacasā sādhvī tāṃ devīṃ paripṛchatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17322: Rm_38.681 [19] etat tat kathitaṃ śrutvā cūḍadevī tatheti sā /
S01ratnml_u:17326: Rm_38.683 [21] tatra sa preta ālokya tāṃ devīṃ samupāgatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17328: Rm_38.684 [22] ko tvaṃ kuta ihāyāsi kutra gaṃtum ihāgatā /
S01ratnml_u:17329: niḥsahāyā kathaṃ bhrāṃtā carate tad vadasva me //
S01ratnml_u:17330: Rm_38.685 [23] iti tat kathitaṃ śrutvā sā devī vismayānvitā /
S01ratnml_u:17331: śanair upetya taṃ pretaṃ paśyaṃty evam avocata //
S01ratnml_u:17334: Rm_38.687 [25] iti tad uditaṃ śrutvā sa preto 'tivicitritaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17335: tāṃ devīṃ sāṃjalir natvā pura evam avocata //
S01ratnml_u:17336: Rm_38.688 [26] sādhu sādhvi mahābhāge carāstu te subhadrakaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17338: bhūyo 'pi vacasā me tāṃ śrīdevīṃ paripṛchatu /
S01ratnml_u:17339: Rm_38.689 [27] bhūyo 'pi vacasā me tāṃ śrīdevīṃ paripṛchatu /
S01ratnml_u:17342: Rm_38.690 [28] etat tat kathitaṃ śrutvā cūḍadevī tatheti sā /
S01ratnml_u:17344: Rm_38.691 [29] te 'pi tāṃ samupāyātāṃ dṛṣṭvopetyevam abruvan /
S01ratnml_u:17345: kā tvaṃ kuta ihāyāsi kutra gaṃtuṃ ca tad vada //
S01ratnml_u:17346: Rm_38.692 [30] iti tair gaditaṃ śrutvā sā devī samupāsthitā /
S01ratnml_u:17347: tān sarvān pāpino dṛṣṭvā pura evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:17350: Rm_38.694 [32] iti tad gaditaṃ śrutvā sarve te daśapāpinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17351: kṛtāṃjalipuṭā natvā tāṃ devīm evam abruvan //
S01ratnml_u:17352: Rm_38.695 [33] sādhu devī mahābhāge pravrajāstu jayaṃ tava /
S01ratnml_u:17353: asmākaṃ prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tāṃ devīṃ paripṛchatu //
S01ratnml_u:17354: Rm_38.696 [34] iti tad deśitaṃ śrutvā cūḍadevī tatheti sā /
S01ratnml_u:17356: Rm_38.697 [35] tatra sa kṛṣṇasarpas tām ālokya samupāgatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17358: Rm_38.698 [36] tataḥ sā mūrchitā devī cirāt svayaṃ samutthitā /
S01ratnml_u:17359: tāṃ śrīvasuṃdharāṃ smṛtvā tatra tasthau kṣaṇaṃ tathā //
S01ratnml_u:17361: kālasarpaḥ sa tām āha kā tvaṃ kutaḥ samāgatā //
S01ratnml_u:17362: Rm_38.700 [38] cūḍadevī tataḥ prāha sūryodayapriyāsmy ahaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17364: Rm_38.701 [39] tataḥ pātakamuktā sā pracaraṃtī bubhukṣitā /
S01ratnml_u:17366: Rm_38.702 [40] tatra tat phalam ālokya hastābhyāṃ sahasāgrahīt /
S01ratnml_u:17367: tasya hi daivayogena tatphalaṃ na vyamuṃcyata //
S01ratnml_u:17368: Rm_38.703 [41] tatra sā tatphale lagnahastā tasthau tathā kṣaṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17369: tataḥ sā trasitā dṛṣṭvā na gṛhnāmīti cāvadat //
S01ratnml_u:17370: Rm_38.704 [42] etad ukte bhujau tasyās tat phalaṃ sahasātyajat /
S01ratnml_u:17372: Rm_38.705 [43] tataḥ sā dūrato nadyāḥ śabdaṃ śrutvā pradhāvitā /
S01ratnml_u:17374: Rm_38.706 [44] tatra sā taj jalaṃ pātuṃ sahasā samupācarat /
S01ratnml_u:17375: tatra sā taj jalaṃ pītvā snātvā caiva samāśrayat //
S01ratnml_u:17378: Rm_38.708 [46] tatra sā tāḥ samālokya sahasopetya sāṃjaliḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17380: Rm_38.709 [47] aho bhāgyaṃ mayā labdhaṃ yad bhavatyātra darśitā /
S01ratnml_u:17381: tad dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā sarvā snātum arhanti sarvathā //
