S01ratnml_u:17905: Rm_38.962 [99] yaś cāpi ca tadā kleśasaṃghasamākule tathā /
S01ratnml_u:17906: tyaktaḥ svaprāṇakāyo yaḥ saddharmaṃ śṛṇuyān mudā //
S01ratnml_u:17909: Rm_38.964 [1] yaś cāpy eva kalau kāle saddharmāntarhite tathā /
S01ratnml_u:17911: Rm_38.965 [2] sa 'pi syāt sugataputro mahādhīro viśāradaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17913: Rm_38.966 [3] yaś cāpi parataḥ śrutvā saddharmaṃ saugatoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17915: Rm_38.967 [4] sarvatīrthābhiṣeke yat puṇyaṃ tat sarvam āpnuyuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17916: sarvatra sajjanā nūnaṃ karttavyaṃ nātra saṃśayaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17917: Rm_38.968 [5] yāvaṃtaḥ prāṇinaḥ satvās tān sarvān yo hi pālayet /
S01ratnml_u:17918: tasya yāvan mahatpuṇyaṃ tat sarvaṃ te samāpnuyuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:17919: Rm_38.969 [6] yāvaṃto bhikṣavo 'rhantas tān sarvān yaḥ samarcayet /
S01ratnml_u:17920: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ yāvat tat sarvaṃ te hy avāpuyuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:17921: Rm_38.970 [7] yāvat pratyekabuddhāś ca tān sarvān yo bhajen mudā /
S01ratnml_u:17922: yāvat puṇyaphalaṃ tasya labheyus te tato 'rthikaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17923: Rm_38.971 [8] yāvaṃtaḥ sugatāś cāpi tān sarvān yaḥ sadā bhajet /
S01ratnml_u:17924: yāvat puṇyaṃ mahat tasya labheyus te tato 'dhikaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17925: Rm_38.972 [9] yāvaṃto bhūtale gavas tān sarvāñ chraddhayā dadet /
S01ratnml_u:17926: tasya yāvan mahatpuṇyaṃ prāpnuyus te tato 'dhikaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17928: tasya puṇyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ prayāyus te tato 'dhikaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17929: Rm_38.974 [11] sābdhiśailaṃ mahīṃ sarvāṃ śraddhayā yaḥ samarppayet /
S01ratnml_u:17930: tasya bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ samyāyus te tato 'dhikaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17932: tasya puṇyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ labheyus te tato 'dhikaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17935: Rm_38.977 [14] yajñakoṭisahasrāṇi kuryād yaḥ śraddhayā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:17936: tāvat tasya mahatpuṇyaṃ prāpnuyus te tato 'dhikaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17937: Rm_38.978 [15] evaṃ yāvaṃti puṇyāni dānavratodbhavāny api /
S01ratnml_u:17938: saṃti tato 'dhikaṃ puṇyaṃ te sarve samavāpnuyuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:17939: Rm_38.979 [16] iti satyaṃ samākhyātaṃ sarvair api munīśvaraiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17940: etan me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā ca vakṣyate //
S01ratnml_u:17941: Rm_38.980 [17] etat satyaṃ parijñāya yadi saṃbodhim ichasi /
S01ratnml_u:17943: Rm_38.981 [18] prajāś cāpi mahārāja bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17945: Rm_38.982 [19] tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17947: Rm_38.983 [20] etat tenārhatādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17949: Rm_38.984 [21] tataḥ sa upagupto 'rhan vihāre samupāśrayet /
S01ratnml_u:17951: Rm_38.985 [22] etad evaṃ samākhyāya jayaśrī sa jinātmajaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17954: yo yatra meva śṛṇvaṃti śrāvayaṃty api ye mudā //
S01ratnml_u:17955: Rm_38.987 [24] śrutvānumodaṃti ye ca dṛṣṭvā namaṃti ye mudā /
S01ratnml_u:17956: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ samabhyarcya bhajaṃti ye //
S01ratnml_u:17957: Rm_38.988 [25] eteṣāṃ tatra sarveṣāṃ bhavaṃtu maṃgalaṃ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:17959: Rm_38.989 [26] ītaya upasargāś ca sarve vighnagaṇā api /
S01ratnml_u:17960: duṣṭā māragaṇāṃś cāpi vilayaṃ yāṃtu sarvadā //
S01ratnml_u:17961: gṛheṣu sarvadā teṣaṃ lakṣmīs tiṣṭhatu susthirāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17962: Rm_38.990 [27] gṛheṣu sarvadā teṣaṃ lakṣmīs tiṣṭhatu susthirāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17965: Rm_38.991 [28] nīrogā sucirāyuṣkā bhavaṃtu te sukhānvitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17968: Rm_38.992 [29] sarvasatvahitaiḥ kṛtvā bhuktvā bhadrasukhaṃ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:17969: kramāt pāramitāḥ pūrya vrajaṃtu saugataṃ padaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17972: Rm_38.994 [31] sarve satvāś ca saddharmaṃ sādhayaṃtu samudyatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17974: Rm_38.995 [32] kāle varṣaṃtu meghāś ca bhūyāc chasyavatī mahī /
S01ratnml_u:17976: Rm_38.996 [33] sarvadā suphalaiḥ puṣpaṃ vṛkṣāḥ saṃtu samanvitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17977: rājā bhavaṃtu dhārmiṣṭho nayasthāḥ saṃtu maṃtriṇaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:17978: Rm_38.997 [34] sarve sainyāś ca yodhāro jayaṃtu dūrjanān narīn /
S01ratnml_u:17982: vighnāñ jitvā śubhaṃ kṛtvā pālayaṃtu prajāḥ sadā //
S01ratnml_u:17983: Rm_38.999 [36] sarve traidhātulokāś ca kṛtvā maitrīṃ parasparaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17985: Rm_38.1000 [37] sarve bhadrāṇi paśyaṃtu mā kaścit pāpam ācarat /
S01ratnml_u:17986: sarvatra śāsanaṃ bauddhaṃ dhṛtvā yāṃtu jinālayaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17988: Rm_38.1001 [38] sarvān svaśiṣyān paribodhayan saḥ samādideśa śryavadānamālāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17989: śrutvāpi te sarva udāracittāḥ śrutvā salokā abhinaṃdyamānāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17990: saddharmam āśritya sadā triratnaṃ bhaktyā bhajaṃta vyaharan pramādā //
S01ratnml_u:17991: yatredaṃ sūtrarājeṃdraṃ prāvarttayet kalāv api bhāṣed yaḥ śṛṇuyād yaś ca śrāvayed yaś ca cārayet /
S01ratnml_u:17992: eteṣāṃ tatra sarveṣāṃ saṃbuddhāḥ sakalā sadā kṛpādṛṣṭyā samālokya kurvaṃtu bhadram ābhavaṃ sarvāḥ pāramitā devyas tesāṃ tatra sadā śivaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17995: kleśānalaprahvarir āturāsu prajāsu duḥkhaṃ praśamo 'stu nityaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:17997_0: śreyo 'stu samvat 1028 māghamāse kṛṣṇapakṣe dvitīyāyāṃ tithau pūrvaphālguṇīnakṣatre
S01ratnml_u:17997_1: suddhayoge budhavāsare kuṃbharāśigate savitari siṃharāśigate caṃdramasi etaddine
S01ratnml_u:17997_2: saṃpūrṇam idaiḥ pustakaṃ [Rm_481] mānadevasaṃskāritacakramahāvihāre nivāsitaḥ vajrācāryyaśrīdharmmarājena
S01ratnml_u:17997_3: likhitam idaṃ pustakam etatpuṇyena dharmmārthakāmamokṣān prāptim astu śvapustakasunānaṃ lobhayāyamadu //
